Capture Resonators' exhilarating moments during combat with your camera!

Duration

From now until 2025-11-19 23:59 (UTC+8)

How to Submit

You can submit your work in the following ways:

Capture Resonators' exhilarating moments during combat, then submit the photos to Fulmine and C-MOSS to earn plenty of rewards!

2025-10-30 10:00 - 2025-11-19 03:59 (server time)

Astrite x400, Premium Resonance Potion x15, Premium Energy Core x10, Premium Sealed Tube x10, Forgery Advanced Supply x35, Advanced Enclosure Tank x70, Shell Credit x280000

During the event, 5-Star Weapon: Blazing Justice, 4-Star Weapons: Endless Collapse, Hollow Mirage, and Dauntless Evernight receive boosted drop rates!

2025-10-30 10:00 - 2025-11-19 11:59 (server time)

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 8 or complete the combat trial in ""First Resonance"" and activate the Convene function.

Convene Rules

entry.title: Post-Lament Anthropocene: Enemies — Threnodian: Leviathan
entry.content:
The "divinity" who wields the power to merge. A Threnodian rooted in the civilization of Rinascita.

Its frequency, once bound by the Sentinel's shackles, was reborn through the Gem. Taking the form of the once Blessed Maiden, Fleurdelys, It made Itself a vessel anew.

Born of the yearning for life and sustained by the eternal dread that haunts all living beings, It gazes unceasingly, silent as the abyss.

All heretics and non-believers shall stand before Its judgment.

entry.title: [Lament Recon: Solaris Soldier] Combat Event
entry.content:
To help prevent another Waveworn Phenomenon on the scale of a Dark Tide, the Black Shores and Rinascita have come together on a joint project: to conduct simulations using a hologram device in regions vulnerable to the Threnodian's power. Thus, you and your reliable companions have been invited to help test this unique device.

Duration

2025-10-11 10:00 - 2025-11-19 03:59 (server time)

Rewards

Astrite x800, ""Lighthouse and Blake Bloom"" Medal x1 (Sigil), Lighthouse and Blake Bloom x1 (Avatar), Modifier x6, Premium Tuner x100, Forgery Premium Supply x9, Premium Enclosure Tank x12, Shell Credit x380000, and other Materials.

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 14 and unlock the Resonance Nexus in Ragunna City during Main Quest ""The Sacred Breeze So Often Breathes.""

Event Details

  • Choose a participating Resonator and dive into simulated combat drills! Under a special tactical view, you'll direct them as they fend off waves of enemies with brand-new weapons. As you battle, spend the Enhancement Modules gained to power up your Resonator or improve their weapons. To clear a drill, you must survive every wave of attack.

  • Clearing a combat drill for the first time grants you Enhancement Modules, which can be used to unlock various buffs on the Talents page.

  • Complete Milestone Tasks and Achievement Tasks in combat drills to obtain Simulation Data. When the total Simulation Data point meets the requirement, you will receive the event-exclusive rewards: ""Lighthouse and Blake Bloom"" Medal (Sigil), Lighthouse and Blake Bloom (Avatar).

  • Any unclaimed rewards will be sent via Mail the next time you log in within 30 days after the event ends.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides" is now live!
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides" is now live! Post your work with hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook and fill out the form for a chance to win iPhone 17 Pro 512GB, Astrites and more!

Create your works of boundless imagination to present the world of Wuthering Waves!

Proceed to submit:

Content Requirement

Create your own artwork about Wuthering Waves Version 2.7 "Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides"!

Whether it's an illustration of your beloved character, comical moments from your adventures, or difficult combos you've mastered—anything that aligns with the theme is eligible for submission. Share your artwork or video for a chance to win exciting prizes!

How to Submit

  1. Post your artwork on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart included.

  2. Complete the submission form with your submission details. Once done, your submission will be considered successful.

  • Please quote your post link with the right hashtags published publicly on the designated platforms.

Submission form: <https://forms.gle/gCSHw7QTQjXCJDfg8>

Submission Period

2025/10/09 - 2025/11/09 (PT)

Rewards

1st Place (5 Winners): iPhone 17 Pro 512GB

2nd Place (5 Winners): 6,000 Astrites & 800 USD

3rd Place (10 Winners): 3,000 Astrites & 400 USD

4th Place (15 Winners): 2,000 Astrites & 200 USD

5th Place (20 Winners): 1,000 Astrites & $50 Amazon Gift Card

Lucky Prize (20 Winners): $20 Amazon Gift Card

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

  1. To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart in your post and fill out the submission form.

  2. Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

  3. You can submit multiple entries and win multiple rewards. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

  4. Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works previously entered into other fan creation events

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

  1. Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

  2. This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

  3. By participating in the event, you grant KURO GAMES the right to freely republish your submitted content on the internet and social media platforms, with appropriate credit given to the creator. No additional notice will be provided prior to publication.

  4. This event is available solely to participants on the designated servers listed below: America, Europe, Asia, SEA, HMT(HK,MO,TW).

entry.title: Patch Notes for Version 2.7: Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.7: Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-10-09 04:00 - 2025-10-09 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail feature before 2025-10-09 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail feature before 2025-10-09 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

[Version Update Details]

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Galbrena (Fusion/Pistols)

Cold and decisive, she is the "Discord Slayer" who hunts across Solaris and the same "Fiend of Ever-burning Flame" spoken of in whispers.

Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Heavy Attack DMG

Obtainable through the [From Ashes] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Qiuyuan (Aero/Sword)

Former senior agent of Mingting's Internal Security Agency.

Though enmity filled his younger days, loyalty defined his later years. However, scapegoated for a murder, he is now but a blind swordsman wandering the world alone.

Combat Roles: Concerto Efficiency, Heavy Attack DMG

Obtainable through the [Wanderer Knows No Far and Near] Featured Resonator Convene.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Lux & Umbra (Pistols)

From darkness she seizes power, layering sins upon herself. To hunt. To kill. To deliver a relentless and fatal blow to all evil.

From the light she falls, with her vows etched in her mind. For the deceased. For the living. For her pistol's true targets.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Lux & Umbra] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Emerald Sentence (Sword)

Bamboo, hollow yet full; People, whole yet seldom true.

Bamboo speaks without deceit, acts without conceit, seeks no vanity. Few ever measure up thus.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Emerald Sentence] Featured Weapon Convene.

New Locations

Sanguis Plateaus - Three Heroes' Crest

The highest peak in the Sanguis Plateaus, named for both its unique summit and the three Heroes of Heroes—Fabius, Atilius, and Valeria, who once stood there.

Accessible in Version 2.7 upon unlocking the Sanguis Plateaus.

Plane of Dark Tide - Journeying Paradise

Another world concealed within the Dark Tide. From its depths resound the whispers of the ancient "Divinity," the origin of all malice and fear.

At the edge of the underworld, an immaculate Paradise draws bewildered souls, whose lifeless forms chant in unison, day and night—for naught but to earn Its grace and redemption.

Reach the location during Main Quest Chapter II Act XI "Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides."

New Echoes

Nightmare: Viridblaze Saurian, Nightmare: Baby Viridblaze Saurian, Nightmare: Baby Roseshroom

New Nightmare Purification Challenge: Three Heroes' Crest Nightmare Nest

In Nightmare Purification, a set number of Nightmare Tacet Discords are available daily. Defeat them to claim the corresponding Echoes without spending Waveplates.

New Sonata Effect: Flamewing's Shadow

Flamewing's Shadow (3pcs Set): Dealing Echo Skill DMG increases Heavy Attack Crit. Rate by 20% for 6s. Dealing Heavy Attack DMG increases Echo Skill Crit. Rate by 20% for 6s. While both effects are active, gain 16% Fusion DMG Bonus.

New Stories

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act X: The Bygone Shall Always Return

To open the Civilization Capsule left by Imperator, you and Abby prep for Ragunna to find Cartethyia, only to discover that the people of Ragunna are being plagued by nightmares. Meanwhile, inside the Inverted Tower, Avinoleum, the returning Discord Slayer fires her pistol at the once Blessed Maiden... On the other hand, the Fractsidus's "story" in Rinascita approaches its final chapter.

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.7 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act IX "By Moon's Fated Light."

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act XI: Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides

The prophesied Journeying Paradise makes its descent. Even though no Divinity remains on this land, familiar faces have begun to take action to prevent Rinascita's doom. Bearing everyone's will, you are determined to step into the Dark Tide... Go now. Gather every last hope and face the inevitable showdown with the ancient "Divinity."

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.7 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act X "The Bygone Shall Always Return."

[Segue - Afterstory] A Stranger in a Strange Land

In this battle that sealed the fate of Rinascita, its people rose in defiance. And among them stood another, a swordsman of Huanglong, guided across the seas by Huanglong Mingting to lend you his strength. He fought as one among the countless souls drawn to this hour, but the story of his own journey, and the shadows of his past, remain known to few…

  • Duration: Permanently available after 2025-10-30 10:00 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act XI "Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides."

New Events & Gameplay Features

[Special Events]

[Lament Recon: Solaris Soldier] Combat Event

To help prevent another Waveworn Phenomenon on the scale of a Dark Tide, the Black Shores and Rinascita have come together on a joint project: to conduct simulations using a hologram device in regions vulnerable to the Threnodian's power. Thus, you and your reliable companions have been invited to help test this unique device.

  • Duration: 2025-10-11 10:00 - 2025-11-19 03:59 (server time)

[Septimont Weather Forecast] Featured Platforming Event

KU-Ryan, a Black Shores robot, is currently looking for help in gathering Surveillance Datasets on Waveworn Phenomena in Septimont. Interested individuals are welcome to speak with him.

  • Duration: 2025-10-16 04:00 - 2025-10-30 03:59 (server time)

[Freeze Frame: Action Highlights] Combat Photography Event

Behold! Wutherium Film Studio Special Feature: Resonators in Combat Edition has officially launched! Capture Resonators' exhilarating moments during combat, then submit the photos to Fulmine and C-MOSS to earn plenty of rewards!

  • Duration: 2025-10-30 10:00 - 2025-11-19 03:59 (server time)

[Lollo Campaign: Ice Savior] Featured Commission Event

Complete the campaigns to claim your Lollo Stamps—a gift of gratitude from Lollo Logistics. Lollo Stamps can be exchanged for Lollo Helper special deliveries.

  • Duration: 2025-11-06 04:00 - 2025-11-19 03:59 (server time)

[Gifts of Approaching Dawn] 7-Day Login Event

During the event, log in to claim the day's login rewards from the event page.

  • Duration: Version 2.7 update - 2025-11-19 03:59 (server time)

[Gifts of Ink Song] Limited-Time Login Event

During the event, log in to claim the day's login rewards from the event page.

  • Duration: 2025-10-30 10:00 - 2025-11-19 03:59 (server time)

Other New Content

New "Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain" Challenge: Lioness of Glory

New Sigil: "Lighthouse and Blake Bloom" Medal

New Avatar: Lighthouse and Blake Bloom

Participate in the Combat Event "Lament Recon: Solaris Soldier" to obtain the "Lighthouse and Blake Bloom" Medal and the Sigil "Lighthouse and Blake Bloom."

[Adjustments and Optimizations]

Resonators & Weapons

**

Resonator Ascension Planner:**

Added "Resonator Ascension Planner"

  • This feature is accessible via Terminal > Resonators > Ascension Planner.

  • Ascension plans are generated based on your current highest SOL3 Phase. The planner has four sections: Resonator, Weapon, Echo, and Skill, with each section providing relevant upgrade recommendations and details. Moreover, by pressing the "Go" button, you can quickly track the locations where specific Materials are available.

  • The Resonator panel on the Resonator Ascension Planner page lists the featured Resonators in the current version, along with the Resonators that will become available in the next version, whose Ascension plans will be partially released a short time ahead of the upcoming Featured Resonator Convene.

**

Terminal Swap:**

Added "Terminal Swap" (for switching between Terminals)

  • In addition to the current switchable features (Resonator Outfits, Weapon Projection, and Echo Aspect), Terminal Swap will be available.

  • Switching to a different Terminal will change the appearance of the main interface and the Echo upgrade page and affect the Echo absorption animation, but will not affect a Resonator's stats.

Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act XI "Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides" in Version 2.7 to obtain a new Terminal: Daylight Flintstone.

**

Weapons:**

Optimized the display effects of some weapons on the upgrade menu.

  • Both the blade and scabbard/sheath of a Sword will be shown on the page and in finer detail.

  • Pistols and Gauntlets will be shown in pairs.

Features

**

Gallery:**

Added a new Gallery category: Enemies

  • This Gallery category is accessible via Terminal > Gallery > Enemies.

  • Defeat specific enemies for the first time to unlock the corresponding images. The defeated enemies are divided into four categories: Calamity Class, Overlord Class, Elite Class, and Common Class.

**

Journey Log:**

Added "Journey Log"

  • Press the button at the bottom left of the Quest menu to access this feature.

  • The Journey Log lists all the Main Quests you've completed. By pressing an image for a specific Main Quest, you can view an enlarged version of the image and a summary of the Main Quest.

  • You can gain early access to Main Quest Chapter II via Next Stop: Rinascita (Main Quest Fast Track Event) and unlock the corresponding images (along with text) in the Journey Log.

More Quest types will be included in the Journey Log in future versions.

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

  • Added a countdown mechanic for the Burning Waves state after it's been triggered (in Whimpering Wastes), to show how much longer it will last via a progress bar and percentage number.

  • Added a level cap for "Septimont Sonance Casket Collector" and opened access to Levels 7, 8, and 9.

  • Adjusted the availability of the "Fast Travel" button on the Banners Never Fall menu. The "Fast Travel" button will remain on the relevant screen if a challenge is completed without all the chests being claimed.

  • Adjusted the description of the Trophy "The Horn That Never Dies." This adjustment will not affect the requirement for obtaining this Trophy.

  • Adjusted some of the images that accompany the Permanent Events.

Controls

**

Keyboard and Mouse**

  • Added skill icon layout self-adjustment. On screens where skill icons are displayed (as in combat scenes), the layout will be adjusted automatically based on the number of the current Resonator's skill icons and the current resolution.

  • Adjusted the WASD movement speed while using the Map. The smaller the scale, the higher the movement speed.

**

Controller Mode**

  • Added Controller: Cursor Magnetism to Map Settings. You can manually adjust the level of Cursor Magnetism.

  • Adjusted the left joystick movement speed while using the map. The smaller the scale, the higher the movement speed.

Tip: When you connect a controller that supports multiple input modes to a PC, it is recommended that you set the controller to XInput mode for the best experience.

UI

**

Quick Access**

Added an "Overworld" button

  • The "Overworld" button can be found on the top right corner of most in-game menus, next to the "Exit" button.

  • Press this button to jump right back to the Overworld after you've opened up several menus.

  • This button is not available on menus where you need to edit or save settings.

**

Profile**

Adjusted the functionality of the Profile panel

  • The equipped Sigil is now displayed.

  • Access to Resonator Showcase has been added.

  • A slider has been added to the Avatar section of the Edit Profile menu, as in the Sigil and Title sections.

  • The equipped Avatar, Sigil, or Title will jump to the first slot of their respective section of the Edit Profile menu.

  • Previews of locked Titles and your progress in meeting the unlocking requirement are now accessible, and a message will appear when a new Title is unlocked.

**

Event Page**

Updated the event menu

  • Better categorization. Events will be divided into three categories: Featured Events, Recurring Events, and Permanent Events.

  • Latest limited-time events will be shown first as Featured Events.

  • Events that receive regular updates will appear under Recurring Events.

**

Co-op Mode**

Adjusted display and functions in Co-op Mode

  • When you are in Co-op Mode but no other players have joined you, a prompt will pop up to remind you that you're in Co-op Mode and will appear again at set times after you close it.

  • In Co-op Mode, the recommended level for a specific domain will appear when you enter it.

  • Added a "Refresh" button that allows you to refresh the list of players.

  • Added a shortcut to Data Modify on the Echo upgrade menu (in addition to the already available Echo Enhancement and Echo Tuning), making it easier to modify the stats of the selected Echo.

  • When an Echo is successfully modified, a prompt will appear letting you jump straight to that Echo's page and start upgrading.

  • Adjusted the display of the screen that shows the details of a Weekly Challenge, and the prompt that appears after a challenge is completed now shows how many challenge attempts remain.

  • Adjusted the functionality of the weapon Syntonization feature; with weapons that can only be Syntonized using specific Materials (weapons such as Bloodpact's Pledge), the Syntonize page now displays the state of such Materials.

  • Added an icon in the bottom right corner of each Echo image in Nightmare Purification; the icon shows which of Sonata Sets the Echo belongs to.

  • Optimized the display of the menu that lists the gameplay of a Trial Character in Ascendant Aces and added the "Instructions" section.

  • Removed the "Tower of Adversity" icon on the top right corner of the Map and added a new icon that can be pressed to show all the Recurring Events and your progress in each of them.

  • Added an image representing the weapon type to each of the selectable weapons when you open a weapon chest.

  • When upgrading/tuning Echoes or upgrading weapons, the Returned Item image will not be shown on its own screen, but on the bottom left corner of the screen that appears upon completing an upgrade attempt.

Graphics & Performance

**

Graphics Settings**

Adjusted Global Filter

  • Global Filter will become available on mobile, in addition to the platforms where this feature is already available (PC/PS5™/Mac).

  • This feature is accessible via Settings > Graphics > Image Display Mode. Change Image Display Mode to Global Filter and proceed to adjust the settings.

  • In addition to the already available Color Palette, an "Advanced" button has been added. Under "Advanced," you can find the existing color options (Brightness, Saturation, Contrast), along with many more new ones.

  • Cutscenes and UI elements will not be affected by the filter.

Added Eye Comfort

  • Select Global Filter or Eye Comfort via Settings > Graphics > Image Display Mode. (※Please note that these two options are mutually exclusive. They cannot be enabled at the same time.)

  • Eye Comfort comes with three options: Low Light, Bright Light, and Custom. With the Custom option, you can adjust color temperature, intensity, brightness, and texture intensity. Please adjust the settings according to your personal preferences.

  • Cutscenes and UI elements will not be affected by Eye Comfort mode.

Adjusted Auto FPS

  • The Auto FPS option will be available on PC (in addition to the Android devices on which this option is already available).

  • With this option enabled, if your device's utilization becomes too high (causing issues such as hardware overheating or unstable frame rates), the graphics settings will be lowered automatically; and when the device's utilization normalizes, the settings will revert to their original configurations.

If your device utilization becomes too high, a prompt will pop up to advise you to adjust your graphics settings or enable the Auto FPS function.

  • Added better environmental interactions on PC between certain skills and fallen leaves.

  • The "DLSS" option under Graphics Quality is now enabled by default on devices that support this option.

  • Better environmental interactions on PC between grass and Resonators when they sheath their blades.

Audio

  • Optimized the volume of the music for Resonator Ciaccona's Resonance Liberation relative to distance; optimized the sound effects of switching to another Resonator after the skill has been cast.

  • Adjusted how Voicelines play when Resonators are moving, to reduce instances of Voicelines being cut off.

  • Adjusted the background music in certain combat scenes to better reflect the strength of the enemies.

  • Adjusted the background music and sound effects in certain scenes.

Other

**

Cursor (Mouse)**

Added the "hidden cursor" feature

  • The cursor is now hidden by default on PC during text reading, cutscenes and dialogues.

  • To reveal the cursor, move or click the mouse.

  • The cursor will be hidden again if no mouse input for 5s.

  • Adjusted the mechanics of how certain information becomes available in the Crossing Stars and Weapons sections of the Gallery. Following this adjustment, the information of the upcoming featured Resonators and Weapons will not be shown until the corresponding Convene events go live.

  • Pressing the "Go" button for the Activity task "Complete Synthesis once" now opens the Synthesis page directly.

  • Adjusted the maximum number of certain openable Materials, such as Morphable Overlord Class Echoes, that can be opened at once. Following the Version 2.7 update, the number will be increased to 999.

  • Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.

[Bug Fixes]

**

Resonators & Weapons**

  • Fixed an issue where the character models of Resonators Iuno and Augusta might appear blurry on some Android devices with the AMD FSR option enabled.

  • Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where the special effects for Resonator Iuno's Resonance Liberation "Beneath Lunar Tides" or Heavy Attack "Absolute Fullness" would be imposed on other Resonators.

  • Fixed a clipping issue that affected Resonator Iuno's character model when shown in Idle Animation: I.

  • Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where the special effects for some of Resonator Augusta's skills would be imposed on other Resonators.

  • Fixed an issue where the visual effects of Resonator Augusta's Outro Skill "Battlesong of the Unyielding" looked skewed.

  • Fixed an issue in Dreams of Cindertides where switching Resonator Augusta off the field after casting Resonance Liberation "Sublime is the Sun - Sunborne" might prevent time from being added to the timer.

  • Fixed an issue in Camera mode where Resonator Augusta's headgear was duplicated and overlapping.

  • Fixed an issue that affected the sound effects being played when certain skills of Resonator Augusta hit an enemy.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Augusta's skill tutorial contained incorrect icons.

  • Fixed an issue where some of Resonator Phrolova's motions on her Overview menu failed to display properly.

  • Fixed an issue where enabling "Ray Tracing" might cause Resonators' shadows to display abnormally while in motion.

  • Fixed an issue where switching between Resonators when logged in to the game for the first time could cause the screen to flash.

**

Enemies & Echoes**

  • Fixed an issue where the special effects for certain skills of the enemy Glacio Drake were missing.

**

Features**

  • Fixed an issue where the game might crash on some Android devices when logging in from the login screen.

  • Fixed an issue where enabling the Frame Generation option on Android devices equipped with Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite might cause the game to crash.

  • Fixed an issue where the items "Unfading Glory" and "Truth in Lies" could not be recovered.

  • Fixed an issue where a wrong "Reminiscence - Glory of Blazing Crown" icon appeared in the mail to claim this reward.

  • Fixed an issue where the "Lady of the Sea" domain was marked as accessible in the "Guidebook - Recurring Challenges - Boss Challenge" menu when this domain had yet to be unlocked.

  • Fixed an issue where the game might crash on PC with the Volumetric Fog option enabled (in Graphics > Volumetric Fog).

**

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events**

  • Fixed an issue where tracking Blobflies via Map > Exploration Progress might cause the Blobfly icon to appear outside the Map.

  • Fixed an issue where quest tacking was impossible while in the vicinity of a Nightmare Nest.

  • Fixed an issue where the Trophy "Bird Without Legs" might not be granted after the requirement was met in the "Over the Edge - Turbulent Surge" challenge while in the "Rinascita - Septimont" area. If you encounter this issue, you can try this challenge again in Version 2.7 and claim the Trophy.

  • Fixed an issue where certain NPC models in the "Rinascita - Septimont" area overlapped each other.

  • Fixed an issue in Echo Challenge: Clear Cloud where transforming into Lottie Lost was impossible under certain circumstances in some parts of the "Rinascita - Whisperwind Haven" area, preventing task completion.

  • Fixed an issue where certain scenery lighting was overly bright in the "Rinascita - Septimont - Capitoline Hill" area.

  • Fixed an issue on PS5 where entering the Lost Beyond might cause some scenery models to behave abnormally.

**

Quests**

  • Fixed an issue where Rover's character model floated in mid-air while sitting after Main Quest "By Moon's Fated Light" was completed.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Augusta's shadow failed to display properly during certain cutscenes in Main Quest "By Sun's Burning Hand."

  • Fixed an issue where following the conclusion of Main Quest "By Sun's Burning Hand," some visuals in the skies above the "Rinascita - Sanguis Plateaus - Murmurstown" area failed to display properly.

  • Fixed an issue in Main Quest "Dreamcatchers in the Secret Gardens" where certain player actions might result in the quest objectives not appearing on the quest panel, preventing task tracking.

  • Fixed an issue where exiting Co-op Mode after entering it during Main Quest "First Resonance" might cause certain in-game features to become inaccessible.

  • Fixed an issue where the quest guide for Side Quest "Dreams of Cindertides" contained errors.

  • Fixed an issue where the character model of the NPC "Dane" was missing under certain circumstances, preventing the completion of Event Quest "Love of Wisdom." If you encounter this issue, this Event Quest will be completed automatically when you log in to the game in Version 2.7.

**

Environment**

  • Fixed an issue where enabling "Ray Tracing" might cause surface reflections or object shadows to display abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue in the PC version where the graphics quality might drop or reflections of objects on water surfaces might fail to display properly after Fast Traveling from the Sanguis Plateaus to Huanglong.

  • Fixed an issue where climbing or walking in mid-air was possible in certain parts of the "Huanglong - Port City of Guixu" area.

  • Adjusted the mechanics of how certain information becomes available in the Crossing Stars and Weapons sections of the Gallery. Following this adjustment, the information of the upcoming featured Resonators and Weapons will not be shown until the corresponding Convene events go live.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Augusta's skill tutorial contained incorrect icons.

  • Fixed an issue where the items "Unfading Glory" and "Truth in Lies" could not be recovered.

  • Fixed an issue where exiting Co-op Mode after entering it during Main Quest "First Resonance" might cause certain in-game features to become inaccessible.

  • Fixed an issue where the character model of the NPC "Dane" was missing under certain circumstances, preventing the completion of Event Quest "Love of Wisdom." If you encounter this issue, this Event Quest will be completed automatically when you log in to the game in Version 2.7.

entry.title: Notes on promotional event a certain platform
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

We have temporarily halted the campaign of Wuthering Waves on a certain platform due to adjustments in promotional arrangements.

However, it has recently come to our attention that this decision may have caused inconvenience and frustraton, particularly preventing you from using the points previously earned through the campaign. We sincerely apologize for this unsatisfactory handling of the situation. As a resolution, after further discussion with the platform, we have decided to relaunch the campaign on the platform from 2025-12-01, 11:00 (UTC+8) to 2025-12-21, 11:00 (UTC+8). During this period, you will once again be able to make in-game transactions via the platform's direct payment method and redeem the points you previously earned. After this period ends, access to the platform's direct payment method will be closed, so please be mindful of the event period.

Should there be any further changes to platform-specific promotions, please refer to the respective platform's announcements for details. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact customer support via the platform or through our official Wuthering Waves support channels. Thank you for your understanding and support.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Version 2.7 Update Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.7: Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides.

During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-10-09 04:00 - 2025-10-09 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail feature before 2025-10-09 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

[How to Update]

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

✦PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."

✦Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.

✦iOS: Download/update the game in the App Store.

✦Mac: Download/update the game in the App Store.

✦PS5™: Open the home screen > Select Wuthering Waves > Press the OPTIONS button to Check for Update.

[Pre-download]

  • Pre-download Start Time: 2025-10-07 10:00 (UTC+8)

[Pre-download Storage Requirements]

✦PC: 21 GB. To ensure smoother subsequent processes, such as decompressing, it is recommended that you have at least 31 GB of spare storage space on your PC.

✦Android/iOS: 8 GB. Approximately 35 GB of storage space is needed for the decompression process. This space will be used only temporarily and will be freed up once the maintenance is completed.

Please note that pre-download may not be possible if your device does not have enough spare storage space.

[How to Pre-download]

✦PC: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the resources.

✦Android/iOS: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, press the "Pre-download" button, either on the title screen after a successful login or on the in-game Terminal page, and confirm to pre-download the resources.

You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing on your mobile device or the PC launcher. The process can be paused at any time. Whether it is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.

Please ensure that you have a stable network connection during the pre-downloading process.

[Version 2.7 Preview]

[New Resonators]

5-Star Resonator: Galbrena (Fusion/Pistols)

※Obtainable through the [From Ashes] Featured Resonator Convene.

※Obtainable through the [Wanderer Knows No Far and Near] Featured Resonator Convene.

※Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Lux & Umbra] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Emerald Sentence (Sword)

※Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Emerald Sentence] Featured Weapon Convene.

[New Locations]

Sanguis Plateaus - Three Heroes' Crest

※Accessible in Version 2.7 upon unlocking the Sanguis Plateaus.

Plane of Dark Tide - Journeying Paradise

※Reach the location during Main Quest Chapter II Act XI "Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides."

[New Echoes]

Nightmare: Viridblaze Saurian, Nightmare: Baby Viridblaze Saurian, Nightmare: Baby Roseshroom

New Sonata Effect: Flamewing's Shadow (3pcs Set)

New Nightmare Purification Challenge: Three Heroes' Crest Nightmare Nest

※In Nightmare Purification, a set number of Nightmare Tacet Discords are available daily. Defeat them to claim the corresponding Echoes without spending Waveplates.

New Stories

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act X: The Bygone Shall Always Return

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act XI: Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides

[Interlude - Afterstory] A Stranger in a Strange Land

[New Features]

Added "Resonator Ascension Planner"

Added a new Gallery category: Enemies

Added Terminal Swap (for switching between Terminals)

Optimized Global Filter

- Made this feature available across all platforms

- Added Eye Comfort

[Other New Content]

New "Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain" Challenge: Lioness of Glory

New Sigil: "Lighthouse and Blake Bloom" Medal

New Avatar: Lighthouse and Blake Bloom

[Special Events]

[Gifts of Ink Song] Limited-Time Login Event

※For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 2.7, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.

Device Requirements

To ensure a smooth experience, please refer to the following requirements:

  1. Minimum

Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 835, MediaTek G71/72 or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more

entry.content:
At Iuno's invitation, you ascend to the top of Tetragon Temple to gaze upon the starlit sky alongside her.

Amidst drifting starlight where fate entwines with the constellations, she unveils the revelations and blessings hidden within Septimont's lunar phases…

""You're from Huanglong, right? Hehe, worry not. I can give you Huanglong-style moon readings.""

Duration

2025-09-25 04:00 - 2025-10-08 03:59 (server time)

Rewards

Astrite x400, Wax and Wane (event-exclusive Avatar) x1, Premium Resonance Potion x5, Premium Energy Core x10, Premium Sealed Tube x5, Premium Tuner x100, Crystal Solvent x4, Shell Credit x170000, and other Materials.

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 8.

Event Details

  • Log in each day during the event to receive 1 Waveborn Moonstone, up to a total of 10.

  • Use Waveborn Moonstones to decipher Lunar Phases and earn rewards along with limited-time buffs.

  • Each buff lasts for 3 hours. Deciphering a new Lunar Phase within the buff's duration will replace the current buff.

  • Buffs are only active in the open world and some of the Sonoro Sphere challenges.

  • Decipher 7 Lunar Phases to obtain the exclusive Avatar "Wax and Wane."

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "By Sun's Scourge, By Moon's Revelation" is now live!
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "By Sun's Scourge, By Moon's Revelation" is now live! Post your work with hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook and fill out the form for a chance to win iPhone 16 Pro 512GB, Astrites and more!

Create your works of boundless imagination to present the world of Wuthering Waves!

Proceed to submit: <https://forms.gle/TDi2WjFK4MNgmFCD6>

Content Requirement

Create your own artwork about Wuthering Waves Version 2.6 "By Sun's Scourge, By Moon's Revelation"!

Whether it's an illustration of your beloved character, comical moments from your adventures, or difficult combos you've mastered—anything that aligns with the theme is eligible for submission. Share your artwork or video for a chance to win exciting prizes!

How to Submit

  1. Post your artwork on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart included.

  2. Complete the submission form with your submission details. Once done, your submission will be considered successful.

  • Please quote your post link with the right hashtags published publicly on the designated platforms.

Submission form: <https://forms.gle/TDi2WjFK4MNgmFCD6>

Submission Period

2025/08/28 - 2025/09/28 (PT)

Rewards

1st Place (5 Winners): iPhone 16 Pro 512GB

2nd Place (5 Winners): 6,000 Astrites & 800 USD

3rd Place (10 Winners): 3,000 Astrites & 400 USD

4th Place (15 Winners): 2,000 Astrites & 200 USD

5th Place (20 Winners): 1,000 Astrites & Official Merchandise

Lucky Prize (20 Winners): $20 Amazon Gift Card

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

  1. To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart in your post and fill out the submission form.

  2. Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

  3. You can submit multiple entries and win multiple rewards. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

  4. Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works previously entered into other fan creation events

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

  1. Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

  2. This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

  3. By participating in the event, you grant KURO GAMES the right to freely republish your submitted content on the internet and social media platforms, with appropriate credit given to the creator. No additional notice will be provided prior to publication.

  4. This event is available solely to participants on the designated servers listed below: America, Europe, Asia, SEA, HMT(HK,MO,TW).

entry.title: Patch Notes for Version 2.6: By Sun's Scourge, By Moon's Revelation
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.6: By Sun's Scourge, By Moon's Revelation.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-08-28 04:00 - 2025-08-28 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail feature before 2025-08-28 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail feature before 2025-08-28 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

[Gifts of the Moon Roamer]

Log in during the event period to claim the rewards.

✦Rewards: Radiant Tide x10, Forging Tide x10

✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 8.

✦Duration: 2025-09-17 10:00 - 2025-10-08 03:59 (server time)

[Version Update Details]

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Augusta (Electro/Broadblade)

Ephor of Septimont. The undying sun eternally ablaze, and a banner under which defeat does not exist.

She comes. She sees. She conquers.

With blade held high, she awaits the next challenger or the fate that claims it cannot be defied.

Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Heavy Attack DMG, DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Eternal Radiance on the Crown] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Iuno (Aero/Gauntlets)

She is favored by fate under one name, and swept away by it in another.

Yet never once has she been defeated, nor has she ever yielded.

Now, witness the defiant Priestess. Witness what keeps her striding forward, never to look back. Witness how she walks the intricate web of destiny and becomes the only answer.

Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Concerto Efficiency, Resonance Liberation DMG, Heavy Attack DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Across Time's Waxes and Wanes] Featured Resonator Convene.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Thunderflare Dominion (Broadblade)

Thunder shall purge her pain and weakness. From the crucible of blood and sand, the Sun rises. Not dimmed by dust, but ablaze in her full radiance.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Thunderflare Dominion] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Moongazer's Sigil (Gauntlets)

By what means do all things endure? By light and heat, by matter and word, by the mechanics of converging chances, by the soft dissolution into silence, by a moment that mimics the eternal... All things rise and fall in endless rhythm, each bearing its meaning. As for hers, it lies here within her grasp.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Moongazer's Sigil] Featured Weapon Convene.

Hunter's Growl Series (4-Star): Aureate Zenith (Broadblade), Feather Edge (Sword), Solar Flame (Pistols), Aether Strike (Gauntlets), Radiant Dawn (Rectifier)

The engravings draw inspiration from Griffrexes—natural-born hunters and the first allies Septimontians found in this land. Their bond needs no words, radiant and pure, like the blazing sun that watches over all.

※To obtain a 4-Star Hunter's Growl weapon, purchase and unlock the Insider Channel or Connoisseur Channel of the Pioneer Podcast to obtain a Pioneer Podcast Supply Pack, and open the Pack to claim one Hunter's Growl weapon of your choice.

New Area

[Sanguis Plateaus]

The Sanguis Plateaus serve as both Septimontians' hunting grounds and the first line of defense against the Dark Tide. On these magnificent yet bleak highlands, the Blightcloud hovering above stirs relentlessly.

Here, power and glory reach their peak, then give way to bloodshed and death.

Reach the location during Main Quest Chapter II Act VIII "By Sun's Burning Hand."

New Echoes

Corrosaurus, False Sovereign, Lady of the Sea, Nightmare: Gulpuff, Nightmare: Chirpuff, Nightmare: Cyan-Feathered Heron, Nightmare: Violet-Feathered Heron, Nightmare: Aero Predator, Nightmare: Electro Predator

New Nightmare Purification Challenges: Tideline Verge Nightmare Nest, The Wastelands Nightmare Nest

A set number of Nightmare Tacet Discords are available daily. Defeat them to claim the corresponding Echoes without spending Waveplates.

New Sonata Effects: Crown of Valor, Law of Harmony

Crown of Valor (3pcs Set): Upon gaining a Shield, increase the Resonator's ATK by 6% and Crit. DMG by 4% for 4s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and stacks up to 5 times.

Law of Harmony (3pcs Set): Casting Echo Skill grants 30% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to the caster for 4s. Additionally, all Resonators in the team gain 4% Echo Skill DMG Bonus for 30s, stacking up to 4 times. Echoes of the same name can only trigger this effect once. The record of Echo triggering this effect is cleared along with this effect. At 4 stacks, casting Echo Skill again resets the duration of this effect.

New Stories

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act VIII: By Sun's Burning Hand

As the High Tide draws near, a lurking calamity stirs, with its gaze fixed upon the borders of Septimont. Ephor Augusta invites you to the Sanguis Plateaus for a fateful hunt, the one that may decide the realm's survival. To recover the lost relic of Sentinel Imperator and halt the Dark Tide before it devours Rinascita once more, you and the Gladiators of Septimont set out for the expedition...

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.6 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II VII "Dreamcatchers in the Secret Gardens."

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act IX: By Moon's Fated Light

With the Sovereign slain, you attend the victory ceremony by invitation of Ceremonial Officer Bruno. The celebration honors the new Hero of Heroes and those who stood by their side amidst the crackling bonfire and joyous cheers of the crowd... Now that the countless petals are to be thrown into the sky to become the rain of glory and triumph, you might finally reunite with the girl you have never forgotten in a way even beyond fate's grasp.

  • Duration: Permanently available after 2025-09-17 10:00 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act VIII "By Sun's Burning Hand."

New Events & Gameplay Features

Special Events:

[Sanguis Plateaus] Area Events

Participate in Area Exploration Event "Hunt of Ash and Steel" to explore the area and win rewards.

Participate in Featured Exploration Event "Sanguis Plateaus Travel Atlas" to increase Exploration Progress for the new location and win Astrites and Premium Tuners.

Participate in Photo Collection Event "Prints of Plateaus" to capture beautiful moments in the Sanguis Plateaus.

  • Duration: Version 2.6 update - 2025-10-08 03:59 (server time)

[Tidal Defense Simulator] Tacet Discord Tower Defense Event

The agents of the Black Shores have long been the first to respond in times of crisis. To lower the risks they face in fighting the TDs, the Black Shores has developed specialized combat devices designed to counter the threat.

Valentina is now leading simulation tests of the devices, and she's counting on your assistance to push the tests forward.

  • Duration: 2025-08-30 10:00 - 2025-10-08 11:59 (server time)

[Second Coming of Solaris (Ultra)] Leisure Event

Certain anomalies can be found in the game scenes. After locating these anomalies, use the Utility: Zoom Camera to capture them, then work with Bertolt to modify them.

  • Duration: 2025-09-17 04:00 - 2025-10-06 03:59 (server time)

[Marks of the Wild] Limited-Time Puzzle Event

You receive a new message from the Hunter's Den: Please examine the traces left by TDs and track them down.

  • Duration: 2025-09-04 04:00 - 2025-09-22 03:59 (server time)

[Moonlit Revelation] Lunar Phase Divination Event

Log in each day during the event to receive 1 Waveborn Moonstone, up to a total of 10. Use Waveborn Moonstones to decipher Lunar Phases and earn rewards along with limited-time buffs.

  • Duration: 2025-09-25 04:00 - 2025-10-08 03:59 (server time)

[Beyond the Waves: Rinascita] Featured Exploration Event

Participate and upload your Adventure Logs to the Lollo courier truck to get various Adventure Packages!

  • Duration: 2025-09-25 04:00 - 2025-10-08 03:59 (server time)

[Gifts of the Hunt] 7-Day Login Event

During the event, log in to claim the day's login rewards from the event page.

  • Duration: Version 2.6 update - 2025-10-08 03:59 (server time)

Web Event:

[Back to Solaris]

Invite your former companions back and complete tasks together to receive Astrites, Shell Credits, and more! Returning Rovers who link their accounts will also receive bonus gifts!

  • Duration: Version 2.6 Update - 2025-10-08 23:59 (UTC+8)

Other New Content

Tactical Hologram - Phantom Pain Challenge: Lady of the Sea

New Phantom Echoes: Phantom - Fallacy of No Return, Phantom - Kerasaur

Avatars: Wax and Wane, TD Terminator

Title: Catcher in the Tide

Phantom: Fallacy of No Return can be obtained through Tidal Defense Simulator: Tacet Discord Tower Defense Event, while Phantom: Kerasaur can be obtained upon completion of Side Quest: Dream of A Rusted Sword.

[Adjustments and Optimizations]

Resonators & Weapons

  • Optimized the display of some Resonators' icons during combat.

Enemies & Echoes

  • Optimized the special effects used to indicate the triggering of an enemy's Immobilization during combat.

  • Optimized the visual effects associated with the disappearance of a defeated enemy.

Features

**

Gallery**

Added a new category: Weapons

  • Access the page via Terminal > Gallery > Weapons.

  • The Weapons page displays information about weapons and weapon projections.

**

Flight**

Optimized the functionality of Utility: Flight

  • Made Utility: Flight available in Jinzhou and the Black Shores. After Version 2.6 goes live, participate in Windrider Project and complete the Flight tutorials to unlock Utility: Flight in Jinzhou and the Black Shores.

Please note that within these two regions, Utility: Flight is temporarily unavailable in certain areas near water surfaces or the map border; Utility: Flight will be switched to Utility: Glide in these areas.

  • Adjusted the way Utility: Flight can be activated. Use Utility: Flight to leap into the air and start flying.

  • Adjusted the border connections between the regions of Beohr Waters and Septimont on the Map.

Map

Optimized the functionality of the Map

  • Added the tracking feature for mineral collection spots. On the Backpack or Synthesis page, press the icon of a Crafting Material and select "Collection Spots" to jump to the Map and start tracking.

  • Added the tracking feature for specific Exploration Progress quests in Jinzhou, including Viewpoints, Blobflies, and Frostbugs.

  • Increased the detection range of the Lootmapper, making it easy to detect Supply Chests and Tidal Heritage.

**

Reward Claiming**

Optimized the reward claiming mechanics

  • Added one-click collection. Click any "Claim" button on the reward page to claim all available rewards on that page.

  • This feature is available for Guidebook, Data Bank, and most events/gameplay features.

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

**

Whimpering Wastes**

Adjustments to Whimpering Wastes

  • Added Record Sync. For details on how Record Sync works, please refer to the in-game Whimpering Wastes page.

  • Replaced the Burning Waves system with the Ember system. Build up Ember during combat in Respawning Waters: Chasm and Respawning Waters: Torrents. When the Ember gauge is full, you'll enter the powerful Burning Waves state.

  • Added a button that allows you to switch teams on the setup page.

  • Adjusted the displayed content of the event page for Whimpering Wastes. It now displays your progress made in the current cycles of Respawning Waters: Chasm and Respawning Waters: Torrents.

**

Tower of Adversity**

Adjustments to Tower of Adversity

  • Added Record Sync. For details on how Record Sync works, please refer to the in-game "Tower of Adversity" page.

  • Added Floor 3 and Floor 4 to Hazard Zone: Hazard Tower. Achieve the challenge goals and obtain full Crests to additionally win Astrite x100, Shell Credit x100000, Hazard Record x240.

  • Adjusted the unlock condition for the Overdrive Zone. Clear the Stable Zone and Experiment Zone to unlock, without the need to clear the Hazard Zone.

**

Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways**

Adjustments to "Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways"

  • Added new Metaphors.

  • Added Memory Zone 14: Sub-Memory Zone, accessible after completing Zone 13. Enemies in the Sub-Memory Zone have very high HP. Clearing the Sub-Memory Zones grants additional Illusive Points.

  • Updated some existing Metaphors.

  • Lucid Dream has been changed to Divined Dream. When Dreamscape Energy is full, the Divined Dream state can be activated manually. In the Divined Dream state, the effects of certain Metaphors will be enhanced, granting powerful buffs to the team.

  • Adjusted the displayed content on the event page for "Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways" to include the current Dreamscape Aid Effects.

  • Adjusted the lineup page. Resonators with Point Bonuses in the team will be highlighted.

The above-mentioned adjustments to Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways will be available in the new cycle of the event, on 2025-09-01 at 04:00 (server time).

Special Notice: During the maintenance of Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways, access to the task "Obtain a total of 2000 points in one cycle in Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways" in Solaris New Voyage Celebration will be temporarily closed. Access to this task will be reopened after the maintenance concludes. This will not affect your experience with Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways when it becomes available again. Please refer to our upcoming official announcements for information about the reopening time.

If you are unable to complete the above-mentioned Solaris New Voyage Celebration task due to the Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways maintenance, the corresponding rewards will be issued to your in-game mailbox after the maintenance concludes. Please refer to our upcoming official announcements for details about the rewards and eligibility criteria.

Controls

**

Keyboard and Mouse**

  • Added keyboard shortcuts across various screens. For instance, for the "Tap to land in Solaris-3" title screen, the popup that appears upon upgrading a Resonator, acquiring an item, and obtaining Lunite Subscription rewards, you can now use the space key to proceed instead of clicking the blank area.

**

Controller**

  • Added adaptive triggers for DualSense® and DualSense Edge™ controllers. For now, this feature is available only when using Hoverdroid: Shooter in the Tidal Defense Simulator: Tacet Discord Tower Defense Event.

UI

  • Adjusted the rules by which certain entries are highlighted on the Echo recommendation page.

  • Adjusted the displayed content of the Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain page. It now displays the new enemy available in the current cycle and the corresponding progress.

  • Adjusted Ascendant Aces. You can restart an Ascendant Aces challenge via the popup that appears upon its completion.

  • Adjusted Ascendant Aces. A Trial Resonator's Combat Roles are shown on the page that displays the details of the Resonator.

Graphics & Performance

**

Graphics Settings**

Added XeSS2 frame generation for Intel graphics cards

  • This option is available for all discrete Intel graphics cards.

Added FSR 3 frame generation for AMD graphics cards

To enable this option, your device must meet the two requirements listed below:

  1. AMD RX 6000 or newer.

  2. With DX12 enabled.

AMD RX 5000 Series graphics cards only support FSR 3 without frame generation.

NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is now supported, along with the previous versions.

To enable DLSS 4, your device must meet the two requirements listed below:

  1. RTX 50 Series

  2. With DX12 enabled (first enable Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling in your system's graphics settings).

  • If your device meets the requirements, you can enable the option via Settings > Graphics > Advanced > Frame Generation.

  • If your device meets the DLSS 4 requirements, you can select 2x, 3x, or 4x Frame Generation based on your needs or the performance of your device.

If the original frame rate is too low, enabling Frame Generation can increase the frame rate. Please note that enabling this option may cause input lag or display issues.

  • Added interactivity to certain areas of vegetation in Septimont and the Sanguis Plateaus on PC.

  • Added interactivity to the seaweeds found in "Fabricatorium of the Deep" on PC.

  • Added a setup load indicator on PC, viewable via Settings > Graphics. This indicator shows the system load of your graphics settings.

  • Optimized the game's frame rate on Android devices equipped with MediaTek processors (Dimensity 9400/9300/9200/8400/8300 series) for better frame rate stability and power consumption.

  • Optimized the game's Frame Generation performance on Android devices equipped with Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 4; resolved certain display issues resulting from Frame Generation.

Audio

  • Adjusted the logic by which Resonators' Voicelines are played during Overworld exploration, to reduce unnecessary repetitions.

  • Adjusted the sound effects that play when multiple enemy skills hit the target simultaneously.

  • Adjusted the logic by which combat music changes into Tacet Field background music or vice versa, to ensure a smoother transition.

Other

  • Adjusted Waveplate Replenishing. You can now spend a large number of Crystal Solvents at once while replenishing your Waveplates.

  • Adjusted download on Mac. The resources downloaded from the App Store are now smaller in size, and the remaining resources will be downloaded within the game. The required free space for the complete resources remains the same.

  • Adjusted the names and descriptions of Unborn Echoes.

  • Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.

[Bug Fixes]

**

Resonators & Weapons**

  • Fixed an issue where some of Resonator Phrolova's Ascension voicelines were not played in the correct order.

  • Fixed an issue where, with Ray Tracing enabled, the reflections of Resonator Lupa's character model on reflective surfaces behaved abnormally when her Wolflame reached its maximum.

  • Fixed an issue on Mac where pressing Symphonic Poem: Tonic with a controller while Resonator Ciaccona was in the Recital state produced no response.

  • Fixed an issue where visual elements of Resonator Ciaccona's Ensemble Sylphs might become attached to other Resonators on the field.

  • Fixed an issue on PC where the animation for Resonator Brant's Resonance Liberation experienced glitches under certain resolution settings.

  • Fixed an issue where Roccia's character model might remain on the field after the Resonator was switched out upon performing Heavy Attack.

  • Fixed an issue where multiple instances of Coordinated Attack (Marcato) were triggered under certain circumstances after Resonator Mortefi cast Resonance Liberation "Violent Finale."

  • Fixed an issue where casting Resonance Liberation or certain cutscenes might cause the screens of mobile devices to dim.

  • Fixed an issue where the lighting effects for Defier's Thorn might display abnormally when the weapon was upgraded to Level 60 or above.

**

Enemies & Echoes**

  • Fixed an issue where Echo skill: Nightmare - Crownless might become uncastable when this particular Echo was displayed multiple times using Projector.

**

Features**

  • Fixed an issue where the 1P screen might turn black while entering Co-op mode.

  • Fixed an issue where certain tunes from "Archive of Melodies - Daydream Lullaby" could not be unlocked.

  • Fixed an issue where certain player actions might cause display issues affecting the Guidebook text.

  • Fixed an issue in controller mode where the screens of Android devices might appear green around the edges.

  • Fixed an issue where the virtual keyboard might fail to appear on Steam Deck after interacting with an input box.

  • Fixed an issue where the game became silent after being connected to earphones/earbuds using a PS4 controller.

  • Fixed an issue where certain Xbox controllers failed to work after being connected to the game.

  • Fixed an issue in controller mode where the "Select All" option on the "Backpack - Salvage" screen was not functional.

  • Fixed an issue where the background music for the current location would play when certain screens were brought up.

  • Fixed an issue where certain Exploration Progress tasks for the "Rinascita - Whisperwind Haven" area remained marked as uncompleted on the Map even after they've been completed.

  • Fixed an issue where the right side of the Chat screen, when brought up while in the "Rinascita - Septimont - Leonidas Hotel" area, appeared gray.

  • Fixed an issue where the Convene animation experienced glitches when a Convene attempt was made while in the "Rinascita - Fabricatorium of the Deep - The Lost Beyond" area.

  • Fixed a display issue that affected the categorization icons for certain Dish items.

**

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events**

  • Fixed an issue in the "Dreaming Deep" event where the text for "Encounter" in "Dream Archive - Behind the Scenes" contained duplications.

  • Fixed an issue in the "Somnium Labyrinth" event where Rift Runner IV was interrupted under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue in Tacet Field: Mournfell Canyon where the Special Mechanism effects failed to function correctly.

  • Fixed an issue where certain Resonance Beacons in the "Rinascita - Thessaleo Fells" area failed to restore HP upon interaction.

  • Fixed an issue where the guide for "The Three Fratellis' Challenge" contained textual errors.

  • Fixed an issue where capturing Painted Mantis Shrimp might fail to grant Shrimp Meat.

  • Fixed an issue where logging back in on Android devices after logging out while riding a Gondola might cause the rider to fall into the bottom of the water.

  • Fixed an issue where Fast Travel could not be used after selecting Steward Butler (NPC) on the Map while in the "Rinascita - Fabricatorium of the Deep."

**

Quests**

  • Fixed an issue where certain Summaries during Main Quest "Dreamcatchers in the Secret Gardens" contained textual errors.

  • Fixed an issue on Mac where the inputs from certain controllers during Epic of the Blazing Sun (of Main Quest: Rust, Sword and the Sun) functioned differently from PC.

  • Fixed an issue where certain statues were missing in the "Rinascita - Whisperwind Haven - Egla Town" area during Companion Story "A Fleeting Night's Dream."

  • Fixed an issue where objectives that pointed you to certain locations during Side Quest "The Present and the Future" contained textual errors.

  • Fixed an issue where lip syncing was missing for some characters or NPCs during certain cutscenes.

**

Environment**

  • Fixed an issue where using Fast Travel to reach the "Rinascita - Fabricatorium of the Deep" area might cause the Resonator to fall outside the bounds of the Map.

  • Fixed an issue where using Utility: Flight in the "Rinascita - Fabricatorium of the Deep" area might cause the environment art to flash or to load abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue where the icon for Steward Butler (NPC) in the "Rinascita - Fabricatorium of the Deep" was incorrect.

  • Fixed an issue on Mac where the grass models in certain parts of the "Rinascita - Septimont" area behaved abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonators stood upright while floating in mid-air in certain parts of the "Rinascita - Septimont - Capitoline Hill" area.

  • Fixed an issue where certain mineral models in the " Rinascita - Hallowed Reach" area sank underground.

  • Fixed an issue where moving forward was impossible due to abnormal obstruction in certain parts of "Rinascita - Averardo Vault."

  • Fixed an issue where certain mountain models in the "Huanglong - Central Plains" appeared in abnormal locations.

entry.title: V2.6 Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.

Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!

Content Requirement

Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.

We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!

How to Submit

Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.

Submission Period

2025/08/28 - 2025/10/02 (PT)

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.

Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Version 2.6 Update Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.6: By Sun's Scourge, By Moon's Revelation.

During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-08-28 04:00 - 2025-08-28 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-08-28 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

[How to Update]

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

✦PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."

✦Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.

✦iOS: Download/update the game on the App Store.

✦Mac: Download/update the game on the App Store.

✦PS5™: Open the home screen > Select Wuthering Waves > Press the OPTIONS button to Check for Update

[Pre-download]

✦Pre-download Start Time: 2025-08-26 10:00 (UTC+8)

[Pre-download Storage Requirements]

✦PC: 35 GB. To ensure smoother subsequent processes, such as decompressing, it is recommended that you have at least 45 GB of spare storage space on your PC.

✦Android/iOS: 11 GB. Approximately 36 GB of storage space is needed for the decompression process. This space will be used only temporarily and will be freed up once the maintenance is completed.

Please note that pre-download may not be possible if your device does not have enough spare storage space.

[How to Pre-download]

✦PC: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the resources.

✦Android/iOS: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, press the "Pre-download" button, either on the title screen after a successful login or on the in-game Terminal page, and confirm to pre-download the resources.

You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing on your mobile device or the PC launcher. The process can be paused at any time. Whether it is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.

Please ensure that you have a stable network connection during the pre-downloading process.

[Version 2.6 Preview]

[New Resonators]

5-Star Resonator: Augusta (Electro/Broadblade)

※Obtainable through the [Eternal Radiance on the Crown] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Iuno (Aero/Gauntlets)

※Obtainable through the [Across Time's Waxes and Wanes] Featured Resonator Convene.

[New Weapons]

5-Star Weapon: Thunderflare Dominion (Broadblade)

※Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Thunderflare Dominion] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Moongazer's Sigil (Gauntlets)

entry.title: V2.5 Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.

Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!

Content Requirement

Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.

We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!

How to Submit

Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.

Submission Period

2025/07/24 - 2025/08/20 (PT)

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.

Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.
