entry.title: Patch Notes for Version 2.5: Unfading Melody of Life
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.5: Unfading Melody of Life.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-07-24 04:00 - 2025-07-24 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-07-24 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

  • Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-07-24 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

[Version Update Details]

New Resonator

5-Star Resonator: Phrolova (Havoc/Rectifier)

Phrolova, a Fractsidus Overseer walking the fine line between life and death, an uncanny, deadly conductor.

A silent wave of her baton is enough to attune the very frequencies of being and conduct the symphonies of "souls." The music of hers can sculpt a better world or, just as easily, summon a legion to wreak havoc.

Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Resonance Skill DMG, Havoc DMG Amplification, Heavy Attack DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Requiem Without End] Featured Resonator Convene.

New Weapon

5-Star Weapon: Lethean Elegy (Rectifier)

I am not there. I do not die.

I shall be death's companion—with euphoric delights I drown my fear, with the coming days I trade for the past.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Lethean Elegy] Featured Weapon Convene.

New Location

[Fabricatorium of the Deep]

A hidden facility at the depths of the sea. It serves as the distribution center for the Common Echoes. Few truly understand its full purpose.

Beneath the calm lies madness, and at the end of the madness is a collection of unfulfilled, lingering desires.

Reach the location during Main Quest Chapter II Act VII: Dreamcatchers in the Secret Gardens.

[Fabricatorium of the Deep] New Way of Exploration

Orchestration: In Fabricatorium of the Deep areas, use a special Utility to Orchestrate and change the status of objects, so that you can get past mechanisms or gain advantages in combat.

Orchestration Altar: Everything is made of frequencies, as Phrolova claims. Interact with Orchestration Altars and return the notes to their right order to change the status of a door or mechanism and access more explorable areas.

New Echoes

Reminiscence: Fenrico, Nightmare: Hecate, Nightmare: Tambourinist, Nightmare: Glacio Predator, Nightmare: Havoc Warrior

New Challenge: Nightmare Purification - Fallen Grave Nightmare Nest

A set number of Nightmare Tacet Discords are available daily. Defeat them to claim the corresponding Echoes without spending Waveplates.

New Sonata Set: Dream of the Lost

Dream of the Lost (3pcs Set): Holding 0 Resonance Energy increases Crit. Rate by 20% and grants 35% Echo Skill DMG Bonus.

New Stories

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act VII: Dreamcatchers in the Secret Gardens

The Dreamer seals her heart and surrenders to a world of dreams beyond mortal sight. In this hidden realm built upon melancholy melodies, she walks a path of fragile hope and delusions without looking back. But the dreams she longs to realize have long been tangled up in shadow and deceit. Beneath the lofty facade of the Orchestrator, who seems to have everything, is but a wretched, pitiful soul, drowning in her own illusions.

In the end, will this dream of blooming and withering be a sweet reverie or a haunting nightmare?

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.5 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act VI: Flames of Heart.

[Main Quest] Overture: Rust, Sword and the Sun

While waiting for contact from the Ephor's Palace, you and Abby arrive at Solis Tavern, where you run into a blind wandering bard—Nestor.

Having learned of the Ephor's invitation to the hunt, Nestor shares with you Augusta's stories before she rose to power.

  • Duration: Permanently available after 2025-08-14 10:00 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act VII: Dreamcatchers in the Secret Gardens.

New Events & Gameplay Features

[Special Events]

[Phantasma Dreamland] Echo Dreamland Leisure Event

During this event, Phrolova will take charge of a long-abandoned amusement park within the Somnoire, directing Echoes to keep the park running. Strategically assign Echoes to maintain the park's stability and prolong its existence.

  • Duration: 2025-07-26 10:00 - 2025-08-27 11:59 (server time)

[Deep Sea Survey] Photo Collection Event

A total of 6 Chrono Traces are scattered throughout Fabricatorium of the Deep. Explore areas according to the clues and snap the correct photo or search the target location to complete Collection tasks and claim the rewards.

  • Duration: Version 2.5 Update - 2025-08-27 03:59 (server time)

[Overflowing Picture Book] Leisure Event

Familiar scenes now lie faded, stripped of the colors they once held. A picture book awaits your touch to bring its hues back to life.

  • Duration: 2025-08-07 04:00 - 2025-08-25 03:59 (server time)

[Wuthering Exploration] Featured Exploration Event: The Border Mountains

Complete Survey Tasks daily to get Survey Points and claim rewards after meeting Survey Point requirements.

  • Duration: 2025-08-11 04:00 - 2025-08-25 03:59 (server time)

[Gifts of Grand Symphony] Limited-Time Login Event

During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.

  • Duration: Version 2.5 Update - 2025-08-27 03:59 (server time)

[Updated Event]

[Dreaming Deep] Solaris Film Festival: New Theaters—Theater 4 "Ragunna's Visitor," Theater 5 "The Cinema House Murders"

Encounter a variety of events during the Solaris Film Festival. Use Film Rolls to explore stories and reach different endings!

  • Duration: Version 2.5 Update - 2025-08-27 03:59 (server time)

※The previous time frame for Dreaming Deep: Solaris Film Festival was 2025-05-22 04:00 - 2025-08-01 03:59 (server time). Following this update, this event lasts until 2025-08-27 03:59 (server time).

Other New Content

Phantom Echo: Phantom - Nightmare Inferno Rider

Sigils: Dreamland Reverie, Deep Dreams Film Festival

Dreamland Reverie can be obtained by participating in [Phantasma Dreamland] Echo Dreamland Leisure Event, while Deep Dreams Film Festival can be obtained by participating in [Dreaming Deep] Solaris Film Festival.

[Adjustments and Optimizations]

Features

**

Team:**

Optimized the Team function

  • The number of preset teams allowed has been increased from 5 to 10.

  • This optimization is applicable to all situations where the Team function is available.

Leveling

**

Data Bank:**

Added Echo Management

  • This feature is accessible via Data Bank > Data Merge > Echo Management. It allows you to Auto-Lock or Auto-Discard Echoes according to specific management plans.

  • You can create multiple management plans for Echoes based on quality, COST, Sonata Effects, and Mainstats.

  • Multiple plans can be active at the same time. When a new Echo is obtained, it will automatically be locked or marked for discard according to the active plans.

If an Echo meets both lock and discard criteria, it will be locked rather than discarded.

**

Echo Upgrade:**

Added Sync Tuning

  • When upgrading Echoes, you can enable the Sync Tuning option in the Auto-Select Settings.

  • With this option enabled, Tuners will be added automatically to unlock Substat upon upgrading an Echo to one of the Tunable levels (5/10/15/20/25).

  • If you don't have enough Tuners, the Substat will remain locked, and a prompt will appear on the screen.

  • The number of added items allowed for one Echo Upgrade attempt has been increased from 20 to 50.

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

**

[Dreaming Deep] Solaris Film Festival:**

Upgraded Dreaming Deep

  • Added Theater 4: Ragunna's Visitor and Theater 5: The Cinema House Murders.

  • Added the option to clear challenges directly.

  • Optimized the Map exploration experience.

  • Optimized the UI visuals.

  • Optimized the interaction experience.

For more details, please refer to the notice about Dreaming Deep: Solaris Film Festival.

Controls

  • Added controller vibration when wireless connection is established on PC between DualSense® or DualSense Edge™ and the game.

  • Adjusted controller connection priority on PC. Wired access is prioritized over wireless access when both modes of connection are present.

UI

**

Nightmare Purification:**

Added the Nightmare Purification entry under Recurring Challenges

  • This new Recurring Challenge is accessible via Guidebook - Recurring Challenges - Nightmare Purification.

  • On the Nightmare Purification screen, you can quickly access the following gameplay features: Nightmare Tacet Discords and Grim Nightmare; you can also check out how many Nightmare Tacet Discords remain to be defeated.

  • Adjusted the availability of Fast Travel for certain entries under Grim Nightmare; following this adjustment, Fast Travel is available by default for Nightmare: Lampylumen Myriad and Nightmare: Kelpie.

Please note that due to the addition of Recurring Challenge: Nightmare Purification and Sonata Set: Dream of the Lost, the data on the Echo suggestion panel (accessible via Resonators > Echo > Suggest) will be reset following the completion of the Version 2.5 update maintenance.

**

Co-op Mode:**

Optimized the UI in Co-op mode

  • If a non-host player leaves Co-op mode, a prompt will appear on the screen.

  • If a player leaves a domain after completing the challenge but before claiming the rewards, a prompt will appear on the screens of the other players.

  • If a player leaves a domain before the challenge is completed, a prompt will appear on the screens of the other players upon completion of the challenge.

  • Added the following sub-options under the Match option when starting a challenge in Co-op mode: Find Match, Invite.

  • Added the following sub-options under the Co-op Challenge option when starting a challenge in Co-op mode: Solo Challenge, Invite.

  • Added more details to the prompt "Target area locked," which appears when an attempt to access a currently unavailable gameplay feature is made via Guidebook.

  • Adjusted the order in which Resonators are listed on the Skill Training screen (accessible via Guidebook - Path of Growth - Skill Training). Following this adjustment, when a Resonator is acquired, this Resonator will be marked and listed at the top, and they will be returned to their original slot after the corresponding Resonator Skill Tutorial is completed or upon returning to the same screen after leaving it.

  • Adjusted the display of the Details screen (accessible via Convene > Details). Following this adjustment, the viewing angle is adjustable.

  • Adjusted the display of the Events screen. Following this adjustment, the screen displays more event entries and content under certain resolution settings.

  • Adjusted the display of the Resonators screen. Following this adjustment, newly acquired Resonators are marked, both on the left side of the screen and the view-more panel.

Graphics & Performance

**

Graphics Settings**

Made the Capsule AO option available for some iOS devices

The Capsule AO option is now available for the following iPhone/iPad models:

  1. iPhone 12 or newer models (not including iPhone 12 mini)

  2. iPad 10/iPad Pro4/iPad Air4/iPad mini6 or newer models

  • If your device meets the requirements, you can enable the option via Settings > Graphics > Capsule AO.

  • Enable this option to enjoy a better shadow quality; shadows look more realistic with this option enabled.

  • Optimized the presentation of some Resonators' Convene animations.

  • Optimized the game's performance on mobile in certain aspects, including the lighting effects.

Audio

Skill Music:

Added an On/Off option for Resonator Skill Music

  • The Skill Music option is accessible via Resonators > Forte (available only for certain Resonators).

  • With this option disabled, no skill music will play when the Resonator casts their skills.

  • Adjusted the skill music being played while multiple Resonators are on the field to make it more suitable for the situation.

  • Optimized the audio that plays when enemies take hits during combat to make it more stable.

  • Adjusted certain Resonators' Dash/Dodge voicelines to make them more suitable for the situation.

  • Optimized the listening experience when Archive of Melodies is playing at close range.

Other

  • Adjusted the text of the quest guide for Side Quest: Dream Contagion.

  • Optimized the reset mechanics for certain Septimont NPCs.

  • Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.

[Bug Fixes]

**

Resonators & Weapons**

  • Fixed an issue where disabling the Wounded Effect option might fail to take effect for Resonators Lupa, Cartethyia, Ciaccona, and Zani in combat.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Lupa's character model behaved abnormally on the Overview and Weapon screens when making certain movements.

  • Fixed an issue where certain player actions could cause Echo Skill DMG dealt by the Echo Skill of Resonator Cartethyia/Fleurdelys to become abnormal.

  • Fixed an issue where the animation for Resonator Cartethyia's Resonance Liberation "A Knight's Heartfelt Prayers" might fail to display properly on mobile.

  • Fixed an issue where the icon for Resonator Cartethyia's Resonance Liberation might be incorrect.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Cartethyia's character model behaved abnormally when performing Dodges under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Cartethyia's character model behaved abnormally upon reviving after being downed during the casting of Resonance Liberation.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Cartethyia's character model jittered after making certain movements.

  • Fixed an issue where the screen went white when Resonator Fleurdelys cast Resonance Liberation ""Blade of Howling Squall"" under certain Global Filters.

  • Fixed an issue where zooming in or out on mobile might cause Resonator Ciaccona's weapon model to behave abnormally when the Resonator was making certain movements.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Ciaccona's character model on the Overview screen behaved abnormally when making certain movements.

  • Fixed an issue where the casting of Echo Skill "Bell-Borne Geochelone" or Echo Skill "Mech Abomination" by certain Resonators failed to trigger the effects of Resonator Cantarella's Forte Circuit "Abyssal Rebirth."

  • Fixed an issue where the lighting effects in Resonator Phoebe's Convene animation failed to display properly.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Roccia's Resonance Skill "Acrobatic Trick" and her Magic Box could not pull in the enemy "Devotee's Flesh."

  • Fixed an issue where players were not directed to the right screen when they tried to obtain Resonator Sanhua's Outfit "Exorcistic Adjuration."

  • Fixed an issue where the environment dimmed when certain Resonators cast certain skills in some parts of the Rinascita - Septimont - Mournfell Canyon area.

  • Fixed an issue where text unexpectedly appeared in certain areas of the Forte screen (accessible via Resonators > Forte).

  • Fixed an issue where the Fallen voicelines that play when a Resonator is downed might be cut short.

Enemies & Echoes

  • Fixed an issue where the Vibration Strength of certain enemies could not be reduced by Negative Statuses.

  • Fixed an issue where it was impossible to remove the Tracking icon that appeared after the tracking of Nightmare: Kelpie was initiated via Exploration Progress.

  • Fixed an issue where the Vibration Strength of Lev. 120 enemy "Sinister Lurkers" in the Rinascita - Septimont - Mournfell Canyon area was not displayed.

**

Features**

  • Fixed an issue where selecting Ultra Performance for Graphics Quality on mobile could cause NPC models or enemy models to behave abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where 2P Rover and 3P Rover could not give input upon joining in certain quests or challenges that 1P Rover was currently playing.

  • Fixed an issue where Hero's Slash could not be played after exiting Co-op mode.

  • Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where the item "Torn Pages from Avinoleum" could be picked up by a non-1P Rover. If the item has been picked up by other Rovers, you can go to Avinoleum in the Rinascita region again following the Version 2.5 update, and the item will be reissued to your Backpack.

  • Fixed an issue where the Archive of Melodies entry "Ode to the Nameless Martyr" could not be unlocked.

  • Fixed an issue where the range within which the music in Archive of Melodies could be played was incorrect.

  • Fixed an issue where the descriptions of certain "Footprints in Rinascita III" Trophies contained textual errors.

  • Fixed an issue where duplicated content appeared in certain texts of Gallery - Main Story - Main Quests.

  • Fixed an issue where highlights were not present in the instructional text for Cartethyia's Skill Tutorial.

  • Fixed an issue where the Treasure Spot icon was pointing in the incorrect direction when tracking certain Treasure Spots in the Rinascita - Septimont area.

  • Fixed an issue where the prompt "Target area locked" appeared when an attempt was made to track a target on the map.

  • Fixed an issue where unlocked Resonance Beacons might be marked as locked on the Mini Map in the top left corner of the screen.

  • Fixed an issue where certain audio was missing on iOS devices.

  • Fixed an issue on PS5 where the Interactive Environment option appeared in the Graphics settings (accessible via Settings > Graphics).

**

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events**

  • Fixed an issue in the "All Out! Towards the Peaks of Prestige" event where the Echo "Feilian Beringal" could perform Mid-air Attacks in combat.

  • Fixed an issue in the "All Out! Towards the Peaks of Prestige" event where certain tutorial instructions could not be triggered.

  • Fixed an issue in the "All Out! Towards the Peaks of Prestige" event where the viewing angle could not be adjusted upon checking out the opponent's Deck when using a Controller.

  • Fixed an issue in the "All Out! Towards the Peaks of Prestige" event where certain player actions could cause the current deck to display abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue in Solaris New Voyage Celebration where a prompt appeared asking players to select a preferred 5-Star Resonator after logging in to their account on another device, despite having already made the selection.

  • Fixed an issue where completing the "Banners Never Fall" event failed to reset some enemies in the Rinascita - Septimont area.

  • Fixed an issue in Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain - Fleurdelys where Special Mechanism "Ripple" did not take effect in Difficulty IV, Difficulty V, and Difficulty VI.

  • Fixed an issue where the entries for some of the Echoes rewarded for clearing the Mournfell Canyon Tacet Field for the first time were incorrect.

  • Fixed an issue in Underground Flight Challenge where the Supply Chest that appears upon completion of the challenge floated in mid-air.

  • Fixed an issue where the camerawork and special effects displayed abnormally when steering an Echo Train.

  • Fixed an issue in Tactical Hologram: Vitreum Dancer where the camerawork did not work properly upon starting certain challenges.

  • Fixed an issue where interacting with Viewpoints in Huanglong failed to bring up photos.

**

Quests**

  • Fixed an issue in Main Quest "Shadow of Glory" where the special effects involving open books might be missing during the objective "Proceed."

  • Fixed an issue in Main Quest "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" where the Trial Resonator might not join the team, preventing quest progression.

  • Fixed an issue where the level limit for the unlocking of Tutorial Quest "Banners Never Fall" did not take effect. The lowest level required to unlock this quest will be 35 in Version 2.5. If you've already unlocked this quest, it will remain unlocked after Version 2.5 goes live.

  • Fixed an issue where some characters could move outside the bounds of the Map in certain parts of the Border Mountains after Exploration Quest "Where Sky is Clear and Glory Shines: Trial Grounds" was completed.

  • Fixed an issue in Exploration Quest "Flames in the Deep" where certain player actions might prevent quest progression upon completing the current objective.

  • Fixed an issue where entering the Huanglong - Sea of Flames area after Exploration Quest "We Promise, We Deliver" was completed could cause temporary abnormalities in the area's lighting effects.

  • Fixed an issue where the Standard Supply Chest rewarded for completing Side Quest "Plushie Squad's Clean Return" would disappear if unclaimed. If you encounter this issue, the rewards contained in the Standard Supply Chest will be reissued within 7 working days of Version 2.5 going live.

  • Fixed an issue where a wrong image might be used for the item "Above the Stars," rewarded for completing Side Quest "The Adventures of Plushie Squad." Following the Version 2.5 update, some items might be somewhat different based on which Rover you are playing.

  • Fixed an issue where gameplay features available in Side Quest "Quest of Faith" remained viewable in some locations after its completion.

  • Fixed an issue in Side Quest "Quest of Faith" where Fae Ignis's attack might fail to ignite the torches during the objective "Use Fae Ignis's attack to ignite the torches," preventing quest progression.

  • Fixed an issue where the text that accompanied Side Quest: Uncovering Past Heroes contained errors.

**

Environment**

  • Fixed an issue where distant objects remained blurry and the lighting effects remained off on some PC and mobile devices when higher graphics settings were selected.

  • Fixed an issue where smashing Amber Halite to obtain it was impossible under certain circumstances in the Rinascita - Septimont area.

  • Fixed an issue where switching ambient sounds failed to switch under certain circumstances in the Rinascita - Septimont area.

  • Fixed an issue where the sound effects for certain mechanisms in the Rinascita - Septimont area were too loud when triggered from a distance.

  • Fixed an issue where certain NPC models in the Rinascita - Septimont area floated in mid-air.

  • Fixed an issue where the lighting effects for certain stretches of the Septimont's coastline appeared abnormal.

  • Fixed an issue where certain NPC models in the Rinascita - Whisperwind Haven area behaved abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue where interacting with certain Gondola Platforms in the Rinascita - Avinoleum area might cause characters to fall.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Update Content | Version 2.5 "Unfading Melody of Life" Planned for Release on July 24 (UTC+8)
Wuthering Waves Version 2.5 Update Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.5: Unfading Melody of Life.

During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-07-24 04:00 - 2025-07-24 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-07-24 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

[How to Update]

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

✦PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."

✦Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.

✦iOS: Download/update the game in the App Store.

✦Mac: Download/update the game in the App Store.

✦PS5™: Open the home screen > Select Wuthering Waves > Press the OPTIONS button to Check for Update

[Pre-download]

✦Pre-download Start Time: 2025-07-22 10:00 (UTC+8)

[Pre-download Storage Requirements]

✦PC: 8 GB. To ensure smoother subsequent processes, such as decompressing, it is recommended that you have approximately 16 GB of spare storage space on your PC.

✦Android/iOS: 7 GB. Approximately 14 GB of storage space is needed for the decompression process. This space will be used only temporarily and will be freed up once the maintenance is completed.

Please note that pre-download may not be possible if your device does not have enough spare storage space.

[How to Pre-download]

✦PC: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the resources.

✦Android/iOS: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, press the "Pre-download" button, either on the title screen after a successful login or on the in-game Terminal page, and confirm to pre-download the resources.

You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing on your mobile device or the PC launcher. The process can be paused at any time. Whether it is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.

Please ensure that you have a stable network connection during the pre-downloading process.

[Version 2.5 Preview]

[New Resonator]

5-Star Resonator: Phrolova (Havoc/Rectifier)

※Obtainable through the [Requiem Without End] Featured Resonator Convene.

[New Weapon]

5-Star Weapon: Lethean Elegy (Rectifier)

※Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Lethean Elegy] Featured Weapon Convene.

[New Location]

Fabricatorium of the Deep

※Reach the location during Main Quest Chapter II Act VII "Dreamcatchers in the Secret Gardens."

[Fabricatorium of the Deep] New Way of Exploration

Orchestration: In Fabricatorium of the Deep areas, use Utility: Crimson Baton to Orchestrate and change the status of objects, so that you can get past mechanisms or gain advantages in combat.

Orchestration Altar: Everything is made of frequencies, as Phrolova claims. Interact with Orchestration Altars and guide the notes in the right order to change the status of a door or mechanism and access more explorable areas.

[New Echoes]

Reminiscence: Fenrico, Nightmare: Hecate, Nightmare: Tambourinist, Nightmare: Glacio Predator, Nightmare: Havoc Warrior

New Sonata Set: Dream of the Lost

New Recurring Challenge: Nightmare Purification - Fallen Grave Nightmare Nest

※A set number of Nightmare Tacet Discords are available daily. Defeat them to claim the corresponding Echoes without spending Waveplates.

[New Stories]

Main Quest Chapter II VII: Dreamcatchers in the Secret Gardens

Main Quest Overture: Rust, Sword and the Sun

[New Features]

Added Echo Management

Added Sync Tuning

Upgraded the Team setup system

Added the On/Off option for Resonator Skill Music

[Other New Content]

Phantom Echo: Phantom - Nightmare Inferno Rider

Sigils: Dreamland Reverie, Deep Dreams Film Festival

※Dreamland Reverie can be obtained by participating in [Phantasma Dreamland] Echo Dreamland Leisure Event, while Deep Dreams Film Festival can be obtained by participating in [Dreaming Deep] Solaris Film Festival.

[Special Events]

[Phantasma Dreamland] Echo Dreamland Leisure Event

[Deep Sea Survey] Photo Collection Event

[Overflowing Picture Book] Leisure Event

[Wuthering Exploration] Featured Exploration Event: The Border Mountains

[Gifts of Grand Symphony] Limited-Time Login Event

[Updated Event]

[Dreaming Deep] Solaris Film Festival: New Theaters—Theater 4 "Ragunna's Visitor," Theater 5 "The Cinema House Murders"

※For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 2.5, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

[Device Requirements]

To ensure a smooth experience, please refer to the following requirements:

  1. Minimum

Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 835, MediaTek G71/72 or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more

iOS: [System] iOS 14 or later; [Model] iPhone 11 or newer, iPad with A13 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more

Mac: [System] macOS 12.0 or later; [Model] m1 or newer; [RAM] 16 GB or more

  1. Recommended

iOS: [System] iOS 15 or later; [Model] iPhone 13 or newer, iPad with A15 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more

  1. Required Storage Space

entry.title: [Virtual Crisis: Frontier Trials] Crisis Trial Challenge Event
entry.content:
Tethys's crisis simulation program is getting an upgrade. With newly gathered data from the Black Shores and Rinascita, even harsher scenarios now await those who dare to face the challenge…

Duration

2025-06-19 10:00 - 2025-07-23 03:59 (server time)

Rewards

Astrite x500, Virtual Vanquisher (Title) x1, Premium Tuner x200, Advanced Resonance Potion x25, Advanced Sealed Tube x20, Shell Credit x500000, and other Materials.

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 30.

Event Rules

  • As a member of the Black Shores, take on Crisis Trial challenges and Disaster Trial high-difficulty challenges under various combinations of Stress Modules.

  • In Crisis Trials, select a Stress Level for each trial. The Stress Level must meet the requirements to complete the trial. Each trial has a default Stress Module. Support Modules are available to lower the trial's difficulty. After completing a Crisis Trial, the corresponding Disaster Trial along with its Stress Module and Support Module will be unlocked.

  • Disaster Trials have no required Stress Level. Participating in a Disaster Trial will consume Support Modules, so select them carefully in advance.

  • Obtain Matrix Crystals by achieving Challenge Objectives in the Crisis and Disaster Trials. Matrix Crystals can be exchanged for rewards at the Supply Station. The Supply Station closes when this event ends. Please exchange your Matrix Crystals in time.

  • Completing certain Stress Level challenges in Disaster Trials will grant an event-exclusive Title ""Virtual Vanquisher.""

Certain high-difficulty Stress Modules can only be unlocked after clearing a Disaster Trial. Warning: Equipping too many Stress Modules may make the trial excessively challenging.

If a participant is downed in a trial, they can consume Stress Levels to revive. This also gives a corresponding buff. Please note that consuming Stress Levels will affect the completion and final result of Challenge Goals.

entry.title: V2.4 Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.

Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!

Content Requirement

Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.

We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!

How to Submit

Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.

Submission Period

2025/06/12 - 2025/07/17 (PT)

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.

Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

entry.title: V2.4 WUWA Discord Quest Event is Now Live
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

V2.4 WUWA Discord Quest Event has begun. Click the link below to complete the quest on Discord and get a chance to win rewards including Astrite!

Event URL: <https://discord.com/quests/1380268980664533042>

Event Duration

June 12th - June 18th 16:59 (PT)

Rewards

Shell Credit* 20,000

Advanced Resonance Potion* 3

Advanced Energy Core* 3

Astrite* 30

Please note that the rewards are limited to 300,000 in total and will be given out on a first-come, first-served basis, determined by the time the Redemption Code is claimed after completing the quest. The Redemption Code will expire at 09:00 on September 11th (PT). The reward will be limited to one reward redemption per account.

Who is Eligible

Available to players on PC & PS5 where both Discord and Wuthering Waves are available. Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions.

Other Terms

Limit of one reward redemption per account. For more information on Discord Quests, please visit Discord Quest Help Center.

How to Participate

To complete the V2.4 WUWA Discord Quest on PC, players who meet the eligibility criteria must play Wuthering Waves while running the Discord desktop app simultaneously. If players who meet the eligibility criteria decide to complete the Quest on console, the Quest tracking will begin as long as your Discord account is connected via console. For guidance on how to connect and complete the Fortnite Quest on console, you can refer to the following:

Discord and PlayStation® Network Connection FAQ

Redemption Instructions

Once you have completed the Quest by playing 15 minutes of Wuthering Waves, you will receive a reward code in Quest Bar or Quest Home. For detailed instructions on how to claim your reward code, please refer to Discord Quests FAQ.

After claiming your reward code, please follow the steps below to redeem it in the game：

Select your server and enter Wuthering Waves, and then go to [Settings] - [Other] - [Redemption Code].

Enter the [Redemption Code] and hit [Confirm] to redeem rewards. You can then claim them in your in-game mail.

The [Redemption Code] function will be unlocked once you've reached Union Level 2.

The Redemption Code obtained in this event will expire on 2025/9/11 at 09:00 (PT). Redemption Codes that expire will be unable to be redeemed.

Discord Quest FAQ

Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can redeem on my Discord account?

A: Eligible users can redeem one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account.

For more information on Discord Quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center.

Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?

A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you are in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.

Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. If you are unable to access the Gift Inventory, you are not eligible for Quests.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests.

A: We encourage you to review Discord's Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests.

Q: Why am I unable to complete Quest while using Linux?

A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices.

However, Discord team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows or MacOS.

Discord support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

entry.title: Patch Notes for Version 2.4: Lightly We Toss the Crown
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.4: Lightly We Toss the Crown.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-06-12 04:00 - 2025-06-12 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-06-12 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-06-12 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

[The Great Agon: Gifts of Grand Opening]

Log in to the game after version 2.4 goes live and claim the following rewards via in-game mail.

✦Rewards: Radiant Tide x10

✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 2 and unlock the Mails feature. The rewards will remain claimable via in-game mail until the next version update.

[Version Update Details]

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Cartethyia (Aero/Sword)

Cartethyia, the wandering knight who travels across Rinascita. Formerly known as the Blessed Maiden, the vessel of Divinity, and the Queen of Gale and Tide, she went by the name Fleurdelys. Now, she is simply a free and unfettered wandering knight.

Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Aero Erosion, DMG Amplification, Traction

Obtainable through the [Dance in the Storm's Wake] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Lupa (Fusion/Broadblade)

A Gladiator of Septimont, a radiant star of the arena.

Fiery and straightforward, Lupa lives like a wild lone wolf. As long as she can savor the adrenaline rush of battle, she doesn't mind if that same fire ends up consuming her whole.

Combat Roles: Concerto Efficiency, Resonance Liberation DMG, Basic Attack DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Roar of Triumph] Featured Resonator Convene.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Defier's Thorn (Sword)

The surging tides force the crown of thorns upon the knight, out of which the knight forges this sword.

Unburdened by the crown, the knight waded through the roaring waves unwaveringly.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Defier's Thorn] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Wildfire Mark (Broadblade)

The young wolf races through the wilds, shedding every shadow that once held her back.

The lone wolf strides into the arena, cutting down each obstacle in her path.

She seizes victory. She claims glory. She raises everything she has high above. She belongs to the arena, but even more, she belongs to herself.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Wildfire Mark] Featured Weapon Convene.

New Region

[Septimont]

"All for glory, fear no death." Like Ragunna, Septimont is a city-state of Rinascita, though its people revere not Divinity, but heroes of flesh and blood.

Famed for its Gladiators, this City of Glory is hosting the Great Agon—a grand championship held once every four years.

Reach the location during Main Quest Chapter II Act V "Shadow of Glory."

[Septimont] New Way of Exploration

Slash: In Septimont, interact with a special mechanism to summon Hero's Legacy Armor to cut through roadblocks and venture into new areas.

[Septimont] New Way of Interation

Baths: Relax at the baths in Septimont, on your own or with other Resonators. You can invite up to 3 Resonators.

New Echoes

Lioness of Glory, Kerasaur, Pilgrim's Shell, Devotee's Flesh, Spectro Drake, Fusion Drake, Havoc Drake, Nightmare: Kelpie

New Sonata Sets: Windward Pilgrimage, Flaming Clawprint

Windward Pilgrimage (2pcs Set): Aero DMG + 10%

Windward Pilgrimage (5pcs Set): Hitting a target with Aero Erosion increases Crit. Rate by 10% and grants 30% Aero DMG Bonus, lasting for 10s.

Flaming Clawprint (2pcs Set): Fusion DMG + 10%.

Flaming Clawprint (5pcs Set): Casting Resonance Liberation increases Fusion DMG of Resonators in the team by 15% and the caster's Resonance Liberation DMG by 20%, lasting for 35s.

New Stories

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act V: Shadow of Glory

Cartethyia vanished in the Inverted Tower. Following the traces she left behind, you arrive at Septimont, one of Rinascita’s city-states, steeped in glory and famed for its gladiatorial tradition. The city is hosting the Great Agon—a grand championship held once every four years. Yet beneath the grandeur, shadows stir. Multiple factions move in secret, each with their hidden agenda. To uncover the truth, you form a temporary alliance with Contender Lupa. Together, you set your sights on the championship...

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.4 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier."

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act VI: Flames of Heart

You and Lupa claim the championship at the Great Agon. Later, the two of you follow the Lioness of Glory to the burial ground of the heroes and into a world of growing uncertainty. At the same time, you start to wonder if Lupa, your companion on this journey, is friend or foe.

Cheers sound distorted. Fate has been woven. You have a choice to make, and your choice will determine how the story ends.

  • Duration: Permanently available after 2025-07-03 10:00 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act V "Shadow of Glory."

※Chapter II Act V "Shadow of Glory" and Chapter II Act VI "Flames of Heart" will become available at different times. Please note that the availability of certain challenges, events, Trophies, and areas is tied to the Main Quest progress.

[Exploration Quests] Where Sky is Clear and Glory Shines

Hundreds of years ago, the Dark Tide reached the Border Mountains and Mournfell Canyon, burying them under Tidal Blight and erasing the glories they once enjoyed. Witnesses of the disaster remain, trapped in a high tower or confined in a cave, lamenting in nightmares that never end.

  • Eligibility: Explore specific areas of Septimont to unlock.

[Where Sky is Clear and Glory Shines] consists of three Exploration Quests, unlocked by exploring the Mournfell Canyon and Border Mountains in Septimont.

[Exploration Quest] Flames in the Deep

Legend tells of a lady clad in red and undying monsters in a pit where light can't reach. Flames burn. A promise is to be fullfilled.

  • Eligibility: Explore the Mournfell Canyon in Septimont to unlock.

New Events & Gameplay Features

[Special Events]

[Septimont] Area Events

Participate in Area Exploration Event "The Everglorious Summit" to explore the area and win rewards.

Participate in Featured Exploration Event "Septimont Travel Atlas" to increase Exploration Progress for the new region and win Astrites and Premium Tuners.

Participate in Photo Collection Event "Uncovering Past Heroes" to capture beautiful moments in Septimont.

  • Duration: Version 2.4 Update - 2025-07-23 03:59 (server time)

[All Out! Towards the Peaks of Prestige] Echo Combat Event

You can summon special Echoes from "Peaks of Prestige" to build your own deck and engage in thrilling duels across Septimont. Claim honor and fame while you rise to become the very first Apex Duelist of Septimont!

  • Duration: 2025-06-14 04:00 - 2025-07-23 11:59 (server time)

[Virtual Crisis: Frontier Trials] Crisis Trial Challenge Event

Tethys's crisis simulation program is getting an upgrade. With newly gathered data from the Black Shores and Rinascita, even harsher scenarios now await those who dare to face the challenge…

  • Duration: 2025-06-19 10:00 - 2025-07-23 03:59 (server time)

[Lollo Campaign: Verification] Featured Commission Event

The Lollo Campaign is facing an unexpected crisis! To save Maji's career, and to keep those convinent services running, help him verify the reliability of Lollo Campaign!

  • Duration: 2025-07-10 04:00 - 2025-07-23 03:59 (server time)

[Gifts of Applause] 7-Day Login Event

During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.

  • Duration: Version 2.4 Update - 2025-07-23 03:59 (server time)

[New Gameplay Feature]

[Banners Never Fall] New Permanent Challenge Gameplay

With the intricate terrain of Septimont's Old District revealed after recent drainage efforts, the city has announced a thrilling new event—a simulated Tacet Discord Hunt. Brave Gladiators, step forward! Join the hunt and carve out your own path to glory and victory!

  • Availability: From 2025-07-03 10:00 (server time)

Other New Content

Tactical Hologram - Phantom Pain Challenge: Kelpie

Phantom Echoes: Phantom - Cuddle Wuddle, Phantom - Fae Ignis

Outfits: Laurel Nymph, Splashing Summer

Echo Aspects: Dawn upon Thorns (Glide), Dawn Upon Thorns (Flight), Moment of Triumph (Flight)

[Adjustments and Optimizations]

Enemies & Echoes

  • Adjusted enemy placement for the Rinascita - Whisperwind Haven area and the Rinascita - Averardo Vault area.

Features

**

Official Guide Depot**

New Feature: In-game Guide Depot

  • The official Guide Depot will become available in Version 2.4. Press the Guide Depot icon on the Terminal page to access this feature.

  • The Guide Depot offers guides on how to build Resonators efficiently. On the first page, you can get brief versions of the guides.

  • Press the avatar of a specific Resonator to access the corresponding guide, which gives recommendations on Echoes, upgrade priority, Resonance Chain nodes, weapons, teammates, and more.

  • If there are multiple guides for the same Resonator, you have the option of switching between them.

  • Moreover, you can judge how far along you have built a specific Resonator based on the stats recommended by the author of a particular guide.

Please note that data refreshes may be delayed.

**

Solaris New Voyage Celebration**

New Feature: Solaris New Voyage Celebration

  • Create a character profile after the Version 2.4 update and reach Union Level 5. The Solaris New Voyage Celebration unlocks once you meet the requirements. The event lasts 30 days.

  • The event has four types of tasks: Tidal Memories, Combat Scenes, Scenic Wonders, and Growth Roadmap. Complete these tasks to earn item rewards and Celebration Festivity Points.

  • Accumulate Festivity Points to unlock valuable rewards. Keep building it up to claim a standard 5-star Resonator of your choice!

  • When the Solaris New Voyage Celebration unlocks, the events "New Voyage Bundles" and "New Voyage Convene" will also unlock.

  • The events "New Voyage Bundles" and "New Voyage Convene" last as long as the Solaris New Voyage Celebration.

  • New Voyage Convene consists of New Voyage Companions: New Voyage Resonator Convene and New Voyage Arms: New Voyage Weapon Convene. During this event, you can select a Resonator/weapon from Versions 1.0 to 1.4 as your Convene target.

For more details about New Voyage Convene, please refer to the Convene page.

**

Main Quest Fast Track Event**

Adjustments to Next Stop: Rinascita

  • Adjusted the unlock conditions for this feature. Following the adjustment, you can unlock it by going to the Resonance Nexus in Jinzhou and unlocking the Terminal during Main Quest Chapter I Act I "First Resonance."

  • Gaining early access to Chapter II through Next Stop: Rinascita also unlocks Time Adjustment, Resonance Conversion functions, as well as some Utilities.

※Please note that due to the fact that gaining early access to Chapter II affects the unlock order of certain features, Lustrous Tide x1 will be sent to your Backpack following the Version 2.4 update.

**

Quest Tracking**

New Feature: Focus Mode

  • The Focus Mode option can be found on the page that provides information about a Main Quest selected via the Quests panel.

  • In Focus Mode, no Resonator or location will become unavailable as you progress through a quest, but other quests will be temporarily suspended.

Better Quest Tracking Experience

  • Added the "Do not show again" option when you use Fast Travel to travel to the nearest Resonance Beacon and track the target.

  • When you track a quest through the Quests menu and the tracked quest 50 meters or less from your current location, the Quests menu will close and you the quest location will be marked on screen.

  • When you click "Go" on a quest in the Quests menu, depending on how far away you are from the quest, either the Quests menu will close and the quest location will be marked on screen, or the Map will open.

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

**

[Dreaming Deep] Solaris Film Festival**

Adjustments to Dreaming Deep

  • Increased the initial number of Dream Fragments for Dream Residue in Film Theory.

  • Increased the amount of ATK added by ATK Up I in Film Theory.

  • Increased the number of extra refreshes granted at the Recruitment Shop in Film Theory.

  • Increased the number of Team Levels added by Team Level Up I in Film Theory.

  • Decreased the levels of some enemies in Mt. Firmament Inn and Psyche Pass: The Outlier.

  • Set the number of Dream Fragments needed to refresh once at Recruitment Shop as 50 during the Recruitment Event in Solaris Film Festival.

  • Provided 1 initial refresh, before "Film Theory - Ally Recruitment I" is activated during the Recruitment Event in Solaris Film Festival.

  • Adjusted the designs of some icons.

  • Adjusted the enemy AI in certain Whimpering Wastes stages.

Controls

  • Added a slot to the Utility Wheel and adjusted the arrangement of the slots.

  • Added a slot to the Quick Access Wheel and adjusted the arrangement of the slots.

UI

**

Interactivity**

Better Interactivity

  • Colored symbols appear above some NPCs and functional objects when you are within a certain distance from them. Symbols for quest specific NPCs and objects are different in color from those for ordinary NPCs and objects.

  • When you are close enough, a symbol changes to let you know that you can interact with the associated NPC or object.

**

Store**

Adjustments to the UI design of Store

  • Added the new category "Aspects" to the Outfits section.

  • Adjusted the layout and presentation of the bundles in the Bundles section.

  • Adjusted the designs of the icons for some Special Offers bundles in the Bundles section.

  • Added a toggle option between the Convene page and the Ascendant Aces page.

  • Added Combat Features to the Trial Character page, allowing a quick glance into the combat mechanics of the Resonator in question.

  • Adjusted the presentation of Simulation Challenges, accessed via Guidebook > Recurring Challenges > Simulation Challenge; they are now grouped according to the regions in which they are found.

Graphics & Performance

**

Graphics Settings**

New Feature: Global Filter

  • Access the feature via Settings > Graphics > Global Filter on PC, PS5™, or Mac.

  • Six styles of Global Filter are available: Default, Vivid, Dystopian, Film, Noir, Wild. You may fine-tune the intensity and visual effects of the selected Global Filter.

  • Please note that cutscenes and UI elements will not be affected by the filter you select.

With a Global Filter applied, the screen may appear too bright or too dim under certain settings. Playing the game under such conditions for long periods of time may contribute to dry eye. Please keep this in mind while enjoying the game. We will continue to improve this feature in future versions.

New Graphics Quality option: Ultra Quality

To enable the Ultra Quality option, your device must meet the two requirements listed below:

  1. NVIDIA RTX 4080 or newer

  2. With a CPU capable of running 120 FPS

  • If your device meets the requirements, you can enable Ultra Quality via Settings > Graphics > Graphics Quality.

  • With this option enabled, some models will be shown in greater detail, distance ranges at which certain details are shown will be greater, the shadow quality will improve, and more lights will be displayed.

  • With this option enabled, models in some surroundings of Septimont will be shown in higher resolution, and the texturing quality will also improve.

  • Added the following effect on PC: Casting skills while in the water produces ripples on the surface.

  • Added the following effect on PC: Flying close to the water produces ripples and sprays on the surface.

  • Added the following effect on PC: Casting skills near fallen leaves in Septimont stirs the leaves.

  • Added the following effect on PC: In Septimont, the ground changes from dry to wet when it rains or wet to dry when it stops raining.

  • Extended the availability of the 120 FPS option to Mac devices equipped with the following chips: M3 Pro, M3 Max, M4, M4 Pro.

  • Extended the availability of the 90 FPS option to the following Android devices: RedMagic 10 Pro, RedMagic 10 Pro+, RedMagic 10S Pro, RedMagic 10S Pro+. Enable the 90 FPS option via Settings > Graphics > Frame Rate for a smoother gaming experience.

  • Adjusted the resolution settings on Mac (accessed via Settings > Graphics > Basic > Resolution). After Version 2.4 goes live, changes to the resolution within the game are not allowed in Full Screen mode. If you want to change the in-game resolution, please adjust the resolution of your device.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves x Twitch: Support a Streamer is now underway!
entry.content:
Wuthering Waves has once again partnered with Twitch to present the Wuthering Waves x Twitch: Support a streamer. Starting from June 12, 03:00 to June 18, 03:00 (PT), Twitch viewers will receive the "Clear Day" Gift Pack for gifting or buying 2 different tiers of Twitch subscriptions (Prime Subs are excluded) to any streamers within the Wuthering Waves category. The gift pack includes: Flight Aspect "Clear Day," Advanced Revival Inhaler x1, and Advanced Nutrient Block x1.

How to Participate

Step 1: Log in with your Twitch account

Step 2: Watch any livestream channel being conducted under the Wuthering Waves category on Twitch within the event duration

Step 3: Purchase or give away two different tiers of subscription on the above channel

SUPPORT A STREAMER Q&A

Q: In which regions will the Support a streamer event be available?

A: Players from all regions where both Wuthering Waves and Twitch provide services are eligible to participate in this event.

Q: How to confirm which channels meet the conditions of this campaign?

A: During the event, search for "Wuthering Waves" on Twitch and enter the "Wuthering Waves" category to locate the Twitch channel that is currently livestreaming under the Wuthering Waves category.

Q: How do I purchase a subscription on Twitch?

A: Users must first log into Twitch, using either a web browser or a mobile device. Purchases may be made on either a web browser or a mobile device. Detailed information on purchasing subscriptions can be found here, and information on purchasing gift subscriptions can be found here. If you have any other questions when completing your subscription purchase, please click here to contact the Twitch customer service team for support.

Q: Why have I not received rewards after subscribing to a streamer?

A: The campaign commences on June 12, 03:00, and concludes on June 18, 03:00 (PT). Subscriptions made before this period will not be eligible for rewards. Similarly, subscriptions made while the channel is not actively streaming Wuthering Waves under the designated category will not count towards the campaign. If you are unsure if your subscription was successful, please click here to confirm your purchase.

Q: Where can I locate my campaign rewards once earned?

A: Upon earning rewards, the campaign redemption code will be dispatched to the user's Twitch notification inbox within 24 hours. This inbox can be accessed via the top navigation bar on Twitch, situated to the right. The received codes will persist until manually deleted by the user. In addition, the redemption code can also be found on your Drops & Rewards Inventory page. If you still haven't received the redemption code 24 hours after successfully earning the reward, please click here to contact the Twitch customer service team for support.

Q: After receiving the rewards, how do I redeem them in the game?

A: Please follow these steps to claim your rewards:

  1. Select your server and enter the game, and then go to [Settings] - [Other] - [Redemption Code].

  2. Enter the [Redemption Code] and hit [Confirm] to redeem rewards.

  3. You can then claim them in your in-game mail.

  4. The [Redemption Code] function will be unlocked once you've reached Union Level 2.

  • The Redemption Code obtained in this event will expire on 2025-08-17 09:00 (PT). Redemption Codes that expire will be unable to be redeemed.

  • Should you encounter any issues, please contact Customer Service via the following email address:

wutheringwaves_ensupport@kurogames.com

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Version 2.4 Update Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.4: Lightly We Toss the Crown.

During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-06-12 04:00 - 2025-06-12 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-06-12 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

※In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

[How to Update]

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

✦PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."

✦Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.

✦iOS: Download/update the game in the App Store.

✦Mac: Download/update the game in the App Store.

✦PS5™: Open the home screen > Select Wuthering Waves > Press the OPTIONS button to Check for Update.

[Pre-download]

✦Start Time: 2025-06-10 10:00 (UTC+8)

[Pre-download Storage Requirements]

✦PC: 19 GB. To ensure smoother subsequent processes, such as decompressing, it is recommended that you have at least 38 GB of spare storage space on your PC.

✦Android/iOS: 11 GB. Approximately 22 GB of storage space is needed for the decompression process. This space will be used only temporarily and will be freed up once the maintenance is completed.

If your mobile device does not have enough spare storage space during the pre-download process or at its conclusion, merging, decompressing, or verifying files contained in the incremental resource package may fail, leading to the initiation of the downloading of the full resources. Please ensure that your mobile device has enough spare storage space. The full resources are larger in size (approximately 31 GB) and may take longer to download. The pre-download feature will be further optimized in future versions. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you may experience in the meantime.

[How to Pre-download]

✦PC: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the resources.

✦Android/iOS: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, press the "Pre-download" button, either on the title screen after a successful login or on the in-game Terminal page, and confirm to pre-download the resources.

You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing on your mobile device or the PC launcher. The process can be paused at any time. Whether it is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.

Please ensure that you have a stable network connection during the pre-downloading process.

entry.title: V2.3 Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.

Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!

Content Requirement

Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.

We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!

How to Submit

Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.

Submission Period

2025/04/28 - 2025/06/02 (PT)

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.

Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

entry.title: Version 2.3: Fiery Arpeggio of Summer Reunion Patch Notes
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.3: Fiery Arpeggio of Summer Reunion.

Maintenance Time & Compensation Details

  • Maintenance Time: 2025-04-29 04:00 - 2025-04-29 11:00 (UTC+8)

  • Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-04-29 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

  • Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-04-29 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

Special Notice

The rewards contained in the "Wuthering Waves Pre-registration and Social Media Follower Milestones Achieved" mail and "A Special Thanks from Wuthering Waves Dev Team" mail expire on 2025-05-22 at 11:59 (UTC+8). Be sure to claim them in time.

New Rovers who create a character and unlock the Mails feature between 2025-05-22 12:00 and 2025-06-12 03:59 (UTC+8), before Version 2.4 goes live, will still receive these two mails, along with the rewards contained within.

Rovers who created or create a character before 2025-05-22 12:00 (UTC+8) will not receive these two mails again.

  • Eligibility: New Rovers who create a character and unlock the Mail feature between 2025-05-22 12:00 and 2025-06-12 03:59 (UTC+8).

  • Notes:

  1. The rewards contained in the reissued "A Special Thanks from Wuthering Waves Dev Team" mail will remain claimable until the Version 2.4 update maintenance.

  2. The reissued "Wuthering Waves Pre-registration and Social Media Follower Milestones Achieved" mail will be marked as a Starred Mail and will remain valid permanently.

  3. The "A Special Thanks from Wuthering Waves Dev Team" mail contains the item "Voucher of Reciprocal Tides x1." Following the Version 2.4 update maintenance, this item will become invalid, and its associated [Giveback Custom Convene] event will close. Be sure to claim and use the item before 2025-06-12 03:59 (UTC+8).

  4. Version 2.4 will introduce a feature that allows Rovers who register after the release of Version 2.4 to obtain some of the rewards contained in the above mails by completing beginner quests.

Version Update Details

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Zani (Spectro/Gauntlets)

A member of Averardo Vault's security team and holder of "Best Employee" for longer than she cares to count.

She has made plenty of plans for her free time, but for now, her biggest mission is simple: clocking out on time.

Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Heavy Attack DMG, Spectro DMG Amplification, Spectro Frazzle

Obtainable through the [Between Light and Shadow] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Ciaccona (Aero/Pistols)

A wandering bard from Rinascita, Ciaccona. She sings not only for the Divinity, but also for the common folk.

She records stories along her journeys, turning them into songs that evoke laughter, emotion, and tears in both the storytellers and the audience.

Combat Roles: Concerto Efficiency, Traction, Aero Erosion

Obtainable through the [Through Verses and Rhythms] Featured Resonator Convene.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Blazing Justice (Gauntlets)

It heralds justice, precise and inexorable as a clock's toll. All sins are cleansed in flame, dissipating like night beneath the dawn's gaze.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Blazing Justice] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Woodland Aria (Pistols)

All things exist within the lines of poetry. Every sound has its meters and rhymes.

The forest's melodies ascend in spirals toward the moon's silvered grace, harmonized by the nightingales' chorus. When the final note falls and vanishes into the silent earth, a flawless chord echoes endlessly in the depths of this boundless realm.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Woodland Aria] Featured Weapon Convene.

New Stories

Zani's Companion Story: A Blaze in the Dark

A case unfolds at midnight, an echo of Ragunna's turbulent past.

Now, the city is once again shrouded in its shadows. Only a blaze of light can banish the encroaching darkness.

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.3 update.

  • Eligibility: Reach Union Level 20 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" to unlock.

Event Quest: Your Summer Will Never Wither

A rumor about Daemons is spreading through the streets of Ragunna, with an article pointing to the former Poets Society—The Golden Anthem. As you dig deeper, you uncover a tragic story deliberately concealed by The Order.

  • Duration: 2025-05-22 10:00 - 2025-06-11 11:59 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Reach Union Level 14. Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act III to gain early access. For a better experience, complete Main Quest Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" first.

New Events & Gameplay Features

Anniversary Events:

[Cube, Cubic n Cubie] Anniversary Combat Event

The Second Coming of Solaris's Anniversary is approaching, but trouble has struck the Cube World! The mysterious demon king Abbowser has captured all Cubes and challenged the legendary Black Cat Warrior. "Step into the unknown, face my minions, rescue your lost friends, and face me in a big showdown! Come on, it's going to be a blast!"

  • Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)

[Gifts of Grand Celebration] Anniversary Limited-Time Login Event

Log in during the event period to claim the rewards.

  • Duration: 2025-05-23 00:00 (UTC+8) - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)

[Cubie Derby] Anniversary Spectator Event

During the event, 12 Cubes will take part in elimination rounds in 2 Groups, with 1 round taking place per day and 10 rounds in total to decide the Ultimate Race Winner.

Victory does not come easily. A Cube's got to sweat a little to win the race! Join the Cubes in training, complete practice rounds to earn some exciting rewards!

  • Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 11:59 (server time)

[Memory Travelogue] Anniversary Photo Collection Event

KU-Lolo has a new idea to turn your fondest memories into unique Cube souvenirs in the Second Coming of Solaris!

[Gilded Nightmarket] Anniversary Points Exchange Event

Other New Content

[Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain] Challenges: Fleurdelys, Lorelei

[Phantom Echoes]: Phantom - Nimbus Wraith, Phantom - Chest Mimic, Phantom - Crownless, Phantom - Nightmare Crownless

Anniversary Specials

Participate in [Cubie Derby: Warmup] Anniversary Leisure Event to obtain

Avatar: Moment of Resonance

Participate in [Gifts of Grand Celebration] Anniversary Limited-Time Login Event to obtain

Sigil: Once Together

Participate in [Cube, Cubic n Cubie] Anniversary Combat Event to obtain.

Limited-Time Rewards from Past Events

Projection: Somnoire Anchor, Projection: Ocean's Gift, Phantom: Dreamless, Phantom: Inferno Rider, Phantom: Lorelei

Participate in [Gilded Nightmarket] Anniversary Points Exchange Event to obtain."

Adjustments and Optimizations

Resonators & Weapons

Echo Aspect

New Feature: Echo Aspect

  • This feature allows you to apply Glide or Flight Aspects to your Resonators.

  • You can apply an Echo Aspect to the current Resonator or all the Resonators.

  • Glide or Flight Aspects do not affect Resonators' performance.

Enemies & Echoes

  • Optimized the performance of the model for the enemy Fleurdelys in Weekly Challenge: The Wheel of Broken Fate.

  • Optimized the visual effects of the Echo skill "Reminiscence: Fleurdelys" in combat.

Features

Profile

New Feature: Birthday Blessing

  • Set your date of birth via Terminal > Profile > Set Birthday.

  • Once you've set your date of birth and reached Union Level 2, the Birthday Blessing feature will be unlocked.

  • Log in on the day of your birthday or within 7 days after to receive a unique birthday surprise.

  • If you log in after the 7 days have passed but still within 30 days after your birthday, the gift will still be sent to you via Mail.

  • If your birthday has already passed when you finish the initial birthdate setting, you can still receive the birthday blessings and gift for the current year via in-game mail.

  • You can return to the birthday space anytime by using the Supermassive Birthday Cake in your Backpack.

  • You can go to your Backpack to put on the special birthday gift "The Stars that Shine For You."

Please note that your date of birth cannot be changed once set. Be sure to enter the correct date.

Story

New Feature: Glossary

  • Underlined hyperlinks are added to in-game terminology during quests.

  • Clicking on a hyperlinked term will bring up its definition.

Reprise of Tides

Upgraded [Reprise of Tides] Returnee Event

  • Added new 7-Day Login and Returnee Quests, available to Rovers who have not logged in for 60 consecutive days or more.
