For more details about the optimizations made to Reprise of Tides, please refer to the Returnee Event Upgrade Notice.

Pioneer Podcast

Upgraded Pioneer Podcast

  • Increased the quantity and overall Rarity of Public Channel and Insider Channel materials.

  • Added new Public Channel and Insider Channel rewards for certain levels.

  • Added a new options to open Pioneer Podcast Supply Packs.

  • Added a new Connoisseur Channel reward.

  • Adjusted the Podcast Task rewards.

  • Adjusted the weekly Podcast EXP limit.

  • Optimized the display of Insider Channel rewards.

For more details on the optimizations made to Pioneer Podcast, please refer to the Pioneer Podcast Event Details.

Leveling

Data Bank

New Feature: Data Modification

  • Visit the page via Terminal > Data Bank > Data Modification.

  • Use a Modifier to adjust the first Mainstat of an unenhanced 5-star Echo into the designated stat.

  • Echoes that have been modified will be locked automatically.

After Version 2.3 goes live, the following rewards will be provided to try out the Data Modification feature: Modifier x3, Crystal Solvent x2. To claim them, create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-04-29 04:00 (UTC+8); the rewards will remain claimable until the next version update.

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

Enemy Respawn

Adjustments to Boss Challenges and Nightmare Echo Challenges

  • Adjusted the respawn mechanics of Boss Challenges. After defeating an enemy, you can select between "Claim Rewards" and "Restart." If you select "Restart," the enemy will reappear immediately.

  • Adjusted the respawn mechanics of Nightmare Echo Challenges. After an enemy is defeated, it will respawn if you wait for a few seconds.

Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways (Weekly Combat Challenge)

Adjustments to Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways

  • Adjusted the effects and descriptions of certain Metaphors. This adjustment will take effect when Version 2.3 goes live.

  • Adjusted the amount of Dreamscape Energy that can be obtained in certain situations, making them easier to obtain. Please note that this adjustment will take effect after 2025-06-02 04:00.

  • Adjusted some of the instructional text in Tutorials.

  • Optimized the quest guide for Echo Challenge: Clear Cloud.

Controls

Auto Sprint

Added Auto Sprint and Sustain Sprint

  • Enable the options via Settings > Controls.

  • With Auto Sprint enabled, your character will sprint automatically after sprinting for 1.5s.

  • With Sustain Sprint enabled, when your character has sprinted for a certain amount of time, the Sustain Sprint icon will appear. When the sprint is sustained, the control input is no longer required.

  • Now supports BACKBONE

  1. Lightning Connector, compatible with iOS.

  2. Type-C Connector, compatible with both Android and iOS.

  • Added prompts on the Settings page for certain buttons when using a Controller.

  • Added the option of using left stick on the Controller to navigate the "Obtainable via" panel on the Item Details window.

  • Added the option of reassigning the Basic Attack and Dodge buttons on Keyboard & Mouse.

  • Improved the precision of cursor movement when using a Controller.

UI

  • Added new loading screens for the corresponding version. The new loading screen will be shown first after a successful login.

Graphics & Performance

Graphics Settings

Broader Ray Tracing Support

  • In addition to the RTX 40 series and RTX 50 series, Ray Tracing will become available for the following NVIDIA graphics cards:

  1. RTX 2070 and newer from the RTX 20 series.

  2. RTX 3060 and newer from the RTX 30 series.

  • Ray Tracing will also be available for AMD graphics cards that meet the following requirements:

  1. Minimum 10 GB VRAM

  2. Hardware support for Ray Tracing

Excluding 6700, 6700M, 6700 XT, 6700S, 6750 XT, 6750 GRE, RX 7600, 7600M, 7600 XT, 7600M XT, 7600S, and 7650 GRE.

The Dev Team is currently working to expand Ray Tracing support to the RX 9000 series. Stay tuned to official announcements for updates on the availability.

  • Ray Tracing will also be available for Intel graphics cards that meet the following requirements:

  1. With at least 10 GB of VRAM

  2. With hardware that supports Ray Tracing

  • Added system checks and prompts regarding your device's ability to support Ray Tracing.

  • Added an On/Off option for Ray-Traced Shadows.

  • Optimized the performance of the game with Ray Tracing enabled.

  • Optimized the effects of Ray-Traced Reflections when Ray Tracing is enabled.

Wider 120 FPS Support

  • In addition to the RTX 40 series and RTX 50 series, the 120 FPS option will become available for the following NVIDIA graphics cards:

  1. RTX 2070s and newer from the RTX 20 series.

  2. RTX 3060 and newer from the RTX 30 series.

  • Made the 120 FPS option available for AMD RX 6600 XT or newer.

Please note that certain CPU requirements, in addition to the above GPU requirements, need to be met for the 120 FPS option to work.

Due to variations in the in-game settings and system environment, enabling the 120 FPS option may occasionally cause performance issues, in-game glitches, and hardware-related issues. If you encounter any issue, please try disabling the 120 FPS option. If the issue persists, please contact customer support for further assistance.

  • Added the Frame Generation option for mobile devices equipped with Snapdragon 8 Elite.

  • Improved game resolution and visual performance for iPads equipped with M1 or newer processors.

Other

Pre-download

Added Mobile Pre-download

When pre-downloading for the latest version becomes available, press the ""Pre-download"" button, either on the title screen after a successful login or on the in-game Terminal page to pre-download update resources.

Selective Download

Added Mobile Selective Download

  • This feature is at the testing stage and will be available only on some Android and iOS devices.

  • Select between Full Resources and Basic Resources after installing or reinstalling the game.

  1. Full Resources: Download all the available resources in one go.

  2. Basic Resources: Basic Resources include only story resources for the early game. The remaining resources may be downloaded in the background as you play in the game.

Whether or not a selective download panel appears, the game will function normally once the required resources have been downloaded.

The options Full Resources and Basic Resources differ only in whether the cutscenes (MP4) are downloaded. They have no effect on your experience of the base game.

  • Added a panel to the title screen that appears when you download resources for the first time or when the size of the current download is ≥500MB. The panel shows the details of the content that will be downloaded.

  • Added a new way of obtaining Seaside Cendrelis. This item can be purchased at Rosemary's Apothecary following the Version 2.3 update.

  • Added new Titles in the Title system.

  • Adjusted the path stored image path on Mac. Following the Version 2.3 update, you can locate the images you've saved by going to Saved/ScreenShot under the directory in which you've stored your game files.

  • Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.

Bug Fixes

Resonators & Weapons

  • Fixed an issue where the type of damage dealt by Resonator Cantarella's Heavy Attack was incorrect, preventing the activation of the associated effects.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Cantarella's character model appeared abnormal when the Resonator was in the water or entered Mirage after performing Heavy Attack, or when the Wounded Effect was triggered.

  • Fixed an issue where Cantarella's Tacet Mark might appear abnormal when the Resonator cast Resonance Liberation.

  • Fixed an issue where the sound effects for certain of Resonator Cantarella's skills were abnormal.

  • Fixed an issue where the buff "Mid-air Attack Multiplier Increases By 30%," granted upon activation of Resonator Brant's Resonance Chain Node 6 "All the World's A Carnevale, Says Brant," failed to take effect under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where the next stage of Mid-air Attack might not occur after Resonator Brant cast Resonance Liberation "To the Last Horizon."

  • Fixed an issue where the Resonance Liberation animation might not appear when Resonator Brant cast Resonance Liberation "To the Last Horizon."

  • Fixed an issue where the animation for Resonator Brant's Resonance Liberation "To the Last Horizon" might appear abnormal.

  • Fixed an issue where the visuals reflected on water surfaces when Resonator Shorekeeper cast Resonance Liberation "End Loop" appeared abnormal with Ray Tracing enabled.

  • Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where two instances of Resonator Carlotta's Resonance Liberation "Fatal Finale" could be cast.

  • Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where Intro Skill could be cast during Resonance Liberation.

  • Fixed an issue where multiple instances of Concerto Energy Recovery or Resonance Energy Recovery might occur when certain skills of Resonators Changli, Jianxin, Rover: Spectro, or Youhu were cast.

  • Fixed an issue where after activing Resonator Jianxin's 5th Resonance Chain node "Mirroring Introspection," her Inherent Skill "Formless Release," did not take effect as Resonance Liberation Explosion Damage when she casts Resonance Liberation "Purification Force Field."

  • Fixed an issue where the Resonance Liberation sound effects might go missing when certain Resonators cast skills.

Enemies & Echoes

  • Fixed an issue where character models behaved abnormally when getting off a Tubpup.

  • Fixed an issue where the sound effects that accompanied certain skills of the enemy Glacio Drake were abnormal.

  • Fixed an issue where the model for Chop Chop: Headless might appear abnormal while in motion.

  • Fixed an issue where weak spots appeared on the model for Capitaneus in certain scenes when Sensor was activated after switching gravity in Rinascita - Avinoleum - Tower of Ascension .

  • Fixed an issue where certain enemies kept floating higher under certain circumstances.

Features

  • Fixed an issue where non-enemies were also detected when using Enemy Tracing in Mt. Firmament.

  • Fixed an issue where Hecate might remain locked on the Guidebook - Enemy Tracing page when the enemy had been defeated.

  • Fixed an issue where multiple Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways entries might appear on the Events page.

  • Fixed an issue where resizing the Map could cause the icons on the Map to appear abnormal.

  • Fixed an issue where wrong Leveling icons appeared when the Data Bank Level was increased.

  • Fixed an issue where the tracking icon might disappear upon arriving at Avinoleum while tracking Rinascita - Avinoleum quests.

  • Fixed an issue where using Fast Travel while in Tubpup might result in failure to arrive at the chosen destination.

  • Fixed an issue where collecting a [Sonance Casket] or [Sonance Casket: Ragunna] with the Casket Sonar activated might cause the corresponding icon to remain on the Map.

  • Fixed an issue where the weapon model shown on the Resonators - Weapon page appeared abnormal under certain circumstances.

  • Resolved known issues that caused the game to crash on PS5.

  • Resolved known issues that caused the game to crash on Mac after the operating system was updated to 15.3.2.

  • Fixed an issue where Mac devices equipped with M4 might crash while playing cutscenes.

  • Fixed an issue where Mac devices might experience a black screen when displaying the login screen.

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

  • Fixed an issue on Mobile where a Resonator could not move while using Hoverdroid: Shooter to attack.

  • Fixed an issue where certain Resonators using Utilities could cause glitches in combat. Utility will be made available again in Tower of Adversity and Whimpering Wastes after the Version 2.3 update.

  • Fixed an issue in "Tower of Adversity - Hazard Zone" where the special effects for certain icons were not correctly displayed.

  • Fixed an issue where disembarking from certain Gondolas in Rinascita caused a Resonator to sink into the water.

  • Fixed an issue where Flight STA was not recovered after taking off on certain Wingrays in Rinascita - Whisperwind Haven.

  • Fixed an issue where certain elevator models in the Rinascita - Vault Underground area behaved abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue where it became possible to interact with Cartethyia in the Rinascita - Tower of Unity area after switching gravity.

  • Fixed an issue where riding a Gondola summoned at the Gondola Platform in the Rinascita - Avinoleum might trigger attacks from nearby enemies.

  • Fixed an issue in Echo Challenge: Unfinished Book where the prompt instructing players to transform a Resonator into Lottie Lost might remain on the screen.

  • Fixed an issue in Echo Challenge: Unfinished Book where the instructional text which appeared on the left-hand side following a failed challenge appeared abnormal.

  • Fixed an issue in Echo Challenge: Plushie Punch where the challenge was ended when a Resonator was attacked.

  • Fixed an issue where the Resonance Liberation sound effects might go missing when certain Resonators cast the skill.

Controls

  • Fixed an issue where Xbox controllers did not work on Mac via a wired connection.

  • Fixed an issue where opening the Map using an Xbox controller did not work on Mac.

  • Fixed an issue where the buttons were displayed abnormally on Mac with a PS controller connected.

Quests

  • Fixed an issue where the Quest Details of the Companion Story "Immortal Blaze" in Story Review were partially duplicated.

  • Fixed an issue in Exploration Quest "Should the Shooting Stars Blaze" where certain cutscenes could be skipped.

  • Fixed an issue in Exploration Quest "Should the Shooting Stars Blaze - Talk to the Nimbus Wraith" where the Nimbus Wraith disappeared under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue in Exploration Quest "Silent as a Falling Leaf" where certain visual assets appeared abnormal during quests.

  • Fixed an issue with Main Quest "From the Echoes of Destruction" where if this quest was open and Exploration Quest "We Promise, We Deliver" was progressed to "Dash until reaching the end of the Gravity Storm," the trial resonator notification that appeared prevented quest progression.

  • Fixed an issue in "The Adventures of Plushie Squad - Follow the Wingray" where the Wingray might fail to take off after the interaction, preventing quest progression.

  • Fixed an issue in Side Quest "The Adventures of Plushie Squad" where Utility: Camera was not selected automatically upon arriving at the task location.

  • Fixed an issue in Side Quest "The Sailor's Treasure" where Rover failed to materialize during certain conversations with NPCs.

Environment

  • Fixed an issue where the lighting effects of certain scenes in Rinascita - Avinoleum appeared abnormal on Mac.

  • Resolved known instances of objects clipping through each other or floating in mid-air.

  • Resolved known instances of abnormality regarding visual assets.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Version 2.3 Update Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.3: Fiery Arpeggio of Summer Reunion.

During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Maintenance Time & Compensation Details

  • Maintenance Time: 2025-04-29 04:00 - 2025-04-29 11:00 (UTC+8)

  • Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-04-29 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

How to Update

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

  • PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."

  • Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.

  • iOS: Download/update the game in the App Store.

  • Mac: Download/update the game in the App Store.

  • PS5™: Open the home screen > Select Wuthering Waves > Press the OPTIONS button to Check for Update

Added Pre-download on Mobile

Starting with Version 2.3, Wuthering Waves supports pre-download both on mobile devices and through the PC launcher, available simultaneously.

  • Pre-download Start Time: 2025-04-27 10:00 (UTC+8)

How to Pre-download

  • PC Launcher: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the resources.

PC Pre-download Size: 6 GB. To ensure the smoothness of subsequent processes, such as decompressing, it is recommended that you have at least 12 GB of spare storage space on your PC.

  • Mobile: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, press the "Pre-download" button, either on the title screen after a successful login or on the in-game Terminal page, and confirm to pre-download the resources.

Mobile Pre-download Size: 6GB. Approximately 20 GB of storage space is needed for the decompression process. This space will be used only temporarily and will be freed up once the update maintenance is complete.

You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing on your mobile device or the PC launcher. The process can be paused at any time. Whether it is complete or not, pre-downloading will speed up the game update process to a certain degree.

Please ensure that you have a stable network connection during the pre-downloading process.

Version 2.3 Preview

  • New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Zani (Spectro/Gauntlets)

Obtainable through the [Between Light and Shadow] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Ciaccona (Aero/Pistols)

Obtainable through the [Through Verses and Rhythms] Featured Resonator Convene.

  • New Weapons

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Blazing Justice] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Woodland Aria (Pistols)

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Woodland Aria] Featured Weapon Convene.

  • New Stories

Zani's Companion Story: A Blaze in the Dark

Event Quest: Your Summer Will Never Wither

  • New Features

Echo Aspect

Data Modification

Birthday Blessing

Glossary

Mobile Pre-download

Upgraded [Reprise of Tides] Returnee Event

  • New Events & Gameplay Features

Anniversary Events

[Gifts of Grand Celebration] Anniversary Limited-Time Login Event

[Cube, Cubic n Cubie] Anniversary Combat Event

[Cubie Derby] Anniversary Spectator Event

[Cubie Derby: Warmup] Anniversary Leisure Event

Anniversary Web Events

Special Events

[Your Summer Will Never Wither] Story Event

  • Other New Content

New "Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain" Challenges: Fleurdelys, Lorelei

New Phantom Echoes: Phantom - Nimbus Wraith, Phantom - Chest Mimic, Phantom - Crownless, Phantom - Nightmare Crownless

Anniversary Specials

Limited-Time Rewards from Past Events

For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 2.3, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.

Device Requirements

To ensure a smooth experience, please refer to the following requirements:

  1. Minimum

Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 835, MediaTek G71/72 or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more

iOS: [System] iOS 14 or later; [Model] iPhone 11 or newer, iPad with A13 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more

Mac: [System] macOS 12.0 or later; [Model] m1 or newer; [RAM] 16 GB or more

PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I5 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 2700; [GPU] Geforce 1060/RX570/Intel ARC A380, [RAM] 16 GB or more

  1. Recommended

Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 8 Gen1+/Gen2/Gen3 or MediaTek processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more

iOS: [System] iOS 15 or later; [Model] iPhone 13 or newer, iPad with A15 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more

  1. Required Storage Space

Android/iOS: 28 GB

Mac: 60 GB

PC: 60 GB; it's recommended to install the game on an SSD.

PS5™: Please make sure your device has sufficient available storage to complete the update.

entry.title: Notice on the Upgrade and Maintenance of the [Reprise of Tides] Returnee Event

Dear Rover,

To enhance your gameplay experience, we will be upgrading the Reprise of Tides Returnee Event in Version 2.3. As part of this update, the event will be temporarily unavailable for maintenance. Please take note of the scheduled maintenance time, and we appreciate your understanding for any inconvenience caused.

2025-04-14 04:00 (server time) - Version 2.3 update

Requirements for Participation in Reprise of Tides

  • You have reached Union Level 8.

  • You have not logged in for at least 30 consecutive days.

  • At least 30 days have passed since the end date of the last Reprise of Tides event that you participated in.

Rovers who meet the above requirements can activate Reprise of Tides, which will last for 14 days upon activation.

Regarding the Accessibility of Reprise of Tides

If you activate Reprise of Tides before maintenance starts, your access will remain unaffected.

If you meet the returnee requirements during the maintenance period, you will temporarily be unable to assess the event until maintenance is over. Access will be granted to the updated Reprise of Tides Returnee Event once Version 2.3 goes live.

entry.content:
The Black Shores has developed a special training program that can simulate dangerous trials in Solaris by using Tethys system data. The program is a good measure of the challenger's combat capabilities under adverse conditions.

Duration

2025-04-03 10:00 - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)

Dear Rovers,

The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.

Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.

entry.title: Version 2.2: Tangled Truth in Inverted Tower Patch Notes
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.2: Tangled Truth in Inverted Tower.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-03-27 04:00 - 2025-03-27 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-03-27 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-03-27 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

[Version Update Details]

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Cantarella (Havoc/Rectifier)

The current head of Fisalia, Cantarella, the Bane.

A mysterious noblewoman, her beauty as captivating as it is perilous. She resides in a crown-like castle perched atop the mountain, where illusory dreams flow like streams, meticulously spun by her own hands.

Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Concerto Efficiency, Basic Attack DMG, Coordinated Attack, Havoc DMG Amplification, Resonance Skill DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Neptune's Lullaby] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Rover - Aero (Aero/Sword)

Rover has gained a new attribute—Aero, along with all the associated abilities. This new attribute of Rover's is a well-balanced one. Rover: Aero deals Aero DMG to enemies and heals other Resonators with Eye of Tempest.

Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Resonance Skill DMG, Aero Erosion

Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" to unlock.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Whispers of Sirens (Rectifier)

From the sea, some see stars, some catch the moon, and some hear countless whispers and murmurs.

Those murmurs seep into her venom, flowing through every winding river.

In the end, the murmurs envelope, like the bell of a jellyfish, like the sea.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Whispers of Sirens] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Bloodpact's Pledge (Sword)

This weapon is a testament to the unbreakable blood pact: One shall never betray, never surrender, and fight until the last drop of blood is shed.

Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" to obtain.

New Regions

Avinoleum

Once a theological seminary of Rinascita, it now rests in the boundless expanse of clouds. It once recorded Rinascita's glory and grandeur, along with countless unspeakable secrets.

Reach the location during [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier."

Beohr Waters

Once a sacred land, only a faint shadow of Avinoleum's glory remains. Those destined to fall still live, while those meant to survive lie buried, transformed into divine oracles no one hears. Their lips remain sealed, and Their ears are bound by words They never spoke.

Reach the location during [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier."

**

[Avinoleum] New Way of Exploration**

[Gravity Calibrator] Gravity Adjustment

In Avinoleum, interact with Gravity Calibrators to change the direction of gravity in your surroundings and travel to more areas open to exploration.

[Companion] Shared Adventure

For certain tasks in Avinoleum, you and the Companion Resonator can work together to complete them.

New Echoes

Reminiscence: Fleurdelys, Capitaneus, La Guardia, Sagittario, Sacerdos, Glacio Drake, Electro Drake, Aero Drake, Nightmare: Lampylumen Myriad

New Sonata Set: Gusts of Welkin

Gusts of Welkin (2pcs Set): Aero DMG + 10%

Gusts of Welkin (5pcs Set): Inflicting Aero Erosion on enemies increases Aero DMG for all Resonators in the team by 15%, and for the Resonator triggering this effect by an additional 15%, lasting for 20s.

New Stories

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier"

After the Carnevale, a voice in your head leads you to the supposed Martyred Maiden—Cartethyia. The encounter creates more questions than it answers.

Who are your enemies? Who are your friends? Where is the Inverted Tower located? The helper Carlotta has found and the invitation from Fisalia may help you answer all these questions. The moment of truth seems inevitable...

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.2 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act III "What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing."

[Cantarella's Companion Story] A Fleeting Night's Dream

A mysterious letter gently lifts a corner of the veil that shrouds the nights gone by. A faint whisper from the depths of the abyss waits for your reply.

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.2 update.

  • Eligibility: Reach Union Level 20 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier."

[Exploration Quest] Should the Shooting Stars Blaze

You find a mysterious "light spark." Follow this little spark, and you may witness the shooting stars blaze.

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.2 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier."

New Events & Gameplay Features

**

Special Events:**

[Avinoleum] Area Events

Participate in Area Exploration Event "Winds of the Past" to explore the area and win rewards.

Participate in Featured Exploration Event "Avinoleum Travel Atlas" to increase Exploration Progress for the new region and win Astrites and Premium Tuners.

Participate in Photo Collection Event "Acropolis Documentarian" to capture beautiful moments in Avinoleum.

  • Duration: Version 2.2 update - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)

[Virtual Crisis: Prototype Trials] Crisis Trial Challenge Event

As a member of the Black Shores, take on Crisis Trial challenges and high-difficulty Disaster Trial challenges under various combinations of Stress Modules.

  • Duration: 2025-04-03 10:00 - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)

[If You Gaze Into the Abyss of Dreams] Featured Co-op Combat Event

A girl called Dorothy appears next to a mysterious gate. She claims a sudden crisis is taking place inside.

  • Duration: 2025-04-17 10:00 - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)

[Lollo Campaign: Set Sail] Featured Commission Event

Maji, your entrepreneurial friend, has made his way across the sea to Ragunna. It seems he's stumbled upon a golden opportunity, and he's eager to get you on board.

  • Duration: 2025-04-10 10:00 - 2025-04-24 03:59 (server time)

[Ragunna Weather Forecast] Featured Platforming Event

KU-Ryan, a Black Shores robot, is currently looking for help in gathering Surveillance Datasets on Waveworn Phenomena in Ragunna.

  • Duration: 2025-04-10 10:00 - 2025-04-24 03:59 (server time)

[Wuthering Exploration] Featured Exploration Event: Whisperwind Haven

Complete Survey Tasks daily to get Survey Points and claim rewards after meeting Survey Point requirements.

  • Duration: 2025-04-14 04:00 - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)

[Gifts of the Still Tides] 7-Day Login Event

During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.

  • Rewards: Radiant Tide x5, Lustrous Tide x5

  • Duration: Version 2.2 update - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)

Other

[Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain] Challenge: Dragon of Dirge

[Titles]: Meet specific requirements to obtain honorary titles

[Phantom Echo]: Phantom - Capitaneus

Complete Exploration Quest "Should the Shooting Stars Blaze" to obtain Phantom: Capitaneus.

[Adjustments and Optimizations]

Resonators & Weapons

  • Optimized the model performance for the back of Jinhsi's Outfit "Peach Blossom."

Features

**

Profile**

New feature: Titles

  • View or change your Title via Terminal> Profile > Change Title

  • Available Titles and their respective Unlock requirements are displayed on the Change Title page.

  • Challenge Records before and after certain Titles are obtained will be displayed on the page. The Records will be updated if new ones are achieved.

  • More Titles will be added in future versions.

**

Story**

New feature: Story Review

  • During a scene, press the icon in the top right corner of the screen to access Story Review.

  • This feature allows you to replay previously voiced lines and view their subtitles.

  • To access more storyline content, go to Terminal > Gallery > Main Story.

**

Map**

  • Added a "Switch Gravity" view option to the Map for Avinoleum.

  • Added Switch Gravity-related Markers for Avinoleum.

  • Added icons on the Map to show certain undiscovered gameplay content.

  • Added the option to Track and Fast Travel to Collection Spots and locations marked with Lootmappers or Custom Markers.

  • Adjusted the order of Regions displayed when "Switch Map" is pressed. Newer Regions will be displayed first.

Adjusted the rules under which certain red dots appear on the Map. A red dot will still appear if there are unclaimed rewards.

Leveling

**

Materials for Leveling**

Added Quick Access to Supplies in Backpack:

  • Select "Supply Pack" on the "How to Get" menu when leveling up to open Supply Packs which contain the required Material.

  • If you have multiple Supply Packs that contain the required Material, the one with the lowest number of options will be opened first.

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

**

Whimpering Wastes**

  • Optimized the event page for Whimpering Wastes when the event is still locked.

  • Adjusted the Environment Report effects in the current iteration of "Respawning Waters: Torrents - Infinite Torrents."

  • Adjusted the Bonuses granted by the Tokens "The Revelry that Unveils Mysteries" and "The Blood Pact that Corrupts to the Core."

Please note that the adjustments to Whimpering Wastes take effect after the maintenance update for Version 2.2 concludes.

  • Adjusted the gameplay tutorial text for Nightmare Cloud.

Controls

  • Added Controller vibration feedback when casting certain COST4 Echo Skills.

  • Enhanced the visual contrast in Controller mode between selected and unselected content on certain pages.

  • Added a button to the Activity screen that makes it easier to claim rewards when using a Controller.

  • Optimized the experience when using Controller thumbsticks to move in-game sliders, reducing the likelihood of a slider bouncing back after being moved to the end of the slider.

  • Optimized the Conversion process in Synthesis when using a Controller.

UI

  • Optimized the functionality of red dots on the Events page. Clicking red dots on the Events page now scrolls you to events with corresponding red dots.

  • Adjusted the sizes of icons in the top left corner of the Map screen that provide access to various Exploration Progress-related tasks.

Graphics & Performance

**

Graphics Settings**

Added Color Settings

  • Adjust the Color Settings via Settings > Graphics > Basic > Color Settings

  • The options "Saturation" and "Contrast" are now available, in addition to "Brightness."

  • Images are provided for reference to show the effects of different Settings.

Please note that the Brightness value will be reset to the default 50 following the Version 2.2 update. If you set a Brightness value that is different from this default option, please readjust the value accordingly following the update.

Added notices regarding Frame Generation settings

  • If Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling is not enabled on Windows, the "Frame Generation" option will be reset to "Off" following the Version 2.2 update. To turn on the Frame Generation option, enable the "Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling" option via "Settings > System > Display > Graphics Settings" on Windows and then reboot your PC.

  • In the current version, the Frame Generation option is available for devices equipped with the NVIDIA RTX 40 series or later.

Added an On/Off option for Co-op Teammate VFX

Turn this feature on or off via Settings > Graphics > Custom

  • Added physics effects to fabric, making fabric in certain scenes appear more realistic.

  • Added the 120 FPS option for certain Mac models. This option is now available for Mac devices equipped with M3 Pro, M3 Max, M4, or M4 Pro processors.

  • Optimized Ray Tracing in certain scenes.

  • Optimized the efficiency of the shader compilation process and the hardware resource usage on PC.

  • Optimized the visual effects for fog and cloud under certain settings on PC.

Other

**

Title Screen**

New feature: Network Test

  • If you encounter network-related issues, such as failure to log in, you now have the option of performing a network test via Tools > Network Test on the title screen.

  • The network testing process may take some time.

  • If needed, you can report the network testing results and contact Customer Service to help us better identify the issue.

  • Optimized the log-in process and the process of entering or exiting the title screen, reducing the time required to log into and enter the game.

  • Increased the number of Waypoints that can be deployed simultaneously to 10.

  • Increased the number of Casket Sonar that can be deployed simultaneously to 5.

  • Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.

[Bug Fixes]

**

Resonators & Weapons**

  • Fixed an issue with enemy targeting when Resonator Brant performed Mid-air Attack 1.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Brant might be downed without taking damage while performing Basic Attack 4.

  • Fixed an issue with the effective DMG range of Resonator Brant's Resonance Skill "Returned from Ashes."

  • Fixed an issue with Resonator Brant's movements while casting Resonance Skill "Returned from Ashes."

  • Fixed an issue with some of Resonator Phoebe's Idle Animations in Camera mode.

  • Fixed an issue where the Greeting voiceline was missing from Resonator Phoebe's "Information - Voice" page.

  • Fixed an issue with the shadow of Resonator Phoebe's character model under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed a clipping issue that affected Resonator Roccia's outfit when she made certain motions.

  • Fixed an issue where the color at the edge of Resonator Carlotta's character model might appear abnormal under certain graphics settings.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Carlotta's character model might behave abnormally when Substance was full.

  • Fixed a clipping issue that affected Resonator Carlotta's outfit when she's climbing.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Shorekeeper's Outro Skill failed to take effect correctly in Co-op mode.

  • Fixed an issue where Inklit Spirits, triggered after Resonator Zhezhi casts Resonance Liberation "Living Canvas," appeared abnormal under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where after activating the fifth node of Resonator Jianxin's Resonance Chain "Mirroring Introspection," the buff "Damage from Purification Force Field is increased by 80%" from the fourth node "Multitide Reflection" does not take effect when the Resonator casts Resonance Liberation.

  • Fixed an issue where the coloring at the edge of Resonator Jianxin's character model might appear abnormal.

  • Fixed an issue where the model for Unflickering Valor appeared abnormal when the weapon was equipped on certain Resonators.

  • Fixed an issue where the of DoT from Spectro Frazzle Effect was abnormal under certain circumstances.

**

Enemies & Echoes**

  • Fixed an issue where casting the Echo Skill "Lorelei" in mid-air caused Lorelei to continue falling while the transformation was still in effect.

  • Fixed an issue where a Resonator could not perform Counterattack while using the Echo Skill "Lorelei."

  • Fixed an issue with the model for the Echo "Phantom: Lorelei."

  • Fixed an issue where casting Lumiscale Construct against an Enemy's Special Skill prevented Counter Skill from being triggered.

  • Fixed an issue where certain buffs and debuffs did not take effect for a Resonator who transformed into a Carapace.

  • Fixed an issue where during the fight with Dragon of Dirge, the enemy's movements might become abnormal after casting certain skills.

  • Corrected the discrepancy between the actual DMG dealt by the Echo "Hoochief" and the associated description.

**

Features**

  • Fixed an issue where the Gallery - Sceneries screen flashed on certain mobile devices.

  • Fixed an issue where defeating certain Tacet Discords detected via Echo Hunting did not direct the player to the tracking of a new Tacet Discord.

  • Fixed an issue where using Grapple while floating in water might cause you to sink.

  • Fixed an issue where clicking the "zoom in to my current location" icon in the bottom right corner of the "Map - Switch Map" screen did nothing in certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where zooming in and out of the Map caused certain Markers on the Mini Map to appear abnormal.

  • Fixed an issue where some Rovers were not able to bring up the cursor after a black screen.

  • Fixed an issue where friends added on the PS5 do not appear on the friend list after switching to PC.

**

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events**

  • Fixed an issue in "Old Man and the Whale" where the special effects for "Fast Travel to Dock" might appear defective.

  • Fixed an issue in "Old Man and the Whale" where some of the items displayed on the preview page for the event were incorrect.

  • Fixed an issue where the Dock icon associated with "Old Man and the Whale" might appear on the main screen when not in the Riccioli Islands area.

  • Fixed an issue in Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain where multiple enemies could be summoned under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue in Whimpering Wastes with the attribute damage resistance of the enemies "Violet-Feathered Heron" and "Rocksteady Guardian."

  • Fixed an issue in Whimpering Wastes where dealing DMG to Cuddle Wuddle was impossible within a certain period after the enemy performed a Synergy attack.

  • Fixed an issue in Whimpering Wastes where a new wave of enemies might appear and remain on the scene after the countdown ended.

  • Fixed an issue in Whimpering Wastes where certain enemies had abnormal resistance to interruption.

  • Corrected the discrepancy between the actual effects of Buffs and the associated descriptions for Riccioli Islands Tacet Field challenges.

  • Fixed an issue where Dream Patrol that belongs to a different location was triggered in the "Rinascita - Vault Underground" area.

  • Fixed an issue in "Echo Challenge: Clear Cloud" where transforming into Lottie Lost was impossible under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue in "Echo Challenge: Unfinished Book" where the text for the conversation with the NPC "Fratellino" contained errors.

  • Fixed an issue in "Echo Challenge: Plushie Punch" where exiting the domain was impossible under certain circumstances.

**

Controls**

  • Fixed an issue where using a Controller made content on certain pages incomplete.

  • Fixed an issue where the Echo Recommendation page could not be turned off if a Controller was used under certain Resolution settings.

**

Graphics & Performance**

  • Fixed an issue where the models for certain Map areas and certain Resonators might appear blurry on PC.

  • Fixed an issue where, with the Ray Tracing option turned on, the loading process might crash while trying to log in.

To ensure a smooth performance, if your device has 16 GB of RAM, after turning Ray Tracing on, please restart the game once the shaders have finished compiling. We will make more optimizations in this regard in future versions.

**

Quests**

  • Fixed an issue in Companion Story "Sail Day, Captain!" where certain parts of the background music might be missing.

  • Corrected textual errors in the outline of Side Quest "Dream Patrol II."

  • Fixed an issue in "Amidst the Stars - Record the last location for KU-Cass" where interaction could not be initiated at the task location, preventing quest progression.

  • Fixed an issue in Side Quest "Camp Raid" where the NPCs might not appear, preventing quest progression.

  • Fixed an issue in "Cerulean Echoes Adrift in the Winds: Part I - Clear the corrupted data" where the corrupted data might not appear at the task location, preventing quest progression.

**

Environment**

  • Fixed an issue where certain NPCs in the "Rinascita - Riccioli Islands" area floated in mid-air.

  • Fixed an issue where certain NPCs in Rinascita have abnormal walking routes.

  • Fixed an issue where certain NPC models in the Rinascita - Ragunna area behave abnormally.

  • Fixed an issue where certain visual assets in the "Rinascita - Nimbus Sanctum - Atrium of Reflections" area appeared outside the bounds of the map.

  • Fixed an issue where certain Gondolas in Rinascita might not appear.

  • Fixed an issue with certain objection interactions in the "End of Wandering" domain.

  • Resolved known issues regarding visual asset abnormalities.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Version 2.2 Update Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.2: Tangled Truth in Inverted Tower.

During the maintenance, you will not be able to log in to the game. Please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Maintenance Time & Compensation Details

  • Maintenance Time: 2025-03-27 04:00 - 2025-03-27 11:00 (UTC+8)

  • Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-03-27 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

How to Update

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

  • PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."

  • Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.

  • iOS: Download/update the game in the App Store.

  • Mac: Download/update the game in the App Store.

  • PS5™: Open the home screen > Select Wuthering Waves > Press the OPTIONS button to Check for Update

Pre-download on PC Launcher

The latest version of the official PC launcher for Wuthering Waves, Version 2.0.0, is now available. It introduces the following new features:

  1. Incremental content updates

  2. Brand new user interface

  3. Optimized resource usage

  4. Access to new functionalities

You can update the game to Version 2.2 "Tangled Truth in Inverted Tower" by means of an incremental content update. This will significantly reduce the size of game resources that need downloading. To make use of this new feature, update the Wuthering Waves launcher on your PC to Version 2.0.0 first. In addition, we will continue to optimize the game's resource storage associated with version updates, so that resources that need downloading can be further reduced in size for future version updates.

  • PC Pre-download Start Time: 2025-03-25 09:30 (UTC+8)

  • Pre-download Size: 30.8 GB

With the pre-download feature enabled, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the resources for the latest version. You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing. The process can be paused at any time. Whether pre-downloading finishes or not, initiating it will speed up the update process to a certain degree.

Version 2.2 Preview

  • New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Cantarella (Havoc/Rectifier)

Obtainable through the [Neptune's Lullaby] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Rover - Aero (Aero/Sword)

Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" to unlock.

  • New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Whispers of Sirens (Rectifier)

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Whispers of Sirens] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Bloodpact's Pledge (Sword)

Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" to obtain.

  • New Regions

Avinoleum, Beohr Waters

[Avinoleum] New Way of Exploration

[Gravity Calibrator] Gravity Adjustment

In Avinoleum, interact with Gravity Calibrators to change the direction of gravity in your surroundings and travel to more areas open to exploration.

[Companion] Shared Adventure

For certain tasks in Avinoleum, you and a Companion Resonator can work together to complete them.

  • New Echoes

Reminiscence: Fleurdelys, Capitaneus, La Guardia, Sagittario, Sacerdos, Glacio Drake, Electro Drake, Aero Drake, Nightmare: Lampylumen Myriad

New Sonata Set: Gusts of Welkin

Gusts of Welkin (2pcs Set): Aero DMG +10%

Gusts of Welkin (5pcs Set): Inflicting Aero Erosion on enemies increases Aero DMG for all Resonators in the team by 15%, and for the Resonator triggering this effect by an additional 15%, lasting for 20s.

  • New Stories

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier"

[Cantarella's Companion Quest] A Fleeting Night's Dream

[Exploration Quest] Should the Shooting Stars Blaze

  • New Events & Gameplay Features

Special Events

[Avinoleum] Area Events: [Winds of the Past] Area Exploration Event, [Avinoleum Travel Atlas] Featured Exploration Event, [Acropolis Documentarian] Photo Collection Event

[Virtual Crisis: Prototype Trials] Crisis Trial Challenge Event

[If You Gaze Into the Abyss of Dreams] Featured Co-op Combat Event

[Lollo Campaign: Set Sail] Featured Commission Event

[Ragunna Weather Forecast] Featured Platforming Event

[Wuthering Exploration] Featured Exploration Event in Whisperwind Haven

[Gifts of the Still Tides] 7-Day Login Event

  • Other New Content

New "Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain" Challenge: Dragon of Dirge

[Titles] Meet specific requirements to obtain honorary Titles

[Phantom Echo] Phantom: Capitaneus

For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 2.2: Tangled Truth in Inverted Tower, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.

Device Requirements

To ensure a smooth experience, please refer to the following requirements:

  1. Minimum

Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 835, MediaTek G71/72 or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more

iOS: [System] iOS 14 or later; [Model] iPhone 11 or newer, iPad with A13 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more

entry.title: Patch Notes for Version 2.1: Waves Sing, and the Cerulean Bird Calls
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

Thank you for your continued support. We are excited to announce that Version 2.1: Waves Sing, and the Cerulean Bird Calls will become available soon!

Maintenance Time & Compensation Details

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-02-13 04:00 - 2025-02-13 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-02-13 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-02-13 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

[Version Update Details]

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Phoebe (Spectro)

Phoebe, Acolyte of the Order of the Deep, is a young woman of quiet devotion. With a kind heart, she fulfills her duties with unwavering diligence. Her prayers, like the light she carries, offer comfort and peace to all.

  • Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Concerto Efficiency, Spectro Frazzle

Obtainable through the [With Hushed Whispers] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Brant (Fusion)

Brant, the captain of Rinascita's Troupe of Fools, is a free spirit and romantic. Unpredictable and full of life, he is the beating heart of the troupe.

On stage, he slips into countless roles, donning new masks to breathe life into every story. Yet beyond the spotlight, he is unwaveringly genuine, offering nothing but true sincerity to those around him.

  • Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Basic Attack DMG, Fusion DMG Amplification, Resonance Skill DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Blaze Across the Deep] Featured Resonator Convene.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Luminous Hymn (Rectifier)

"The Sentinel's grace, how sweet thou art. Our home was lost, but found at last. With twigs between my beaks, I brave the waves. Bound by love, we're crowned with holy light."

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Luminous Hymn] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Unflickering Valor (Sword)

Blistering winds and crashing waves, the sea devours all. Only a lonely boat lamp stands alight!

Onwards! Towards the edge of the world you shall sail!

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Unflickering Valor] Featured Weapon Convene.

4-Star Weapon: Ocean's Gift (Rectifier)

To fishers, the sea is their field of harvest. Harvest means hope.

Participate in "Old Man and the Whale: Fishing Adventure Event" to obtain the weapon and items for increasing its Syntonization Rank for free.

New Regions

[Vault Underground]

Located on the underground level of Averardo Bank, this vault is the beating heart of the Montelli family's wealth, where the highest concentration of riches in Ragunna can be found.

Aside from conventional collectibles, it boasts a huge collection of Echoes. It's rumored that in its bowels lies a secret cache that the Montellis hold dear.

Accessible by elevator during Exploration Quest "Silent As a Falling Leaf."

[Riccioli Islands]

A cluster of islands off the shores of Rinascita, surprisingly tranquil amid turbulent waters. These remote islands are largely deserted, visited only by fishers out at sea and those who stumble on them by chance.

Accessible during Tutorial Quest "Set Sail! Pro Angler!"

New Stories

[Exploration Quest] Silent as a Falling Leaf

You receive two letters, one from the Montelli family and the other from the Order, asking you to bear witness to the formation of their good relations and assist in escorting the Order's collection to the Montelli family's vault.

What secrets will be uncovered in the Averardo Vault, where a secret cache is said to be kept?

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.1 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act III "What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing."

[Brant's Companion Story] Sail Day, Captain!

What would the Captain of the Fool's Troupe normally do? Impromptu performance? A great adventure? Why not hear it straight from Brant himself? A captivating journey surely awaits!

  • Duration: Permanently available after 2025-03-06 10:00 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Reach Union Level 20 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Act III "What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing."

New Echoes

Rage Against the Statue, Golden Junrock, Calcified Junrock, Aero Prism, Hurriclaw

New Events & Gameplay Features

New Events:

[Old Man and the Whale] Fishing Adventure Event

During the event, join Phoebe on a captivating voyage in the Riccioli Islands. Steer the Gondola "Rachel" and fish for unique, local species to boost your Fame and become a true fishing master!

  • Duration: Version 2.1 update - 2025-03-26 03:59 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Reach Union Level 14 and complete Main Quest "Through the Sea Thou Break" (complete the quest "Silent as a Falling Leaf" first for a better experience).

When the Limited-time Event period ends, Limited-time Event rewards will no longer be available, but the event will become a Permanent Event, allowing you to participate at any time and win Permanent Event rewards.

[Gifts of Blue Water] 7-Day Login Event

During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.

  • Rewards: Radiant Tide x5, Lustrous Tide x5

  • Duration: Version 2.1 update - 2025-03-26 03:59 (server time)

[Apex Ragunna] Featured Co-op Overdash Event

During the event, you can invite other players to join the Overdash Challenge in Co-op Mode. The first to finish is the winner.

  • Duration: 2025-02-20 10:00 - 2025-03-10 03:59 (server time)

[Tactical Simulacra Ⅲ] Featured Combat Event

In Tactical Simulacra Ⅲ, challenge waves of powerful enemies by using special buffs across different simulation domains.

  • Duration: 2025-02-27 10:00 - 2025-03-13 03:59 (server time)

[Infinite Battle Simulation Ⅱ] Featured Arena Combat Event

In the Infinite Battle Simulation, defeat enemies and open supply chests to earn Tactic Points and Low-Capacity Variables.

  • Duration: 2025-03-06 10:00 - 2025-03-27 03:59 (server time)

[Beyond the Waves] Featured Exploration Event

Participate and upload your exploration record at the Lollo courier truck to get various rewards!

  • Duration: 2025-03-13 04:00 - 2025-03-27 03:59 (server time)

New Gameplay Features:

[Whimpering Wastes] New Permanent Challenge Gameplay

Born of evil tides, swarms of Tacet Discords weave a deadly web, luring every passing soul... Once again, it falls to you to cleanse these treacherous waters.

  • Availability: After the Version 2.1 update

  • Eligibility: Reach Union Level 30 and complete Tutorial Quest "Ocean Is a Soul's Rest."

[Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways] New Weekly Combat Gameplay

A familiar gateway emerges in the land of Rinascita, connecting to a realm known as the Somnoire. Past memories lie buried deep within dreams, and the key to exploration is in your hands. Please do not forget, only within dreams will the answers be revealed.

  • Availability: From 2025-02-17 04:00 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Reach Union Level 30 and unlock the Resonance Nexus in Ragunna City during Main Quest "The Sacred Breeze So Often Breathes."

Others

  • New "Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain" Challenge: Hecate

  • New Weapon Projection: Projection - Ocean's Gift

  • New Phantom Echo: Phantom - Lorelei

Participate in "Old Man and the Whale" to obtain Weapon Projection "Projection - Ocean's Gift" and Phantom Echo "Phantom - Lorelei" for free.

[Adjustments and Optimizations]

Resonators & Weapons

  • Added the On/Off option for injury effects, accessible via Settings > Graphics > Custom.

Features

Echoes:

New Feature: Echo Suggestion

  • Access the Echo Suggestion feature through the character’s Echo Assembly interface to view recommended Echoes for the current character.

  • If multiple Sonata Effects are recommended, the usage percentage for each Resonance effect will be displayed separately.

  • From the Echo Suggestion interface, you can navigate to the Sonata Gallery to view more detailed information about Echo sets.

New Feature: Mainstat & Substat Filtering

  • In the Echo Equipment details interface, you can now filter combinations of Mainstat and Substat attributes based on your needs.

New Feature: Echo Preset

  • Access the Echo Preset feature by clicking the Echo Preset icon in the bottom-right corner of the character’s Echo Assembly interface.

  • Select the Current Setup column and use Save As Preset to save the equipped Echo lineup for the Resonator. After entering a preset name, it will be saved as an Echo Preset. Select any saved preset and use Apply to equip it to the current Resonator.

  • Expand the attribute comparison interface to directly compare the differences between the Current Setup and other Echo Presets.

  • Up to 20 Echo Preset configurations can be saved.

  • Increased the storage limit for Backpack - Echoes to 3,000.

Camera Mode:

New Feature: Filter

  • In Camera mode, apply a filter (e.g. Vivid, Dystopian, Film, Noir) to your photos.

  • You can also adjust the intensity of said filters.

New Feature: Idel Animation Poses

-New poses are added for certain Resonators to offer you more options when taking photos.

More posing styles will be made available in future versions. Please stay tuned.

  • Enhanced the image quality and adjusted the image dimensions in Camera mode.

  • Optimized the usability of the "Camera Position" function. Use it to move the camera up, down, left, or right for optimal angles.

  • Optimized the "Reset" function. Use it to restore the camera to its initial state.

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

  • Added prompts to indicate when certain gameplay features are unavailable.

  • When you are in the middle of completing a quest or engaging with a gameplay feature, other features or challenges may become temporarily unavailable. You can check the Map to see if a specific feature or challenge is available by looking at the corresponding icon.

  • Adjusted the accessibility of certain gameplay features in the Rinascita - Fagaceae Peninsula area.

  • After the Version 2.1 update, you will no longer be able to access the "Dream Patrol: Knight in a Storm" and "Nightmare: Tempest Mephis" challenges in this area during the Exploration Quest "Where Wind Returns to Celestial Realms." These challenges will become available again once you complete the Exploration Quest.

  • Adjusted the accessibility of Utility in certain Tacet Fields.

  • Utility: Flight will be unavailable during Tacet Field challenges in Rinascita after the Version 2.1 update.

  • Optimized the visuals when entering a Fagaceae Peninsula or Penitent's End Tacet Field.

  • Optimized the visuals on Mobile when using Utility: Flight.

  • Optimized the description for Echo Challenge: Flight.

  • Optimized the overall gameplay experience during the quest "Echo Challenge: Illusion - Fly alongside Lorelei."

  • Adjusted the conditions for triggering the Trophy "The Sea of Flowers Needs a Shore." In Co-op mode, only the host (1P Rover) can trigger this Trophy after the Version 2.1 update.

Controls

  • Adjusted the cursor speed in Controller mode under different frame rates.

UI

  • Adjusted the layout of the Quests menu.

Graphics & Performance

  • Added the [120fps] option for devices equipped with specific graphics cards. Users with NVIDIA RTX 50 Series graphics cards can enable this option via Settings > Graphics > Frame Rate.

  • Added Ray Tracing for devices with NVIDIA RTX 40 Series graphics cards. Choose "Low," "Medium," or "High" in Settings > Graphics > Ray Tracing, or select specific effects like "Ray-Traced Reflections" or "Ray-Traced Global Illumination."

  • Added DLSS Frame Generation for devices with NVIDIA RTX 40 Series graphics cards. Access this feature via Settings > Graphics > Advanced > Frame Generation. Enable this option to generate additional frames.

After enabling Frame Generation, ensure that the "Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling" option is enabled in "Settings > System > Display > Graphics Settings" on Windows before rebooting your PC. If you encounter performance issues such as FPS drops or stuttering, verify that the "Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling" option is enabled. If the issue persists, contact Customer Support for assistance.

  • Upgraded NVIDIA DLSS to Version 3.7, offering improved Super Resolution and Frame Generation effects when enabled. The "Settings > Graphics > Super Resolution" option has been reset to "Auto."

The development team is committed to ongoing optimization efforts to expand support for these features to additional graphics cards (including other NVIDIA RTX Series and AMD models). Please stay tuned for official announcements regarding the availability of these features for other graphics cards.

Others

  • Adjusted the maximum amount of Monnaie that can be stored in a single slot in the Valuables menu.

  • Optimized the display of the names of certain NPCs.

  • Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.

[Bug Fixes]

Resonators & Weapons

  • Fixed an issue that might prevent Death Knell from being cast after Resonator Carlotta cast Resonance Liberation "Era of New Wave."

  • Fixed an issue in Ideal Animation where certain movements of Resonator Carlotta's character model appeared defective.

  • Fixed an issue where the crystallization visual effect on Resonator Carlotta's hair sometimes failed to disappear when Twilight Tango ended.

  • Fixed an issue that might cause Carlotta and Roccia's character models to behave abnormally when they entered the scene.

  • Fixed the discrepancy between the actual duration of Execution Mode, triggered when Resonator Yinlin casts Resonance Skill "Magnetic Roar," and the length of time specified in the skill description.

  • Fixed an issue that caused the strings connecting Resonator Yinlin and her puppet Zapstring to disappear when the Resonator cast a skill under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue in Controller mode where Resonators Jiyan, Jianxin, Camellya, Roccia, Sanhua, and Youhu performed multiple Heavy Attacks when the Heavy Attack button combination was pressed.

  • Fixed an issue that might prevent the effects of Counterattack from being triggered in combat or cause the visual effects to appear defective.

  • Fixed an issue where switching Resonators might cause the incoming Resonator's character model to behave abnormally.

Echoes & Enemies

  • Fixed an issue where the Echo Dragon of Dirge's Echo Skill effective range was abnormal.

  • Fixed an issue that prevented players from being launched into the air as a Hoartoise after transforming into one through Echo Skill.

  • Fixed an issue where enemies near certain bodies of water became abnormally difficult to target or could wade deeper into the water.

  • Fixed an issue where the visual effects for certain skills of the enemy Chest Mimic appeared defective.

  • Fixed an issue where certain enemy models in the Rinascita - Fagaceae Peninsula area behaved abnormally while in motion.

Features

  • Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where P2 or P3 player's character might become invisible.

  • Fixed an issue in Controller mode where certain button combinations sometimes failed to function.

  • Fixed an issue where using Switch Appearance for the first time caused Rover's Ascension voicelines to be marked as locked.

  • Fixed an issue in Huanglong's Tactical Hologram where the Trial Store appeared when you tried to visit the Points Shop.

  • Fixed an issue where the icons corresponding to certain collectible items in Rinascita did not appear as expected.

  • Fixed an issue where certain tasks or challenges were not marked as completed on the Mini Map upon their completion.

  • Corrected textual errors in the descriptions of the items "Molded Echo- Crimson Curtain Call I" and "Molded Echo- Crimson Curtain Call II."

  • Fixed an issue where the loading screen abnormally appeared and the loading process could not be completed.

  • Fixed an issue where the momentary black-screen effect did not cover the entire screen on certain devices when exiting the Map.

  • Fixed an issue where the character models might behave abnormally when using Camera to take photos.

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

  • Fixed an issue in Echo Challenge: Clear Cloud where the Supply Chests in certain Rinascita - Nimbus Sanctum areas could be obtained even when the Nightmare Clouds had not been completely absorbed.

  • Fixed an issue in Echo Challenge: Clear Cloud that might cause the visual effects for Nightmare Cloud to appear defective.

  • Fixed an issue in Echo Challenge: Unfinished Book where, in certain Rinascita - Nimbus Sanctum areas, transformations into Lottie Lost became ineffective under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where a Points Circle appeared at the location of Echo Challenge: Flight III even when this challenge had not yet been activated.

  • Fixed an issue in Tactical Hologram: Vitreum Dancer where activating Camera might cause glitches in the gameplay.

  • Fixed an issue in Difficulty VI of Tactical Hologram: Mourning Aix where certain debuffs to the enemy Mourning Aix did not take effect.

  • Fixed an issue that might cause a Resonator's character model to behave abnormally upon landing after using Flight.

  • Fixed an issue in Dream Patrol: Lord of the Windmill where the model for the enemy "Chop Chop" appeared defective.

  • Fixed an issue in Dream Patrol: Plushies' Parade where the Plushie Squad might not be able to separate after coming together to perform an attack.

  • Fixed an issue in certain events or challenges where visual cues did not disappear after the Resonator moved outside the effective area.

  • Fixed an issue where the Somnium Labyrinth Limited-time Event rewards were abnormally obtained under certain circumstances.

Quests

  • Fixed an issue in Companion Story "Forking Paths Among the Stars" where Resonator Camellya's character model might behave abnormally in certain cutscenes.

  • Fixed an issue in "Shape-shift into Inferno Rider" during Exploration Quest "We Promise, We Deliver" where jumping over the gap in the broken bridge might not be possible, preventing quest progression.

  • Fixed an issue where multiple Bells of Resonance were obtained upon completion of Side Quest "Restore Plushie Village."

  • Fixed an issue in Side Quest "Restore Plushie Village II" where the apprentice (NPC) became invisible under certain Graphics settings.

Environment

  • Fixed an issue where the same NPCs appeared in different settings.

  • Fixed an issue where certain NPC models behaved abnormally.

  • Resolved known instances of objects or NPCs floating in mid-air.

  • Fixed an issue that caused a character model, while in a sitting position, to overlap an NPC model.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Version 2.1 Update Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.1: Waves Sing, and the Cerulean Bird Calls.

During the maintenance, you will not be able to log in to the game. Please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-02-13 04:00 - 2025-02-13 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-02-13 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

[How to Update]

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

✦PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."

✦Android: Launch the game then follow the instructions in the update pop-up window.

✦iOS: Update the game in the App Store.

✦PS5™: Open the home screen > Select Wuthering Waves > Press the OPTIONS button to Check for Update

[PC Pre-download]

✦PC Pre-download Start Time: 2025-02-11 09:30 (UTC+8)

With the pre-download feature enabled, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the Launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the material for the latest version. You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing. The process can be paused at any time. Whether it is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.

The pre-download package is about 45 GB in size. To ensure smoother decompressing and installing processes, it is recommended that you have at least 60 GB of spare storage space on your PC.

entry.title: How to Use Wuwa Bot?
entry.content:
1. Account Binding

Before using Wuwa Bot, you must link your account to the server. Use the command /bind to initiate account linking and click the provided link to access the account linking interface and complete the login process:

a) Log in to KURO GAMES Passport

b) Log in to Discord

Once logged in, the page will detect your status. Click the "Link Account" button to complete the process.

2. Start Using Wuwa Bot

Wuwa Bot offers 7 commands. After successfully linking your account with the /bind command, you can access various features.

/welcome:

Welcome players to start using Wuwa Bot, where you can view all available commands and general functional descriptions.

/create:

Create a character profile based on your selected character

/language:

  1. The system language for Wuwa Bot matches your Discord language settings. To change the bot's interaction language, adjust your Discord language settings.

  2. To switch the language for generated character profiles, use the /language command.

/unbind:

Use this command to unlink your account if needed.

/help:

Access a tutorial for using Wuwa Bot, with a link to detailed user guides.

/invite:

Obtain the invitation link for Wuwa Bot and add it to other servers.

If you have any suggestions or encounter issues while using Wuwa Bot, please contact Discord's official customer service or moderators for assistance.

Dear Rover,

V2.0 WUWA Discord Quest Event has begun. Click the link below to complete the quest on Discord and get a chance to win rewards including Astrite!

Event URL: <https://discord.com/quests/1324419049274347561>

Event Duration

January 6th - January 12th 3:59 PM (PT)

Rewards

Shell Credit* 20,000

Advanced Resonance Potion* 3

Advanced Energy Core* 3

Astrite* 30

Please note that the rewards are limited to 300,000 in total and will be given out on a first-come, first-served basis, determined by the time the Redemption Code is claimed after completing the quest. The Redemption Code will expire at 08:00 AM on March 11 (PT). The reward will be limited to one reward redemption per account.

Who is Eligible

Available to players on PC & PS5 where both Discord and Wuthering Waves are available. Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions.

Other Terms

Limit of one reward redemption per account. For more information on Discord Quests, please visit Discord Quest Help Center.

How to Participate

To complete the V2.0 WUWA Discord Quest on PC, players who meet the eligibility criteria must play Wuthering Waves while running the Discord desktop app simultaneously. If players who meet the eligibility criteria decide to complete the Quest on console, the Quest tracking will begin as long as your Discord account is connected via console. For guidance on how to connect and complete the Fortnite Quest on console, you can refer to the following:

  • Discord and PlayStation® Network Connection FAQ

Redemption Instructions

Once you have completed the Quest by playing 15 minutes of Wuthering Waves, you will receive a reward code in Quest Bar or Quest Home. For detailed instructions on how to claim your reward code, please refer to Discord Quests FAQ.

After claiming your reward code, please follow the steps below to redeem it in the game：

  1. Select your server and enter Wuthering Waves, and then go to [Settings] - [Other] - [Redemption Code].

  2. Enter the [Redemption Code] and hit [Confirm] to redeem rewards. You can then claim them in your in-game mail.

  3. The [Redemption Code] function will be unlocked once you've reached Union Level 2.

  4. The Redemption Code obtained in this event will expire on 2025/3/11 at 08:00 (PT). Redemption Codes that expire will be unable to be redeemed.

Discord Quest FAQ

Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can redeem on my Discord account?

A: Eligible users can redeem one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account.

For more information on Discord Quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center.

Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?

A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you are in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.

Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. If you are unable to access the Gift Inventory, you are not eligible for Quests.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests.

A: We encourage you to review Discord’s Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests.

Q: Why am I unable to complete Quest while using Linux?

A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices.

However, Discord team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows or MacOS.

Discord support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.
