entry.title: Version 2.0: All Silent Souls Can Sing Patch Notes
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

Thank you for your continued support. We are excited to announce that Version 2.0: All Silent Souls Can Sing will become available soon!

Maintenance Time & Compensation Details

  • Maintenance Time: 2025-01-02 04:00 to 2025-01-02 11:00 (UTC+8)

  • Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-01-02 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

  • Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-01-02 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

Version 2.0 Preview

New Region

Rinascita

Ragunna, in southern Rinascita, holds the closest bond with their Sentinel Imperator among the nation's many city-states. Most Ragunnesi worship the Sentinel, viewing Common Echoes as divine blessings. Ragunna is also home to the Order of the Deep, widely regarded as the Sentinel's earthly emissaries.

The Black Shores report that the Threnodian in Ragunna remains dormant. In recent years, however, even Sentinel Imperator has fallen silent, no longer speaking directly to the Ragunnesi...

When Version 2.0 goes live, Rovers who reach Union Level 14 and complete Main Quest Chapter I Act III "Ominous Star" can access Main Quest Fast Track "Next Stop: Rinascita" to unlock and participate in Main Quest Chapter II Prologue "Through the Sea Thou Break."

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Carlotta (Glacio)

The second daughter of Montelli and an art investor unbound by convention, Carlotta moves seamlessly through social circles and business transactions while quietly handling the family's unspeakable "troubles" in secret.

The blooming of a "gem," the taking of a life—In her own name, she reshapes reality, giving it a new dimension.

  • Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Resonance Skill DMG

Obtainable through the [When Silence Tolls] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Roccia (Havoc)

Assistant, prop master, and improv comedian, Roccia is always there to make sure the Fool's Troupe is at the ready.

The Magic Box she carries appears to hold the world, or perhaps she had recreated a world inside the box.

  • Combat Roles: Concerto Efficiency, Heavy Attack DMG, Traction, Havoc DMG Amplification, Basic Attack DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Stage in the Box] Featured Resonator Convene.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: The Last Dance (Pistols)

The radiant crystals, ever shattering and reshaping, beckon you into a treacherous dance, a gamble where life is the wager. Cortado, cortado... relentlessly draw each other in until all we can hear are our quivers. When the crimson finale arrives, remember, death comes for all.

Obtainable through the [The Last Dance] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Tragicomedy (Gauntlets)

The joys and sorrows of life dance in an endless circle; pain and tears shift in an instant into a carnival.

Obtainable through the [Tragicomedy] Featured Weapon Convene.

4-Star Weapon: Call of the Abyss (Rectifier)

Held by the keepers of this land, this scepter was once a symbol of dominion over its people and the architectural marvels they achieved. However, it has long lost its luster, and its grandeur blends into the ripples of the pipe organ melodies of Rinascita.

Obtain the weapon and its Crafting Recipe by completing Exploration Quests "Shadow of the Towers: Twilight Rise," "Shadow of the Towers: Resounding Rise," and "Shadow of the Towers: Command Rise."

4-Star Weapon Series (Poetry and Paean): Meditations on Mercy (Broadblade), Fables of Wisdom (Sword), Romance in Farewell (Pistols), Legend of Drunken Hero (Gauntlets), Waltz in Masquerade (Rectifier)

Obtain the weapons' Crafting Recipes while exploring Rinascita.

New Echoes

Hecate, Lorelei, Dragon of Dirge, Sentry Construct, Questless Knight, Diurnus Knight, Nocturnus Knight, Abyssal Gladius, Abyssal Mercator, Abyssal Patricius, Chop Chop, Vitreum Dancer, Cuddle Wuddle, Chop Chop: Leftless, Chop Chop: Rightless, Chop Chop: Headless, Fae Ignis, Nimbus Wraith, Hocus Pocus, Lottie Lost, Diggy Duggy, Frostscourge Stalker, Voltscourge Stalker, Galescourge Stalker, Chest Mimic, Nightmare: Feilian Beringal, Nightmare: Impermanence Heron, Nightmare: Thundering Mephis, Nightmare: Tempest Mephis, Nightmare: Crownless, Nightmare: Inferno Rider, Nightmare: Mourning Aix

New Stories

Main Quest Chapter II: Even When Divinity Remains Silent.

As you looked into the repaired Tethys System for ways to solve Abby's bodily issues, you stumbled upon a Beacon you had set for yourself. Your past self pointed you in the direction of the distant land across the sea.

Time to set forth for Ragunna, Rover. Brave the storms and undercurrents to reach the grand celebration that awaits—and to honor the pact you made long ago.

Main Quest Chapter II Prologue: Through the Sea Thou Break

Main Quest Chapter II Act I: The Sacred Breeze So Often Breathes

Main Quest Chapter II Act II: Veils Off in Sun or Shadow

Main Quest Chapter II Act III: What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing✦Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.0 update

When Version 2.0 goes live, Rovers who reach Union Level 14 and complete Main Quest Chapter I Act III "Ominous Star" can access Main Quest Fast Track "Next Stop: Rinascita" to unlock and participate in Main Quest Chapter II Prologue ""Through the Sea Thou Break."" Chapter II progress is saved separately from Chapter I progress. Taking on Chapter II early does not affect your progress in Chapter I.

We recommend completing Chapter I Act VIII "To the Shore's End" before starting Chapter II for optimal experience.

Carlotta's Companion Story: If On a Rainy Night a Family

The bitter night lingers for the restless. An invitation from the Montelli family pulls you into its past, where new and old, balance and change collide. In the freest place of Ragunna, the host of the invitation awaits your arrival.

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.0 update

  • Eligibility: Reach Union Level 20 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Act III "What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing."

Roccia's Companion Story: Starry is the Night

What do the exiled "pilgrims" truly need? Food? Shelter? And perhaps, a ray of starry light, a symbol of hope? Now, with Roccia by your side, the time has come to seek out that light...

  • Duration: Permanently available after 2025-01-23 10:00 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Reach Union Level 20 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Act III "What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing."

New Events

[Rinascita] Regional Events

Participate in Tales of the Isles: Area Exploration Event, where you collect Stamps to increase Event Level, earning rewards and unlocking Amidst the Sea of Clouds.

Participate in Traces of Tides: Photo Collection Event, where you explore Rinascita and capture beautiful moments.

  • Duration: Version 2.0 update - 2025-02-12 03:59 (server time)

[Gifts of Joyous Tunes] 7-Day Login Event

During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.

  • Rewards: Radiant Tide x5, Lustrous Tide x5

  • Duration: Version 2.0 update - 2025-02-12 03:59 (server time)

[Dances For Spring's Return] Companion Invitation Login Event

During the event, you can invite one Companion to join you in the event every day. After the invitation, you can claim the corresponding rewards on the event page. Complete all invitations to claim Sanhua's exclusive Outfit, "Exorcistic Adjuration."

  • Rewards: Exorcistic Adjuration x1, Crystal Solvent x10, Premium Sealed Tube x30, Premium Tuner x100, Premium Resonance Potion x10, Premium Energy Core x10

  • Duration: 2025-01-23 10:00 - 2025-02-13 03:59 (server time)

[Celebration Aftertunes] Gratitude for Companionship

Food, drink, songs, and laughter—amid the season of revelry, we keep the festivities alive without pause. How do you like your time in Rinascita, Rover?

Aftertunes of the celebration still linger, and now, a couple of friends are preparing to send you their heartfelt wishes and gifts...

  • Rewards: Astrite x1600

  • Duration: 2025-01-29 00:00 - 2025-02-13 03:59 (UTC+8)

[Although Colors Have No Form] Featured Co-op Combat Event

Claudia asks you to investigate the world within the painting and gives you a protective talisman. Within the painted world, the talisman transforms into various Echoes to assist you.

  • Duration: 2025-01-09 10:00 - 2025-01-30 03:59 (server time)

[Wuthering Exploration] Featured Exploration Event: Nimbus Sanctum

Complete daily Survey Tasks to obtain Survey Points, which can be exchanged for various rewards.

  • Duration: 2025-01-16 10:00 - 2025-01-30 03:59 (server Time)

[John Wicktorio: No Debts for Old Men] Featured Combat Event

During the event, you will enter a special sphere to battle waves of enemies within a set time limit, with the aid of unique buffs.

  • Duration: 2025-01-23 10:00 - 2025-02-09 03:59 (server time)

[Lollo Campaign: Comeback] Featured Commission Event

Complete Lollo Campaigns to obtain Lollo Stamps, each of which can be exchanged for a special delivery from Lollo Helper, granting you one spin on the wheel lottery.

  • Duration: 2025-01-30 10:00 - 2025-02-13 03:59 (server time)

[Pincer Maneuver Warriors] Recurring Combat Event

Challenge waves of powerful enemies by controlling two teams with special buffs across two separate simulated battlefields.

Duration

Pincer Maneuver Warriors Ⅲ: Version 2.0 update - 2025-01-23 09:59 (server time)

Pincer Maneuver Warriors Ⅳ: 2025-01-23 10:00 - 2025-02-12 11:59 (server time)

Other New Content

  • New Tactical Hologram Challenges: Tactical Hologram - Phantom Pain

  • New Gameplay Feature: Amidst the Sea of Clouds

  • New Phantom Echoes: Phantom - Sentry Construct, Phantom - Questless Knight, Phantom - Vitreum Dancer

  • New Feature: Outfits (New Outfits: Exorcistic Adjuration, Peach Blossom)

Participate in Glamour Couture to try out Jinhsi's Outfit "Peach Blossom."

Participate in Dances For Spring's Return: Companion Invitation Login Event to claim Sanhua's Signature Outfit "Exorcistic Adjuration" for free.

Adjustments and Optimizations

Resonators and Weapons

Outfits:

New Feature - Resonator Outfits

  • Give the current Resonator a new look by switching to a new Outfit.

  • Switching between Outfits does not change the Resonator's stats.

  • After switching to a new Outfit, you can equip the Resonator with the Weapon Projection associated with the Outfit.

[Injured] Visual Effects:

Added [Injured] Visual Effects

  • When Resonators have been in combat for over 20 seconds and have taken more than 7 hits, taking another hit triggers the [Injured] visual effects.

  • To remove the [Injured] visual effects, use Fast Travel or switch the current Resonator off the field and stay out of combat for 20 seconds.

Please note that in Version 2.0, the [Injured] visual effects are not available for Resonators who engage in combat wearing Outfits other than their original ones. We expect to include [Injured] visual effects for Resonator Outfits in Version 2.1.

Please note that the [Injured] visual effects is enabled by default in Version 2.0. We expect to add a toggle option for this feature in Version 2.1.

Features

Synthesis:

New Feature - Synthesis on the Go

  • Access Synthesis on your Terminal page.

  • Use Synthesis - Purification to quickly synthesize materials of different Rarities; you will have a clear view of the current quantities of the materials.

  • Use Synthesis - Conversion to convert two materials into one new material that is in the same category and of the same Rarity.

Change Appearance:

New Feature - Change Appearance

  • You can switch between the two Rovers via Settings > Other > Player Setting.

  • This feature has a 24-hour cooldown.

Immersion Mode:

New Feature - Immersion Mode

  • Enable Immersion Mode via Settings > Other > HUD Interface. Certain HUD information will be hidden.

  • Disable Immersion Mode with the keyboard shortcut or the icon in the top-left corner of the main screen.

Archive of Melodies:

New Feature - Archive of Melodies

  • Unlock in-game music tracks by delivering Melody Boxes to Aria Mummers.

  • Aria Mummers can play any track you select from your Archive of Melodies.

  • Set a selected track as the background music around Aria Mummer.

Exploration Progress:

Optimized Exploration Progress

  • Increase Exploration Progress in each region to unlock rewards.

  • Reach the required Exploration Progress percentage in a region to obtain an Exploration Report.

  • Track Quest, Challenge, or Item Collection progress for each region.

Leveling

Limited-Time Early Access to Challenges:

Opened limited-time early access to challenges that drop desired materials

  • Gain early access to and participate in certain Weekly Challenges and Boss Challenges to obtain materials for Resonator Ascension.

  • The Weekly Challenges and Boss Challenges open for early access are subject to which Resonators feature in the current Featured Resonator Convenes.

This feature is designed for your convenience. Please note that using this feature may result in spoilers.

Data Bank:

Raised the level cap of the Data Bank to Lv.24.

When your Data Bank reaches Lv.21, the drop rate of 5-Star Echoes increases to 100%.

Daily Activity:

  • Added a new Activity Points task - Login.

  • Adjusted the list of Activity Points tasks (deletions and additions were made).

Challenges, Puzzles, & Events

  • Adjusted the rules under which red dots appear regarding Somnium Labyrinth: Somnoire Adventure Event.

Controls

  • Added keyboard shortcuts for Discarding or Locking a selected Echo in Keyboard & Mouse mode.

  • Added Synthesis to the Quick Access Wheel menu.

  • Added keyboard shortcuts for Discarding or Locking a selected Echo in Controller mode.

  • Optimized the display of the icons in the top right corner of the main interface in Controller mode.

  • Added a feature in Controller mode that allows you to bring up information about the location being tracked by pressing down the left joystick with the Map page displayed.

  • Optimized the controller vibration when using DualShock®4, DualSense®, and DualSense Edge™ to play the PC version of the game.

UI

  • Optimized the layout and interactivity of the Map interface.

  • Optimized the display of the Login screen.

  • Optimized the display of the Activity screen.

Graphics & Performance

  • Added real-time volumetric clouds, making the clouds in the new region, Rinascita, look more realistic.

  • Added dynamic color adjustments, lending vibrant colors to the vegetation in Rinascita.

  • Added special visual effects to better present polar-day and polar-night phenomena, in order to create an atmosphere or a mood suitable for a specific scene.

  • Optimized the visual effects and interactivity of certain water surfaces and beaches.

  • Optimized CPU usage for NPCs, allowing more NPCs to appear on the screen at the same time; your device will perform more smoothly when displaying the same number of NPCs.

  • Optimized the lighting effects on Mobile when the graphic quality is set to "Ultra Performance" or "Performance."

Others

  • Added the option to filter Echoes by Resonance Effect. This option is available in all Echo management interfaces.

  • Added Item "Salted Milk Tea Recipe." In Version 2.0, the item can be obtained through exchanges from KU-Money (NPC) in the Black Shores - Black Shores Archipelago area.

  • Adjusted the requirements for obtaining Battle Skills III's ""Deal X DMG with one attack to an enemy"" Trophies. In Version 2.0, you obtain all the Trophies with a required DMG lower than the DMG dealt by a particular attack.

  • Adjusted the background music for the login screen.

  • Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.

Bug Fixes

Resonators & Weapons

  • Fixed an issue where the casting of Resonator Camellya's Resonance Skill "Ephemeral," with her first Sequence Node "Somewhere No One Travelled" activated, sometimes ended prematurely.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Camellya, after exiting Blossom Mode, could not perform Heavy Attack—by holding Basic Attack, after successfully dodging an attack.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonators Camellya and Xiangli Yao sometimes appeared in abnormal locations upon casting their Intro Skills.

  • Corrected textual errors in the description of Resonator Camellya's Cherished Item "A Camellia."

  • Fixed an issue where switching from Resonator Shorekeeper while in Unbound Form to another Resonator sometimes triggered multiple Plunging Attacks from the incoming Resonator.

  • Fixed an issue where an enemy other than the targeted one was attacked when casting the Intro Skill of the Resonators "Zhezhi," "Xiangli Yao," "Shorekeeper," "Camellya," "Youhu," or "Lumi" under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where the "DMG increased by 63%" buff granted by Resonator Xiangli Yao's third Sequence Node ""Ruins of Ancient"" sometimes failed to take effect under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where the casting of Resonator Jinhsi's Outro Skill sometimes failed to take effect in Co-op mode.

  • Fixed an issue where the shadowing projection appeared defective on Mobile when certain skills of Resonator Jinhsi were cast.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Jinhsi's character model behaved abnormally while in Incarnation.

  • Fixed an issue where the "Enemies Near" voiceline was missing from the Information - Voice - Character Voicelines page for the Resonators "Encore" and "Verina."

  • Corrected textual errors on the Information - Backstory pages for the Resonators "Encore" and "Yangyang."

  • Fixed an issue where switching to another Resonator from the Resonators "Chixia," "Mortefi," or "Aalto" while they took aim to perform a Heavy Attack sometimes resulted in the character model not disappearing under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where a Resonator sometimes performed continuous Basic Attacks after entering certain domains with Hoverdroid: Shooter equipped.

  • Fixed an issue in Controller mode where Basic Attacks did not stop even after the player stopped pressing the Basic Attack button.

Enemies & Echoes

  • Fixed an issue where the special effects for certain skills of Glacio Dreadmane appeared defective under certain circumstances.

Features

  • Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where one of the character models sometimes became immobile when switching between Resonators.

  • Fixed an issue where the character model sometimes behaved abnormally while moving around upon exiting Co-op mode.

  • Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where an enemy moved abnormally when attacked by 2P or 3P Rover.

  • Fixed an issue where 2P or 3P Rover could not join Co-op mode.

  • Fixed an issue where opening the Map through the touchpad of a DualSense® or DualSense Edge™ controller sometimes failed to take effect.

  • Fixed an issue where Trophy "Point Zero" and the Trophy series "Defeat ~ with other players in Co-op Mode once" (part of Trophies - Cross-Realm Ties) could not be obtained under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where the Trophies "Starry Hearts" and "Unboxing the Terminal" could not be obtained under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where the automatic exit countdown on the Results screen sped up under certain circumstances.

  • Fixed an issue where certain Quest Items in the Backpack appeared more than once after completing a quest.

  • Fixed an issue where the loading image was displayed incorrectly while entering the domain "the End of Wandering."

  • Fixed an issue where Waypoints could be activated while in elevators located in the Black Shores region.

  • Fixed an issue where opening the Backpack sometimes caused the "The above items have expired" prompt to appear on the screen.

Challenges, Puzzles & Events

  • Fixed an issue where the Area Effect "Resonance Skill Cooldown Reduced by 5s" was applied multiple times when certain Resonators cast their Resonance Liberations in Tower of Adversity - Overdrive Zone - Hazard Tower.

  • Fixed an issue where the background music for Tactical Hologram: Ski challenges in certain locations of the Huanglong -Mt. Firmament area did not disappear after exiting the challenges.

  • Fixed an issue in Pincer Maneuver Warriors where the special effects associated with the exit of the domain sometimes appeared defective.

Quests

  • Corrected textual errors in the Summary for Subtask "Legacy of the Lasting Night" of Main Quest "To the Shore's End."

  • Fixed an issue where certain special effects inside the Error Cell, located in the Tethys' Deep of the Black Shores, did not disappear after completing Main Quest "To the Shore's End."

  • Fixed an issue where NPC models overlapped each other in certain dialogue scenes of Companion Story "Immortal Blaze."

  • Fixed an issue where skill cooldowns sometimes failed to take effect while attacking Mourning Aix: Lamenting Shadow during Exploration Quest "Stygian Lacrimosa."

  • Fixed an issue where a gameplay guide for Tower of Adversity popped up when a Resonator came near the entrance to the Tower even if Tutorial Quest "Alone in the Abyss" had not been completed.

Environment

  • Fixed an issue where some NPC models in certain locations of the Black Shores exhibited abnormal behavior.

  • Fixed an issue where a Resonator appeared floating in mid-air while seated on certain chairs or benches in the Huanglong - Central Plains area.

  • Fixed an issue where a Resonator could enter the interior of a train in certain locations of the Huanglong - Whining Aix's Mire - Waving Battlefield area after restarting the game.

  • Fixed an issue where a Resonator's footprints failed to appear in some locations when they were expected.

  • Fixed an issue where some NPC models' movements appeared defective in certain scenes.

  • Resolved known instances of objects floating in mid-air.

entry.title: FAQ – PlayStation®5
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

We are thrilled to announce that Wuthering Waves will officially launch on PlayStation®5 on January 2, 2025 (UTC+8). To help you seamlessly connect your PlayStation™Network (PSN) account with your Kuro Games account and sync your progress across platforms, we've prepared this guide. Please take a moment to review it to ensure a smooth start to your adventure in Solaris-3.

Cross-Platform Progress Syncing

Q: Will my progress on different servers or platforms be shared under the same Kuro Games account after the PS5™ launch?

A: Your progress will not be shared between different servers (e.g., Asia Server and Europe Server). However, within the same server, progress is synced across multiple platforms (PC, Android, iOS, and PS5™).

If you start your journey on PS5™, you can later switch to PC or mobile platforms by logging in with the same Kuro Games account linked to your PSN account. Your progress will carry over seamlessly. Similarly, if you begin on PC or mobile, you can continue on PS5™ using the same Kuro Games account.

Q: How can I sync my game progress between PS5™, PC, and mobile devices?

A: To enable cross-platform game progress syncing, please link your PSN account to your Kuro Games account. Make sure that the region of your PSN account matches the server where your game character was created.

Example 1: If the account character you wish to transfer progress from belongs to the North America server, you must use a PSN account from the America server to log in and bind it to a Kuro Account email to enable cross-platform progress synchronization.

Example 2: If the account character you wish to transfer progress from belongs to the Asia server, you must use a PSN account from the Japan or Korea servers to log in and bind it to a Kuro Account email to enable cross-platform progress synchronization.

Please note: If you are using a third-party login method such as Google or Facebook, you must first go to Settings > Account Settings > User Center in the game and complete the binding of a Kuro Account email to properly transfer your progress. Please note that verifying the registration email of the third-party login method (e.g., Google or Facebook) you used, without binding a Kuro Account email first, will not allow progress synchronization.

Q: Which servers are available for the PS5™ version of Wuthering Waves?

A: The PS5™ version supports Asia, Southeast Asia, Europe, America, and HMT (Hong Kong, Macau, Taiwan) servers. However, the available server is determined by the region of your PSN account. For example:

A PSN account registered in North America will access the America Server.

A PSN account registered in Hong Kong will access the HMT Server.

For more details on servers or to confirm your PSN account region, consult the table below or contact PlayStation Support.

| | | | | | |

| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |

| Wuthering Waves Game Sever | Asia Server | America Server | Europe Server | SEA Server | HMT Server |

| Region | East Asia | North America, Central America and South America | Europe, Africa and Middle East | South Asia, South East Asia and Oceania | Hongkong, Macau and Taiwan |

| Corresponding Countries/Regions | Japan, Korea | Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Mexico, Nicaragua, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, the United States, Uruguay | Austria, Bahrain, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Kuwait, Lebanon, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Oman, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, Romania, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, Great Britain | Australia, New Zealand, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand | Hongkong, Macau and Taiwan |

In-game Purchase

Q: Can I use items purchased on PC/Android/iOS platforms (Lunites, Lunite Subscription, etc.) on PlayStation® after linking the account?

A: Yes, once your accounts are linked, any items purchased on one platform will be displayed and accessible on all other platforms.

Q: Why hasn't my purchase from the PlayStation™ Store/Web Store been delivered?

A: Items purchased through the PlayStation™Store or Web Store will be processed for delivery after you log into the game. If you're experiencing issues with delivery, please try the following methods:

Method 1: Restart the game and log in again to check if you've received a delivery notification.

Method 2: Check your inventory through "Terminal" > "Backpack" to see if the purchased items are there.

Method 3: Verify that the PSN account you're logged into is the same one used to make the purchase.

If none of these methods resolve the issue, please contact customer support via "Settings" > "Feedback" in-game.

Q: If I create a new game character on PS5™, can I make purchases for this account on PC/mobile?

A: Yes, you can make purchases for your account on PC, mobile, or the official website.

Q: I purchased a PS5™ pre-order bundle. Which game character will receive the items?

A: The pre-order bundle will be delivered to the game character of the Kuro Games account linked to your PS5™ when you first log into the game.

Note: To ensure the correct delivery of your pre-order bundle, please make sure the region of your PSN account matches the region of your Kuro Games account.

The pre-order bundle will be delivered immediately upon your first login.

For information on how to link your Kuro Games account to the correct PSN account server, please refer to the "Account Linking" and "Cross-Platform Progress Syncing" sections.

Account Linking

Q: How do I link my PSN account to my Kuro Games account?

A: You can choose one of the following two methods based on your situation:

Method 1: If you've previously created a Kuro Games account, it's recommended that you log in using your existing account. When you first enter Wuthering Waves on your PS5™, select "Already have an account? Log in" and follow the prompts to link your Kuro Games account with your current PSN account.

Note: For added account security, it's recommended that you set a password for your Kuro Games account in "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center."

Method 2: If you don't have a Kuro Games account, you can create a new one using your current PSN account. When you first enter Wuthering Waves on your PS5™, select "Create a Kuro Games account" to log into the game.

Note: If you choose this method, we recommend linking your email and setting a password in-game in "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" so that you can later access the same account on other platforms.

Q: I've been playing Wuthering Waves on PC/mobile, and have already linked my PSN account to my Kuro Games account. But when I log into the game on PS5™, the progress is still not syncing. Why?

A:

Situation 1: The Kuro Games account linked to your PSN account is different from the one you used on PC/mobile.

After logging in on PS5™, go to "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" and check if the User ID linked to your PSN account matches the one you used on PC/mobile.

If you need to use a different Kuro Games account to log into Wuthering Waves, you can try the following methods:

Method 1: Create a PSN account with a region corresponding to your game character's server and follow the prompts after reopening the game.

Method 2: Use the in-game "Settings" > "Feedback" to request account unlinking support.

Please note: After unlinking your account, some PlayStation Store bundles with purchase limit of one may be affected. The in-game item you receive may change if you've already exceeded the purchase limit on your Kuro Games account.

Example: You previously bought [Awakening Bundle] on PSN account A linked to your Kuro Games account, and successfully received the bundle content in game.

After linking your Kuro Games account to a new PSN account B and purchasing the same bundle again, you will not receive the same bundle items in game. Instead, you will receive [Lunites] equivalent to the bundle's value. Thank you for your understanding.

Situation 2: The region of your PSN account doesn't match the server of your game character.

Note: For information on how PSN account regions map to game servers, please refer to the "Cross-Platform Progress Syncing" section.

If this is the case, try the following steps:

  1. Ensure that your Kuro Games account is linked to an email. You can verify this in "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" on PC/mobile.

  2. Contact customer support for account unlinking support.

  3. Create a new PSN account with a region corresponding to your game character's server.

  4. Log in with the new PSN account and follow the prompts to link your Kuro Games account.

Q: How can I continue my progress from PS5™ on PC or mobile?

A: To carry over your game progress from PS5™ to PC or mobile, follow these steps:

  1. Ensure your Kuro Games account is protected by a password. You can do this in "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" on PS5™.

  2. When you open the game on PC or mobile, log in using the email linked to your PSN account and the password you set.

Q: How can I check which Kuro Games account is linked to my PSN account?

A: After logging into the game, you can check the linked Kuro Games account in "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center."

Q: Can I unlink or change the Kuro Games account linked to my PSN account?

A: Yes, you can request to unlink your PSN account through "Settings" > "Feedback" in-game. After unlinking, your game progress under your Kuro Games account will not be lost, but it will no longer be synced with your PSN account. Please note that you can only unlink one PSN account per Kuro Games account, so proceed with caution.

Before unlinking, we recommend linking your email or setting a password via "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" to avoid losing access to your Kuro Games account once your PSN account is unlinked.

Q: Will I lose my game progress if I unlink my PSN account?

A: No, your game progress will not be lost. Unlinking the PSN account only removes the data sharing between the two accounts. You will still be able to use your Kuro Games account on other platforms to access your game progress.

Q: What if the game crashes before the linking window appears when I first log in on PS5™? Can I still link my accounts?

A: Yes, you can restart the game and linking will still be available.

Q: After linking my PSN account, can I log in on other platforms (e.g., PC, Android, iOS) using my PSN account, or use a different method to log in on PS5™?

A: No, currently the PS5™ version of Wuthering Waves only supports logging in with a PSN account that is linked to a Kuro Games account. Other platforms do not support logging in with a PSN account.

Q: Can I link multiple Kuro Games accounts to my PSN account? Or can my Kuro Games account be linked to multiple PSN accounts?

A: No, each PSN account can only be linked to one Kuro Games account. Similarly, each Kuro Games account can only be linked to one PSN account.

Q: How can I check which PSN account is currently linked?

A: You can check the linked PSN account via "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" in-game.

Friends

Q: How many friend lists can I see in the PS5™ version of Wuthering Waves? What's the difference between them?

A: On PS5™, you will see the following two friend lists:

Game Friends: Displays the friends you've added in the game, visible across all platforms.

PlayStation™Network Friends: Shows your PSN friends who have played Wuthering Waves and are on the same server as you, as well as friends who haven't played Wuthering Waves. This list is only visible on PlayStation®5.

Q: How can I see the User ID of a PlayStation™Network friend?

A: You can only view the User ID of a PSN friend if both of you are logged into the PlayStation® platform.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Version 2.0 Update Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.0: All Silent Souls Can Sing.

During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Maintenance Time & Compensation Details

  • Maintenance Time: 2025-01-02 04:00 - 2025-01-02 11:00 (UTC+8)

  • Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-01-02 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

How to Update

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

  • Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.

  • iOS: Update the game in the App Store.

  • PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."

PC Pre-download

  • PC Pre-download Start Time: 2024-12-31 09:30 (UTC+8)

With the pre-download feature enabled, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the Launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the material for the latest version. You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing. The process can be paused at any time. Whether it is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.

The pre-download package is about 45 GB in size. To ensure smoother decompressing and installing processes, it is recommended you have at least 60 GB of spare storage space on your PC.

Version 2.0 Preview

  • New Region

Rinascita

Ragunna, in southern Rinascita, holds the closest bond with their Sentinel Imperator among the nation's many city-states. Most Ragunnesi worship the Sentinel, viewing Common Echoes as divine blessings. Ragunna is also home to the Order of the Deep, widely regarded as the Sentinel's earthly emissaries.

The Black Shores report that the Threnodian in Ragunna remains dormant. In recent years, however, even Sentinel Imperator has fallen silent, no longer speaking directly to the Ragunnesi...

  • New Resonators

5-Star Resonators: Carlotta, Roccia

5-Star Resonator Carlotta can be obtained through the [When Silence Tolls] Featured Resonator Convene. 5-Star Resonator Roccia can be obtained through the [Stage in the Box] Featured Resonator Convene.

  • New Weapons

5-Star Weapons: The Last Dance, Tragicomedy

4-Star Weapon: Call of the Abyss

4-Star Weapon Series (Poetry and Paean): Meditations on Mercy, Fables of Wisdom, Romance in Farewell, Legend of Drunken Hero, Waltz in Masquerade

  • New Echoes

Hecate, Lorelei, Dragon of Dirge, Sentry Construct, Questless Knight, Diurnus Knight, Nocturnus Knight, Abyssal Gladius, Abyssal Mercator, Abyssal Patricius, Chop Chop, Vitreum Dancer, Cuddle Wuddle, Chop Chop: Leftless, Chop Chop: Rightless, Chop Chop: Headless, Fae Ignis, Nimbus Wraith, Hocus Pocus, Lottie Lost, Diggy Duggy, Frostscourge Stalker, Voltscourge Stalker, Galescourge Stalker, Chest Mimic, Nightmare: Feilian Beringal, Nightmare: Impermanence Heron, Nightmare: Thundering Mephis, Nightmare: Tempest Mephis, Nightmare: Crownless, Nightmare: Inferno Rider, Nightmare: Mourning Aix

  • New Events

[Rinascita] Regional Events: Tales of the Isles - Area Exploration Event, Traces of Tides - Photo Collection Event

[Although Colors Have No Form] Featured Co-op Combat Event

[Lollo Campaign: Comeback] Featured Commission Event

[John Wicktorio: No Debts for Old Men] Featured Combat Event

[Pincer Maneuver Warriors] Recurring Combat Event

[Celebration Aftertunes] Gratitude for Companionship

[Dances For Spring's Return] Companion Invitation Login Event

  • New Stories

Main Quest Chapter II: All Silent Souls Can Sing

As you looked into the repaired Tethys System for ways to solve Abby's bodily issues, you stumbled upon a Beacon you had set for yourself. Your past self pointed you in the direction of the distant land across the sea.

Time to set forth, Rover. Brave the storms and undercurrents to reach the grand celebration that awaits—and to honor the ancient pact you made long ago...

Main Quest: Chapter II Prologue - Through the Sea Thou Break

Main Quest: Chapter II Act I - The Sacred Breeze So Often Breathes

Main Quest: Chapter II Act II - Veils Off in Sun or Shadow

Main Quest: Chapter II Act III - What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing

Carlotta's Companion Story: If On a Rainy Night a Family

New Tactical Hologram Challenges: Tactical Hologram - Phantom Pain

New Gameplay: Amidst the Sea of Clouds

New Phantom Echoes: Phantom - Sentry Construct, Phantom - Questless Knight, Phantom - Vitreum Dancer

New Feature: Outfits (New Outfits: Exorcistic Adjuration, Peach Blossom)

Participate in Glamour Couture to try out Jinhsi's Outfit "Peach Blossom."

Participate in Dances For Spring's Return: Companion Invitation Login Event to claim Sanhua's Signature Outfit (Exorcistic Adjuration) for free.

For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 2.0: All Silent Souls Can Sing, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.

entry.title: V1.4 Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.

Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!

Content Requirement

Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.

We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!

How to Submit

Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.

Submission Period

2024/11/14 - 2024/12/26 (PT)

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.

Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

entry.title: Version 1.4: When the Night Knocks Patch Notes
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

Thank you for your continued support. We are excited to announce that Version 1.4: When the Night Knocks will become available soon!

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2024-11-14 04:00 to 2024-11-14 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2024-11-14 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

✦Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2024-11-14 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

[Version Update Details]

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Camellya (Havoc)

A Bloom Bearer of the Black Shores, Camellya is free-spirited and dangerously charming.

She roams Solaris in search of talent, immersing herself in the present and relishing its pleasures, all while remaining true to herself, unburdened by thoughts of the past or future.

  • Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Concerto Efficiency, Basic Attack DMG

Obtainable through the [End of Lost Trail] Featured Resonator Convene.

4-Star Resonator: Lumi (Electro)

Navigator at Lollo Logistics and leader of a transport squad team.

Born in a mountain village in Yuezhou, Lumi's sincere and caring nature brings warmth to everyone around her.

  • Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Basic Attack DMG, Resonance Skill DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [When Thunder Pours] Featured Resonator Convene and the [Celestial Revelation] Featured Resonator Convene. After the event ends, starting from the next version, 4-Star Resonator Lumi will be permanently available in Featured Weapon & Resonator Convene and Standard Weapon & Resonator Convene.

4-Star Resonator Lumi will be simultaneously made available in the Afterglow Coral Store and will be removed at the end of the next version.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Red Spring (Sword)

A camellia bud silently unfurls. As promised, she holds this infinite world in bloom in her palms, where fine crimson vines twine around her fingertips.

The dull ache, like sand scratching against the heart, is proof of your fateful encounter.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Red Spring] Featured Weapon Convene.

4-Star Weapon: Somnoire Anchor (Sword)

An anchor once used by Ivory Gatekeeper to stabilize the Somnoire.

However, it now looks different ever since Ivory Gatekeeper transformed into a white cat...

Participate in Somnium Labyrinth: Somnoire Adventure Event to obtain the weapon for free.

New Story

Camellya's Companion Story: Forking Paths Among the Stars

The flowers in the Black Shores' Greenhouse sway silently. Camellya stands among them, sharing the silence.

The sea of stars holds infinite timelines that intertwine and diverge at each moment. Though there are millions of possibilities, she knows all paths lead to the same destiny.

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 1.4 update.

  • Eligibility: Reach Union Level 14 and complete Main Quest "To the Shore's End" (Chapter I: Act VIII).

New Events

Somnium Labyrinth Somnoire Adventure Event

This event consists of 3 sub-events: Dreamscape Odyssey, Rift Runner, and Nightmare Revisits.

[Dreamscape Odyssey] Join the strange white cat in rescuing your Resonator companions from their Dreamscapes. Together, you will delve deep into the Somnoire to uncover the truth behind the nightmares.

[Rift Runner] Nightmares have torn through the veil of reality, wreaking havoc across the world. It's down to you to restore the crumbling order to the land, with the mystic boon of Illusive Sprint received from the strange white cat.

[Nightmare Revisits] Fight the Black Cat again with Resonators of your choice. Use the power of Dream Link to gain an upper hand!

  • Duration: Version 1.4 update - 2025-01-01 03:59 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Reach Union Level 17

After the Limited-time Event period ends, the event will become a Permanent Event, allowing you to participate at any time.

Depths of Illusive Realm: Phantasm Amass

Step into surreal, ever-shifting dreamscapes, where new maps await exploration and formidable enemies lurk in the shadows, and uncover the secrets that lie within!

The available pool of Resonators now includes: Camellya, Lumi, Shorekeeper, Youhu, Encore, Verina, Calcharo, Lingyang, Mortefi, Zhezhi, Xiangli Yao, Yuanwu, Danjin, Jinhsi, Changli, Jianxin, Sanhua, Rover: Spectro, Jiyan, Yinlin, Yangyang, Chixia, Baizhi, Taoqi.

  • Duration: Version 1.4 update - 2025-01-01 03:59 (server time)

Gifts of Fleeting Dreams: 7-Day Login Event

During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.

  • Rewards: Radiant Tide x5, Lustrous Tide x5

  • Duration: Version 1.4 update - 2025-01-01 03:59 (server time)

Beyond the Waves: Featured Exploration Event

Participate and upload your exploration record at the Lollo courier truck to get various rewards!

  • Duration: 2024-11-21 10:00 - 2024-12-05 03:59 (server time)

Tactical Simulacra II: Featured Combat Event

Challenge waves of powerful enemies by using special buffs across different simulation domains.

  • Duration: 2024-12-19 10:00 - 2025-01-01 03:59 (server time)

Ragunna Sales Blitz! Pioneer Association Event

Alannah will be releasing a new investigation quest each day. Complete the surveys to earn corresponding rewards and have a glimpse into the world of Rinascita!

  • Duration: 2024-12-12 10:00 - 2025-01-01 03:59 (server time)

Pincer Maneuver Warriors: Recurring Combat Event

Challenge waves of powerful enemies by controlling two teams with special buffs across two separate simulated battlefields.

Duration

Pincer Maneuver Warriors Ⅰ: Version 1.4 update - 2024-12-12 09:59 (server time)

Pincer Maneuver Warriors Ⅱ: 2024-12-12 10:00 - 2025-01-01 11:59 (server time)

This is a New Challenge Limited-time Beta event. It will be refined based on your feedback.

Others

  • New Phantom Appearance: Phantom - Inferno Rider

  • New Feature: Weapon Projection

  • New Weapon Projections: Projection: Somnoire Anchor, Projection: Formless Series (Transparent Weapon Projections)

[Adjustments and Optimizations]

Resonators & Weapons

  • Added an "Outline" option to the description pages of a Resonator's skills, allowing you to view a simplified version.

  • Optimized the description of Resonator Yinlin's skills. The damage type associated with Chameleon Cipher and Punishment Mark—both are features of Resonator Yinlin's Forte Circuit—is now specified. This adjustment does not affect the actual effects of her skills.

  • Optimized Resonator Yinlin's certain animations.

  • Optimized the text in the Information - Experience - Character Stories section for certain Resonators.

Features

Weapon:

(New) Weapon Projection

  • Change the appearance of a weapon to a selected Weapon Projection.

  • Equipping a weapon with a Weapon Projection does not change its stats.

  • Turn the equipped weapon completely or partially transparent using a Transparent Weapon Projection.

Participate in Somnium Labyrinth: Somnoire Adventure Event to obtain 4-Star Weapon Projection "Projection: Somnoire Anchor" for free. Participate in Version 1.4's Depths of Illusive Realm to obtain a complete set of Transparent Weapon Projections ("Projection: Formless" series) for free.

Map:

  • Added a feature that allows you to Fast Travel directly to the location of any activated Tacet Suppression or Boss Challenge via the Map.

  • Added a feature that allows you to track the Collection Spots for certain Ingredients and Herbs.

  • Added markers for the Hidden Entrances to certain underground locations in the Tiger's Maw - Mt. Firmament area.

  • Added the option that allows you to view the different Map tiers of certain underground locations in the Tiger's Maw - Mt. Firmament area.

  • Added on-screen icons that facilitate tracking. For example, when you select to track Shifang Pharmacy on the Map, a Shifang Pharmacy icon will appear on the screen, showing the general direction of the location and the distance.

Account:

Added the "Email Linking" option

  • Press the relevant icon on the main menu to visit the web page where you will be instructed to link your account to your Email.

  • After completing the process, return to the game to claim rewards (including Astrite).

Leveling

Echo Upgrade:

Step-by-Step Echo Upgrade

  • Conveniently upgrade an Echo to the exact levels that unlock new substats (5/10/15/20/25) through the Auto-Select Settings.

  • Select one of the two ways to add materials: "Only Echo EXP items" or "Echo EXP items and Echoes."

Challenge Rewards:

Added the "double rewards" option to Forgery, Simulation, or Tacet Suppression challenges.

  • You now have the option to spend double the Waveplates to earn double rewards upon completing a Forgery, Simulation, or Tacet Suppression challenge.

During the events Intensive Training, Bountiful Crescendo, or Chord Cleansing, you spend your Double Drop Attempts first to claim double rewards, and only after all the attempts have been spent do you start spending double the Waveplates to earn double rewards.

Challenges, Puzzles & Events

  • Added new Returnee Quest types to the event Reprise of Tides.

  • Adjusted the placement of enemies in Forgery Challenges and Simulation Challenges, making them stand closer to each other when they first appear.

  • Optimized the gameplay for Side Quest: Cerulean Echoes Adrift in the Winds.

  • Optimized the descriptions of certain Resonators' certain skills on the Resonator Upgrade page in Depths of Illusive Realm.

Controls

  • Added the "Preferences" option to the Settings - Controls page.

  • Adjusted the controller deadzone on iOS devices to make it consistent with those on PC and Android devices.

UI

  • Added a login pop-up displaying the numbers of Waveplates and Waveplate Crystals you own.

  • Added an Echo absorption pop-up. Upon absorption, the Echo's Sonata Effect category will be displayed along with its Mainstat and Substat.

  • Added text corresponding to the Outro Skill icon on the Resonators - Forte page.

  • Optimized the display of Results Screens that appear after challenges are completed, giving you a clearer view of the rewards you've earned.

  • Optimized the interface design regarding the Tower of Adversity, allowing you to view and adjust your team lineup without leaving the Tower.

  • Optimized the display of the RES stats of enemies in the Tower of Adversity, allowing you to view the multiple RES categories an enemy may possess.

  • Adjusted the rules under which red dots appear on the Resonators page.

  • Adjusted the order in which information is presented when the pull-down button for a Resonator's Skill is pressed on the Resonators - Forte page. Skill Detail differences between the current level and the next level now appear first.

  • Optimized the visuals of certain item icons.

  • Optimized the Chat button on Mobile, allowing customization via "Customize Keybinds."

Graphics & Performance

  • Added a feature that makes recommendations regarding Graphics Quality (accessed via Settings > Graphics > Graphics Quality). Recommendations are made based on the performance of your device and come in four options: Ultra Performance, Performance, Balanced, and Quality.

  • Added a process that instructs you to choose an image quality setting when you are creating a character for the first time. This setting can be adjusted afterward via Settings.

  • Added the "Auto FPS" option to the Graphics settings on Mobile.

With this option turned on, if your mobile device is overloaded and overheating, the maximum Frame Rate and maximum Graphics Quality will be lowered automatically to reduce the occurrence of lagging or other possible problems.

  • Optimized the game's performance on certain Android devices.

  • Adjusted the frame rate settings on Android devices. The "45 FPS" option has been changed to "40 FPS." Using the "40 FPS" option effectively reduces the setup load and minimizes the occurrence of overheating.

  • Optimized the in-game resolution settings on PC. Starting from Version 1.4, if an adjustment is made to the resolution settings via Settings > Graphics > Resolution, the latest adjustment will be applied when switching from Full Screen to Windowed Mode.

  • Optimized the shader compilation process on PC. This process no longer occurs immediately after the launching of the game. It now occurs on the title screen to reduce visual glitches, lagging, and other problems that could be caused by the compilation process.

Others

  • Adjusted the positions of certain NPC names on the screen to prevent them from overlapping with the NPCs.

  • Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.

[Bug Fixes]

Resonators & Weapons

  • Fixed an issue where the description of Resonator Yinlin's Inherent Skill "Deadly Focus" did not match its actual effects.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. We are now offering the following item as compensation. Thank you for your understanding and continued support for Wuthering Waves!

  • Compensation: Astrite x80

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2024-11-14 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

  • Fixed an issue where the duration of the special effects for Resonator Shorekeeper's Resonance Liberation "End Loop" sometimes failed to match that of the Skill's actual effects.

  • Fixed an issue where the Terminal on the Resonators - Echo page for Resonator Shorekeeper sometimes appeared defective.

  • Fixed an issue where certain types of attacks from Resonator Xiangli Yao and Resonator Yangyang sometimes failed to trigger the effects of the Stellarealm that appears after Resonator Shorekeeper casts her Resonance Liberation.

  • Fixed an issue where the effects of Resonator Changli's True Sight: Conquest would sometimes become defective.

  • Fixed an issue where the animation for Resonator Changli's Resonance Liberation sometimes appeared defective.

  • Fixed an issue where certain movements of Resonator Jinhsi's in the Incarnation state appeared defective.

  • Fixed an issue where the effects of Resonator Jiyan's Inherent Skill "Tempest Taming" could not be triggered by certain Echo Skills.

  • Fixed an issue where the Healing effect from Remnant Entities would sometimes be applied multiple times after Resonator Baizhi cast her Resonance Liberation.

  • Fixed an issue where, after the Fast Travel option was used, the special effects for a Resonator's skills would sometimes fail to appear, or the effects of these skills would become defective.

  • Fixed an issue where the visuals sometimes appeared defective when a Resonator started moving around after a combat challenge ended.

Enemies & Echoes

  • Fixed an issue where enemies on the second floor of the Echoing Tower in the Tower of Adversity's Overdrive Zone would sometimes remain on the scene after their defeat.

  • Fixed an issue where, in the "Tactical Hologram: Calamity" - "Tempest Mephis" challenge, the enemy's Vibration Strength sometimes failed to recover after it came out of its Immobilized state.

  • Fixed an issue where a Resonator was sometimes unable to exit the transformation after transforming into Thundering Mephis.

Features

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Update Preview | Version 1.4 "When the Night Knocks" to be released on Nov 14th
Wuthering Waves Version 1.4 Update Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 1.4: When the Night Knocks.

During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Maintenance Time & Compensation Details

  • Maintenance Time: 2024-11-14 04:00 to 2024-11-14 11:00 (UTC+8)

  • Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2024-11-14 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

How to Update

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

  • Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.

  • iOS: Update the game in the App Store.

  • PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."

Pre-download on PC

  • Starting Time: 2024-11-12 09:30 (UTC+8)

With the pre-download feature enabled, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the PC launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the material for the latest version. You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing. You can pause the process at any time, and whether it is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.

The pre-download material is approximately 30GB in size. To ensure that the subsequent processes of file decompressing and app installation will go smoothly, it is recommended that your PC has at least 60GB of unused storage space.

Version 1.4 Preview

  • New Resonators: 5-Star Resonator – Camellya, 4-Star Resonator – Lumi

For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 1.4: When the Night Knocks, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Version Preview | Version 1.4 "When the Night Knocks" Coming November 14 (UTC+8)
Wuthering Waves Developer's Message
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

Thank you for your continued support for Wuthering Waves. With Version 1.4: When the Night Knocks just around the corner, it's time for another installment of Wuthering Waves Developer's Message. In this update, we're adding new gameplay elements, an exciting new feature, and optimizations to enhance your experience.

New Gameplay Elements

New Combat Mechanism: Dream Link

Dream Link is a new combat mechanism that will be introduced in the Main Event of Version 1.4. Dream Link enhances the synergy between your Resonators, allowing them to unlock their true potential together. When certain conditions align during combat, Dream Link will activate, dramatically amplifying your team’s combat prowess.

Overdrive Combat: Illusive Sprint

In the Main Event of Version 1.4, you can pick up the white cat's blessings to enter the Illusive Sprint state that increases your moving speed. Lumi, a Resonator who will make her debut in the new version, has a similar ability. When certain requirements are met, instead of dodging, Lumi dashes to get out of harm's way and is capable of attacking enemies while moving at high speed.

These two new gameplay mechanisms will be available in the Main Event of Version 1.4. Once the Main Event concludes, it will be added as a Permanent Event, where the same gameplay mechanisms will still be available.

New Feature

Weapon Cosmetics: Weapon Projection

With Version 1.4, we’re introducing an exciting new customization feature: Weapon Projections. This feature lets you transform the appearance of your weapons without affecting their stats, allowing you to create a look that’s entirely your own.

Participate in the Main Event of Version 1.4 to obtain a free Weapon Projection associated with the event featured 4-Star Sword.

Additionally, we are adding Transparent Weapon Projections, available for all five weapon types. You can use a Transparent Weapon Projection to turn the equipped weapon completely or partially invisible. We hope these new options let you add even more personality to your Resonators’ looks, whether you're exploring or capturing moments in photos.

Participate in Version 1.4's Depths of Illusive Realm to obtain a complete set of Transparent Weapon Projections for free.

Equip a Transparent Weapon Projection to make Rectifiers and Gauntlets completely invisible, or turn Swords, Broadblades, or Pistols partially transparent.

Gaming Experience Optimizations

Leveling-related Optimizations: Double Rewards, Step-by-Step Echo Upgrade

To enhance your long-term gaming experience, Version 1.4 will introduce a series of leveling-related optimizations as part of an ongoing project. In this update, you’ll be able to Fast Travel directly to the location of any Tacet Suppression or Boss challenge via the Map.

Additionally, you’ll have the option to spend double the Waveplates to earn double rewards upon completing a Forgery, Simulation, or Tacet Suppression challenge. We've also improved the display of Results Screens, giving you a clearer view of the rewards you've earned.

Last but not least, in Version 1.4, you can conveniently upgrade an Echo to the exact levels that unlock new substats (5/10/15/20/25) through the Auto-Select Settings. We hope this change can improve your Echo Upgrade experience and efficiency.

Interface-related Optimizations: Waveplate Info Pop-up, Echo Info Pop-up, Tower of Adversity Interface Adjustments

Starting from Version 1.4, whenever you log into the game, you'll receive a pop-up displaying the amount of Waveplates and Waveplate Crystals you own.

The displayed information for a newly absorbed Echo will also be optimized. Upon absorption, the Echo's Sonata Effect category will be displayed along with its Mainstat and Substat.

In the current version, adjusting your team lineup in the Tower of Adversity requires leaving and re-entering, which we know can interrupt your gameplay experience. To improve this, we've optimized the interface in the upcoming version, allowing you to view and adjust your team directly within the Tower.

Apart from the above, more optimizations are in the pipeline, along with more gameplay elements and features. Please stay tuned!

※ All content shared in the preview is still in development and may not represent the final quality. For accurate details, please refer to the official release notice when the content goes live.

entry.title: Developer's Message
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

Since the start of Version 1.1 CBT, our work has been overshadowed by unauthorized content leaks. These leaks have spread fast and wide, including story cutscenes, storyboard drafts, character concept art, and even discarded environment assets. Many of you have expressed frustration at encountering leaked content despite your efforts to avoid it, largely due to platform algorithms. These unverified leaks have dulled the impact of our official version updates and caused major spoilers, undermining the experience we've carefully crafted for you.

Last month, we issued a statement condemning leaks and received widespread support from our community. Thanks to this, many leakers realized the harm they were causing and ceased their activities. Unfortunately, with the launch of the Version 1.4 CBT server, we are once again facing severe leaks of unreleased content.

Developing a new version is meticulous and time-consuming. Character creation, for example, begins several versions ahead with user research, followed by months of design, development, testing, and fine-tuning. Before each update, we conduct a closed beta test to ensure the final product meets player expectations. Promotion only begins when everything is ready, with methodically scheduled moments to provide the best experience. We believe this approach ensures consistent, polished releases, allowing players and content creators to fully engage with each update. Unfortunately, leaks disrupt this process, taking away the element of surprise and undermining the hard work of our team members who put their hearts into every detail.

In response to the damage caused by these leaks, we have implemented stronger measures to prevent future incidents. These measures include reinforcing confidentiality in our test servers, issuing formal warnings, and collaborating with various content-sharing platforms to remove unauthorized material. Additionally, we have initiated legal proceedings against severe breaches of intellectual property, which are currently progressing through the courts. We are committed to defending our work against unauthorized distribution and are prepared to take further legal actions as needed.

Now, with Version 1.4 CBT on track and preparations for official marketing well underway, the team is focused on developing our next major update—a brand-new area that we've been designing based on all the feedback from you since launch. This new area is a true co-creation between us and the player community; in a way, it belongs to all of us. We call on all players to cherish this creative journey together. Please help us protect our hard work by standing against leaks. We will continue gathering evidence against those who steal and distribute our unreleased materials. If you encounter any leaks, we encourage you to report them to us via our dedicated email: legal@kurogames.com.

Once again, we extend our deepest thanks to all of you for your love and support.

Wuthering Waves Dev Team

October 21, 2024

The Shorekeeper, guardian of the Black Shores—this title alone once defined her.
