  • Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Traction, DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Till the Sea Turns Clear] Featured Resonator Convene.

4-Star Resonator: Youhu (Glacio)

A voluble and whimsical antique appraiser.

Known for creating limericks on the spot, she presents her appraisals with flair and precision. She sets up a stall on the street, ensuring antiques find their way to those who truly cherish them.

  • Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Resonance Skill DMG, Vibration Strength Reduction, Coordinated Attack DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Prevail the Lasting Night] Featured Resonator Convene. Starting from Version 1.4, 4-Star Resonator Youhu will be permanently available in Standard Weapon & Character Convene.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Stellar Symphony (Rectifier)

A rectifier bearing an energy core that simulates the lifecycle of stars—an infinite loop that originates from a singularity and ends in explosive demise. The celestial debris collides in thunderous rumbles, heralding the birth of a new star.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Stellar Symphony] Featured Weapon Convene.

4-Star Weapon Series: Deep Sky Blazar—Waning Redshift (Broadblade), Endless Collapse (Sword), Relativistic Jet (Pistols), Celestial Spiral (Gauntlets), Fusion Accretion (Rectifier)

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Stellar Symphony] Featured Weapon Convene and by opening Deep Sky Blazar Weapon Chests in the area exploration event "Where Stars Slumber."

New Echo

Fallacy of No Return (Overlord Class)

The last line of defense built by the Tethys System, patrolling the borders between reality and digital world.

New Stories

Main Quest: To the Shore's End (Chapter I Act VIII)

The Black Shores, an archipelago enshrouded in mysteries and turmoil, remains sealed away from the world in thick digital fog. It remains uncertain when or who will lift its veil, allowing it to once more shoulder the task of connecting the world.

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 1.3 update.

  • Prerequisite: Complete Main Quest: Thaw of Eons (Chapter I Act VII).

Encore's Companion Story: Small Wooly, Big Adventures

Stories are an extension of life, and adventures are the stuff of stories. Encore's adventure is about to begin! As her closest friend, will you join the Wooly Warrior on this exciting journey?

  • Duration: Permanently available after 2024-10-24 10:00 (Server Time)

  • Prerequisite: Reach Union Level 18 and complete Main Quest: Grand Warstorm (Chapter I Act VI)

New Events

Black Shores Events

Participate in Where Stars Slumber (Area Exploration Event) to collect Stardust, which can be exchanged for a Deep Sky Blazar weapon of your choice.

Participate in Amidst the Stars (Photo Collection Event) to explore the Black Shores and capture unforgettable moments.

Duration: After the Version 1.3 update and until 2024-11-13 15:59 (Server Time)

Gifts of Sea Breeze (7-Day Login Event)

During the event, log in to the game and check in on the event page to get rewards for the days you have checked in.

Rewards: Radiant Tide x5, Lustrous Tide x5

Duration: After the Version 1.3 update and until 2024-11-13 03:59 (Server Time)

Infinite Battle Simulation (Featured Arena Combat Event)

Open Supply Chests to gain combat buffs in the simulation. Unlock three Charting Nodes and eliminate enemies to obtain Tactic Points.

  • Duration: 2024-10-24 10:00 to 2024-11-13 03:59 (Server Time)

Solaris Weather Forecasts (Featured Platforming Events)

Utilize the devices along the path and collect as many Surveillance Datasets as possible within time limit.

  • Duration: 2024-10-10 10:00 to 2024-10-31 03:59 (Server Time)

Fairy Tale's Finale (Featured Co-op Combat Event)

Choose "Dorothy's Companions" as Echoes to assist you in battle, which greatly enhances the combat abilities of the Resonators.

Co-op Mode is available throughout the event. You have the option of fighting alongside other Rovers.

  • Duration: 2024-10-01 10:00 to 2024-10-24 03:59 (Server Time)

Lollo Campaign: Rerun (Featured Commission Event)

Complete Lollo Campaigns to obtain Lollo Stamps, which can be exchanged for Lollo Helper special deliveries.

  • Duration: 2024-10-24 10:00 to 2024-11-07 03:59 (Server Time)

Additional Black Shores Special Leveling Event

Parade of Stars (Special Leveling Event)

This event comprises 4 leveling-themed activities: Resonator Leveling, Weapon Leveling, Echo Leveling, and Skill Leveling. Complete each activity to obtain rewards.

  • Rewards: Shell Credit x710,000, Premium Tuner x100, Premium Sealed Tube x50, Premium Resonance Potion x50, Premium Energy Core x34, Forgery Premium Supply x25, Premium Enclosure Tank x28, among other materials.

  • Duration: After the Version 1.3 update and until 2024-11-13 15:59 (Server Time)

Wuthering Exploration (Featured Exploration Event—Mt. Firmament)

Complete daily Survey Tasks to obtain Survey Points, which can be exchanged for various rewards.

  • Rewards: Astrite x800, Malleable Elite Class Echo Ⅰ x1, Malleable Elite Class Echo Ⅱ x1, Premium Tuner x100, Premium Sealed Tube x30

  • Duration: 2024-10-31 10:00 to 2024-11-13 03:59 (Server Time)

Wuthering Exploration (Featured Exploration Event)

Complete daily Survey Tasks to obtain Survey Points, which can be exchanged for various rewards.

  • Rewards: Shell Credit x2,000,000, Tailored Ring x30, FF Whisperin Core x30, FF Howler Core x30

  • Duration: 2024-10-10 10:00 to 2024-10-24 03:59 (Server Time)

Other New Content

  • New Tactical Hologram – Inferno Rider

  • New Challenge – Retro Game Collector

  • New Phantom Appearances – Phantom: Gulpuff, Phantom: Lumiscale Construct

  • New Dishes – Honeysuckle Cake, Fisher's Chowder

Adjustments and Optimizations

Resonators & Echoes

  • Optimized the positions of Phantasmic Imprints in complex terrain when Resonator Zhezhi casts her Resonance Skill, reducing potential glitches in the performance of Zhezhi's model.

  • Optimized the movements of Resonator Zhezhi when casting certain Echo Skills or using the Levitator.

  • Optimized the display of damage numbers in combat for some Resonators.

Features

Data Bank:

Added the "Batch Merge" feature to Data Merge.

  • Use the "Batch Merge" feature to add in a large number of Echoes, up to 100 at a time.

Introduced a "Discarded" marking option for easier Echo management.

  • Mark an Echo as "Discarded" on the Echoes screen.

  • Select "Show Discarded First" in the sorting menu to prioritize marked Echoes.

Note: Marking an Echo as "Discarded" will automatically remove its locked status, if applicable.

Map:

Added a "Switch Map" feature

  • Quickly switch between different map areas on the "Switch Map" page.

  • Press the button in the bottom right corner to zoom in on your current location.

Introduced a "Fast Travel" feature

  • Teleport to an activated Resonance Beacon near your destination, then start tracking.

Added a "Collection Spots" feature for Ascension Materials tracking

  • Select the icon for an Ascension Material on the Backpack or Resonators page, then select "Collection Spots" to view its location on the map.

  • Once all of this particular material has been collected from the current location, the next location will automatically become trackable.

Story:

Added a "Summary" feature

  • When skipping certain story content, a summary of the skipped parts will display, allowing you to follow the story's progress.

Gallery:

Added an "Archives" section on the Gallery page.

Leveling

Item Exchange:

New items have been added to the Item Exchange page's Oscillated Coral selection:

  • MF Whisperin Core x3, MF Howler Core x3, and Basic Ring x3. Up to 40 exchanges for any of these items.

  • The refresh interval for the new items is the same as the existing ones in the Oscillated Coral selection.

Intimacy:

Adjusted the distribution of Intimacy points obtained upon claiming rewards after completing of a challenge. Intimacy points will now be granted to the Resonators who participated in the challenge.

Controls

Controller Support:

Wuthering Waves now supports specific controllers on mobile devices.

  • Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series, DualShock®4, DualSense®, DualSense Edge™

  • With the controller connected, press any button on the controller while the main interface is displayed, and a Controller Mode-related message will pop up.

  • You can also switch to or exit Controller Mode manually via Settings while the controller is connected.

Optimized certain functions in Controller mode

  • An additional icon appears after activating a skill using a combination of buttons in Controller mode.

  • The touchpad on a Sony controller is supported in Controller mode, functioning as a "Share" key.

  • For certain dialogue scenes with adjustable angles, angle adjustments are now possible in Controller mode.

Keyboard & Mouse Mode:

Added a "Quick Access Wheel" feature to the Keyboard & Mouse mode on PC

  • In the default key configuration setting, press and hold "CapsLock" while on the main page to bring up the Quick Access Wheel.

  • Move the cursor over the icon for the page you wish to jump to, then release "CapsLock" to navigate to that page.

  • Press and hold the mouse wheel while bringing up the Quick Access Wheel to edit it.

Key & Button Setting Customization:

  • Customized key or button settings can be synchronized between devices in Touchscreen, Keyboard & Mouse, or Controller mode

  • Button settings in Touchscreen mode can be synchronized between mobile devices.

  • Key settings in Keyboard & Mouse mode can be synchronized between PCs.

  • Button settings in Controller mode can be synchronized between mobile devices and PCs.

After updating to Version 1.3, the default controls will match your initial choice between Keyboard & Mouse or Controller on PC. Subsequent changes to the key settings can be synchronized.

  • Adjusted the conditions for deactivating auto-targeting during combat across all modes. Auto-targeting will be deactivated when the camera movement speed reaches a certain threshold.

Challenges, Puzzles, and Events

Tower of Adversity

Added the Overdrive Zone:

  • "Overdrive Zone" is displayed below "Stable Zone" and "Experiment Zone" on the page.

  • This new zone unlocks after clearing the Hazard Zone.

The challenges and rewards in the Overdrive Zone are not periodically reset. Complete the challenges to claim one-off rewards.

Event Page

Added the "Unlock Hint" feature:

  • If the unlock conditions have not yet been met, players can tap to view the conditions.

  • Players can fast-track ongoing quests now.

  • Optimized certain "Recurring Challenges - Weekly Challenge" challenges to allow consecutive challenges. Select "Restart" in the exit prompt after completing a challenge to start a new one.

UI

  • Optimized display and interactivity on certain pages in Ascendant Aces, a recurring event for trying out new Resonators.

  • Optimized display and interactivity on certain pages in the returnee event, Reprise of Tides.

  • Enhanced the visual contrast between selected and unselected items on specific pages.

  • Optimized the display of the Exploration Progress - Pioneer Association page, which now shows your current Pioneer Level and a preview of the rewards for reaching the next level.

Others

  • Added a State Persistence feature to the Package page. When you return to the page, the items will remain sorted as they were when you last exited.

  • Added new platforms for sharing content. Please check the in-game menu for supported platforms.

  • Optimized the plot progression for Companion Story: True Colors.

  • Optimized the descriptions of certain enemies on the Guidebook - Echo Hunting page.

Bug Fixes

Resonators & Weapons

  • Fixed an issue where movements appeared abnormal when switching Resonators after Resonator Xiangli Yao triggered his Forte Circuit "Resonance Skill: Decipher."

  • Fixed an issue where the animation sometimes appeared abnormal when Resonator Zhezhi cast her Resonance Liberation "Living Canvas."

  • Fixed an issue where Phantasmic Imprints sometimes failed to display when Resonator Zhezhi cast her Resonance Skill "Manifestation" or triggered her Forte Circuit "Heavy Attack: Conjuration." This was a display issue and did not affect the actual effects of Phantasmic Imprints.

  • Fixed an issue where special effects sometimes appeared abnormal when Resonator Jinhsi cast her Resonance Skill "Illuminous Epiphany."

  • Fixed an issue where multiple instances of damage were sometimes dealt incorrectly during Resonator Baizhi's Heavy Attack.

  • Fixed an issue where some of Resonator Baizhi's English voice lines did not match the corresponding text.

  • Fixed an issue where Resonator Danjin was sometimes transported underground after triggering her Forte Circuit "Heavy Attack: Chaoscleave."

  • Fixed an issue where the special effects were not visible to the other players in Co-op mode when Resonator Chixia triggered her Forte Circuit "Resonance Skill: DAKA DAKA!"

  • Fixed an issue where the special effects for certain skills sometimes failed to appear.

  • Fixed an issue where weapon models sometimes exhibited anomalies when switching Resonators.

Enemies & Echoes

  • Fixed an issue where Resonators were sometimes unable to exit the transformation after transforming into Tempest Mephis.

  • Fixed an issue where certain skills cast by the Tacet Discords "Mourning Aix," "Dreamless," "Bell-Borne Geochelone," and "Havoc Dreadmane" sometimes prevented Resonance Skills from dealing DMG.

  • Fixed an issue where the number of Remaining Enhanced Absorptions was abnormally reduced when "Phantom: Rocksteady Guardian" or "Phantom: Hoartoise" were absorbed.

  • Fixed an issue where the Prism's model sometimes failed to disappear after being absorbed by "Cyan-Feathered Heron" or "Violet-Feathered Heron."

  • Fixed an issue where the casting of certain skills by the enemy "Fractsidus Executioner" sometimes ended prematurely in combat.

  • Fixed an issue where a Counterattack failed to interrupt an attack from the Tacet Discord "Rocksteady Guardian" in combat.

  • Fixed an issue where the Echoes were sometimes rearranged abnormally when the page was refreshed.

Features

  • Fixed an issue where the count for "Absorb 3 Echoes" on the Pioneer Podcast – Podcast Tasks – Morning Broadcasts menu did not increase after absorbing a Phantom Echo.

  • Fixed an issue where the count for "Absorb 3 Echoes" on the Pioneer Podcast – Podcast Tasks – Morning Broadcasts menu did not increase after absorbing an Echo once the number of Echoes on the Backpack – Echoes page reached the limit.

  • Fixed an issue where opening a Supply Chest or obtaining a Tidal Heritage sometimes failed to increase the respective totals, or where Supply Chests were counted as Tidal Heritages. After the Version 1.3 update, some Rovers may notice that the number of opened Supply Chest for the Trophy "Chest Collector" has increased, or the Trophy has been marked as completed, while other Rovers may notice that the number of obtained Tidal Heritages for the Trophy "Cremation Tuning" has decreased. If you complete the Trophies before the 1.3 Version update, you will not encounter the above problems following the update.

  • Fixed an issue where the duration of action did not appear after using the dishes "Lemon-Braised Pork," "Sweet & Sour Pork," "Caltrop Stir Fry," or "Stuffed Tofu."

  • Fixed an issue where red dots sometimes appeared randomly on the Terminal – Quests page after exiting Co-op mode.

  • Fixed an issue where the remaining time above the energy bar, indicating how long certain effects would remain active, reset after exiting Co-op mode.

  • Fixed an issue where an error message sometimes popped up randomly in Co-op mode.

  • Fixed an issue where the game sometimes crashed when accessing the Trophies page with a controller connected.

  • Fixed an issue where the buttons assigned to Normal Attack and Echo Skill sometimes remained the same as before in Controller mode after resetting the button assignments and restarting the game.

  • Fixed an issue where a Resonator sometimes failed to move when the direction control keys were pressed in Keyboard & Mouse mode.

  • Fixed an issue where the "High" setting for Settings – Camera Settings – Camera Shake Intensity sometimes reverted to "Low" after restarting the game.

  • Fixed an issue where the "Off" setting for Settings – Graphics – Motion Blur sometimes reverted to "On."

  • Fixed an issue where the value for Setting - Camera Settings - Horizontal/Vertical Camera Sensitivity sometimes reverted to the default.

  • Fixed an issue where Super Resolution, Sharpening, and NVIDIA Reflex remained adjustable when Settings – Graphics - NVIDIA DLSS was set to "Off."

  • Fixed an issue where switching between tools in the Utility Wheel sometimes became impossible after exiting a domain.

  • Fixed an issue where the vertical arrow accompanying the Supply Chest icon on the mini-map, which appears after deploying a Lootmapper, sometimes failed to point in the correct direction.

  • Fixed an issue where sorting by "Sub: Crit. Rate," "Sub: Crit. DMG," or "Sub: Energy Regen" before using the "Data Merge" feature did not produce the expected results.

  • Fixed an issue where multiple upgrades sometimes occurred when an Echo was upgraded using Sealed Tubes.

  • Fixed an issue where the relevant page sometimes failed to display the results after a successful upgrade of an Echo using Sealed Tubes.

  • Fixed an issue where the Backpack – Supplies page sometimes showed display anomalies.

  • Fixed an issue where it remained possible to mark the map after the "Custom Mark" option was turned off.

  • Fixed an issue where opening "Utility" sometimes adversely affected the in-game internet speed.

  • Fixed an issue where healing sometimes failed to occur when a Resonator entered a Resonance Nexus.

  • Fixed an issue where a Resonator's model sometimes behaved abnormally after using the "Fast Travel" feature.

  • Fixed an issue where a Resonator's skill pages sometimes became noninteractive.

  • Fixed an issue where the text for the Trophy "May the Beacons Guide Us" was incorrect.

  • Fixed an issue where "Shifang Pharmacy" did not appear among the location options for obtaining Violet Corals.

  • Fixed an issue where in-game sound effects and background music on some devices sometimes experienced stuttering.

  • Fixed an issue where the speed at which the camera angle changed sometimes became abnormal on Android devices when the frame rate was set low.

Challenges, Puzzles, and Events

  • Fixed an issue where the enemy "Lightcrusher" sometimes moved abnormally and ceased attacking during a Tower of Adversity challenge.

  • Fixed an issue where the details for an Alloy Smelt II challenge sometimes appeared on the Edit Team - Details page for a Tower of Adversity challenge.

  • Fixed an issue where the item "Ultrasonic Pulse Chip" sometimes became unusable after exiting Co-op mode.

  • Fixed an issue where a Resonator was sometimes transported to another area after picking up the item "Torn Pages from Port City of Guixu" in the Port City of Guixu - Nostalgia Isle area.

  • Fixed an issue where certain Mutterflies sometimes disappeared after being touched in the Central Plains - Taoyuan Vale area.

  • Fixed an issue where the casting of certain skills by the enemy sometimes ended prematurely during a Tactical Hologram: Calamity - Feilian Beringal - Difficulty VI challenge.

  • Fixed an issue where successfully running through a circle sometimes failed to award the correct points during a Tactical Hologram: Ski challenge.

  • Fixed an issue where the player reached the finish line but was still considered to be skiing during a Tactical Hologram: Ski challenge, which caused the challenge to end in failure.

  • Fixed an issue where the models of some enemies remained after the completion of a Tacet Suppression challenge in certain Tacet Fields.

  • Fixed an issue where a message sometimes popped up randomly when solving an Encryption Block or Energy Matrix puzzle.

Quests

  • Fixed an issue where the Trophy "The Sun Rises as Usual" was checked while Side Quest: Radar Reactivation was not yet completed.

  • Fixed an issue where the switch from a non-Rover Resonator to Rover when a conversation is initiated sometimes failed to take effect during Side Quest: A True Arena Champion.

  • Fixed an issue where some dialogue texts went out of bounds in certain language settings.

Environment

  • Fixed an issue where the screens of some Android devices flickered when displaying the overworld environment.

  • Fixed an issue where the special effects sometimes failed to fade away after an enemy's Vibration Strength was reduced to 0 in combat.

  • Fixed an issue where a Resonator was sometimes transported to a wrong area or underground when attempting to Fast Travel, or enter or exit a domain.

  • Fixed an issue where glitches occurred in the environment during a Tacet Field challenge on some PCs.

  • Fixed an issue where specific NPCs in the Mt. Firmament area exhibited abnormal behavior.

  • Fixed an issue where certain structures in the Mt. Firmament area were unclimbable.

  • Fixed an issue where the water effects for certain bodies of water in the Dim Forest area appeared defective.

  • Resolved known instances of objects models clipping through each other or floating in mid-air.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.

Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!

Content Requirement

Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.

We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!

How to Submit

Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.

Submission Period

2024/09/30 - 2024/11/07 08:59 (PT)

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.

Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

entry.title: Version 1.3 [The Black Shores] Special Leveling Events
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

Thank you for your continued support and enthusiasm for Wuthering Waves!

With version 1.2 "In the Turquoise Moonglow" drawing to a close, how have you been faring with the "Converging Paths" event? Did you enjoy the Moonlit Fair?

Since the "Converging Paths" event's release, we have received your complaints about the sudden increase in resource requirements after unlocking Resonator Xiangli Yao and its added strain. To help ease your burden, we've decided to roll out a batch of special leveling events in Version 1.3 in addition to the content we originally planned:

Version 1.3 Special Leveling Events Explained

Alongside the events already announced, we'll add three leveling events—two brand-new and one rerun. Participate in these events to get a wealth of Shell Credit and various development materials. Don't miss out if you are at Union Level 14 or above!

NEW [Parade of Stars] Special Leveling Event

  • About: This event will feature 4 different types of tasks: Resonator Leveling, Weapon Leveling, Echo Leveling, and Skill Leveling. Complete these tasks to receive various rewards.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Version 1.3 Update Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 1.3: To the Shore's End.

During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦ Maintenance Time: 2024-09-29 04:00 to 2024-09-29 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦ Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦ Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2024-09-29 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the Version 1.4 update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

Please note that the compensation will be sent via in-game mail within 6 hours after the maintenance is completed and the server is back online. The mail will remain valid for 30 days.

[How to Update]

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

  • Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.

  • iOS: Update the game in the App Store.

  • PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on Update.

[Version 1.3 Preview]

  • New Region: The Black Shores

Tucked away in the tempestuous Stormy Sea lies an archipelago known for its lavish Tacetite deposits and as a refuge for the world's most talented individuals. With a mission to combat the destructive Lament, the Black Shores has fostered strong partnerships with nations across Solaris-3.

The archipelago cannot be accessed from any known lands. Only those recognized by the Black Shores or who have received an invitation and guidance can navigate their way to this hidden place.

  • New Resonators: 5-Star Resonator – Shorekeeper, 4-Star Resonator – Youhu

  • New Weapons: 5-Star Weapon – Stellar Symphony, 4-Star Weapon Series – Deep Sky Blazar

  • New Echo: Fallacy of No Return

  • New Events: Where Stars Slumber – An exploration event, Amidst the Stars – A Chrono Trace-collecting event, Infinite Battle Simulation– A limited-time, combat-themed event, Solaris Weather Forecast – A limited-time, Dataset-collecting Overdash challenge, Fairy Tale's Finale – A limited-time challenge in Co-op mode, Lollo Campaign: Rerun – A limited-time, task-based event

  • New Stories: Main Quest – To the Shore's End (Chapter I Act VIII), Companion Story – Small Wooly, Big Adventures (Encore), Side Quest – Cerulean Echoes Adrift in the Winds

  • Other New Content: Phantom Appearances – Phantom: Gulpuff, Phantom: Lumiscale Construct; New Challenge – Tactical Hologram: Inferno Rider; New Dishes: Honeysuckle Cake, Fisher's Chowder

5-Star Resonator Shorekeeper can be obtained through [Till the Sea Turns Clear] Featured Resonator Convene. 4-Star Resonator Youhu can be obtained through [Prevail the Lasting Night] Featured Resonator Convene.

For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 1.3: To the Shore's End, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.

[PC Launcher Update Notice]

To provide a better gaming experience for all Rovers, we released the 1.6.2 launcher update on 2024-09-20 (UTC+8), introducing the following new features:

  1. Pre-download feature for the PC launcher

  2. With the pre-download feature enabled, New Version Pre-download appears below the Start button on the Launcher 1.6.2 interface. Select this option to pre-download the material for the latest version.

  3. You can pause the pre-downloading process at any time. Whether the process is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.

The pre-download material is approximately 30GB in size. Make sure that you have enough storage space on your PC.

  1. Default use of DirectX 12 to launch the game (NVIDIA GeForce RTX 20 Series and above, Intel graphics cards)

  2. With DirectX 12, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40 Series graphics cards will support DLSS 3 super resolution and NVIDIA Reflex, while XeSS upscaling will be enabled for Intel graphics cards. This update will also improve compatibility across a wide range of GPUs, resolving issues such as black screens or visual distortions caused by certain hardware.

  3. After the update, shaders will need to be recompiled the first time you launch the game with DirectX 12. This process may cause some initial stuttering or frame rate drops, but performance will return to normal once it's complete.

If shader compilation causes extended stuttering or disrupts gameplay, you can exit the game and select Launch with DirectX 11 below the Start button, or contact customer service for assistance.

[Device Requirements]

To ensure a smooth experience, please refer to the following requirements:

  1. Minimum

Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 835, MediaTek G71/72 or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more

iOS: [System] iOS 14 or later; [Model] iPhone 11 or newer, iPad with A13 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more

PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I5 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 2700; [GPU] Geforce 1060/RX570/Intel ARC A380, [RAM] 16 GB or more

  1. Recommended

Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon Gen1+/Gen2/Gen3 or MediaTek processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more

iOS: [System] iOS 15 or later; [Model] iPhone 13 or newer, iPad with A15 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more

PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I7 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 3700, [GPU] Geforce 2060/RX5700XT/Intel ARC A750; [RAM] 16 GB or more

  1. Required Storage Space

Android/iOS: 16 GB

PC: 30 GB; it's recommended to install the game on an SSD.

  1. Controller Support

Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on Mobile.

Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series, DualShock®4, DualSense®, DualSense Edge™

Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on PC.

Wired/Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series

Wireless Controllers: DualSense®, DualSense Edge™

Wired Controllers: DualShock®4

entry.title: V1.2 WUWA Discord Quest Livestream Event Begins!
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

V1.2 WUWA Discord Quest Livestream Event has begun. Click the link below to complete the streaming quest on Discord and get a chance to win rewards including Morphable Echo!

<https://discord.com/quests/1278785843187679324>

✦Event Duration✦

Now - September 9th (4:59PM PDT)

✦Rewards✦

Shell Credit ×15,000

Advanced Resonance Potion ×2

Advanced Energy Core ×2

Morphable Echo ×1

Please note that the rewards are limited to 300,000 in total and will be given out on a first-come, first-served basis, determined by the time the Redemption Code is claimed after completing the streaming quest. The Redemption Code will expire at 09:00 AM (PDT) on October 09.

✦Who is Eligible✦

Available to players on PC where both Discord and Wuthering Waves are available.

Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions.

✦Other Terms✦

Limit of one reward redemption per account.

For more information on Discord Quests, please visit Discord Quest Help Center.

✦How to Participate✦

In order to successfully complete the V1.2 WUWA Discord Quest, players who meet the eligibility criteria must live stream their Wuthering Waves gameplay to a friend via a Discord voice channel for a minimum duration of 15 minutes on the desktop app.

  1. Before you can begin the Quest, launch the game.

  2. Then, head to your Discord desktop app and navigate to a direct message (DM), group chat, or a server of your choice.

  3. Once there, start a voice call or join a voice channel and select the Screen Share icon located in the voice status panel. Be sure to select the individual application for the game before you Go Live.

  • NOTE: You must select the game application to stream! Streaming your device’s screen will not progress your Quest forward. Once you stream, you can check the progress bar on the Quest Home to ensure progress is being made on the Quest.
  1. When you’re ready to stream your gameplay, press Go Live. You can learn more about streaming your game here.

✦Redemption Instructions✦

  1. Once you have completed the Quest by streaming 15 minutes of Wuthering Waves, you will receive a reward code in Quest Home (Discovery > Quests). For detailed instructions on how to claim your reward code, please refer to Discord Quests FAQ.

  2. Select your server and enter Wuthering Waves, and then go to [Settings] - [Other] - [Redemption Code].

  3. Enter the [Redemption Code] and hit [Confirm] to redeem rewards. You can then claim them in your in-game mail.

  4. The [Redemption Code] function will be unlocked once you've reached Union Level 2.

  5. The Redemption Code obtained in this event will expire on 2024/10/09 at 09:00 (PDT). Redemption Codes that expire will be unable to be redeemed.

✦Discord Quest FAQ✦

Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can redeem on my Discord account?

A: Eligible users can redeem one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account.

For more information on Discord Quests, visit Discord Quest Help Center.

Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?

A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you are in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.

Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. If you are unable to access the Gift Inventory, you are not eligible for Quests.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests.

A: We encourage you to review Discord’s Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests.

Q: Why am I unable to complete Quest while using Linux?

A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices.

However, Discord team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows or MacOS.

Discord support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Developer's Message: The Black Shores Preview
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

First, we want to express our heartfelt thanks for all your support and love for Wuthering Waves. It's crazy how time flies—we are already halfway through Version 1.2 "In the Turquoise Moonglow". We hope the Moonlit Fair has been a blast for you so far.

While you are enjoying all the festivities, new stories are unfolding beyond the borders of Jinzhou. We have some awesome updates in the pipeline and we are excited to give you a sneak peek through this preview.

In this preview, you can have a glimpse into the new area, gameplay features, and some storylines currently in development.

New Area

New Area: The Black Shores

The Black Shores, an archipelago enshrouded in mysteries and turmoil, remains sealed away from the world in thick digital fog. It is still uncertain when or who will lift its veil, allowing it to once more shoulder the task of connecting the world.

New Character

New Resonator: Youhu

We've cooked up something special with our upcoming Resonator Youhu. Her Resonance Skill and Resonance Liberation come with new QTE mechanics that bring a twist to combat. It's fun, it's unique, and we think you're going to love it.

New Gameplay Content

New "Portal" Puzzles

We are adding "Portals" to some puzzle-solving scenarios so you can hop between different areas, or even... No more spoilers, we can't wait to see how you use them!

New Special Enemy: Hedgepuff

Complete the new collection quests in the Black Shores to unlock this little guy and other special enemies. Keep an eye out for them—they are scattered across the shores, waiting for Rovers brave enough to test their skills.

New Boss: Fallacy of No Return

A ██████ created by the Tethys System, patrolling the borders between reality and digital world.

New Tactical Hologram: Inferno Rider

We are also expanding the Tactical Hologram with some exciting new challenges. Even more exciting and challenging battle content will be coming your way in future updates. Be ready!

New Stories

New Companion Story: Small Wooly, Big Adventures

Every story is an extension of life, and adventure is the beginning of a story. Encore extends a special invitation to you—the adventure is about to begin! As her closest friend, will you join the Wooly Warrior on this exciting journey?

Note: All content shared in the preview is still in development and may not represent the final quality. For accurate details, please refer to the official release notice when the content goes live.

There is still so much more on the horizon, and we will continue to share new content and optimization details with you, so stay tuned!

And don't forget, as we sent out this message, the Moon-Chasing Festival featured event "By Moon's Grace" is still in full swing in Jinzhou. Participate to claim Astrite and material rewards, and raise Popularity for the upcoming "Converging Paths" event. You won't want to miss the chance to get the free 5-Star Resonator Xiangli Yao!

entry.title: Version 1.2: In the Turquoise Moonglow Patch Notes
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

Thank you for your steadfast support! We are excited to announce that Version 1.2 In the Turquoise Moonglow will be available soon!

Maintenance Duration & Compensations

  • Maintenance Duration: 2024-08-15 06:00 to 2024-08-15 13:00 (UTC+8)

  • Maintenance Compensations: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail function before 2024-08-15 06:00 (UTC+8). The compensation is valid until the update to Version 1.3.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

  • Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

  • Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail function before 2024-08-15 06:00 (UTC+8). The compensation is valid until the update to Version 1.3.

The compensation mail will be sent within 6 hours after the maintenance is completed. The mail will remain valid for 30 days."

Version Update Details

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Zhezhi (Glacio)

An artist for hire trying to make a living. Reserved and timid, she is not good with words but speaks volumes through her art, where her creations come to life with impossible authenticity.

  • Combat Role: Concerto Efficiency, Basic Attack DMG, Coordinated Attack, Glacio DMG Amplification, Resonance Skill DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Chromatic Prose] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Xiangli Yao (Electro)

Principal Investigator at Huaxu Academy's Jinzhou Campus, and the Academy's youngest multi-disciplinary scientist. A gentle soul with a sharp mind, whose relentless passion for Automata Mechanics always translates into constructive findings and insights.

  • Combat Role: Main Damage Dealer, Resonance Liberation DMG

Obtainable through the [Celestial Revelation] Featured Resonator Convene.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Rime-Draped Sprouts (Rectifier)

An artist's seal adorned with rimed sprouts. It is stamped on numerous paintings that capture mountains and ravines in expressive, mesmerizing strokes. The tender sprouts symbolize the perpetual blossoming of artistic marvels.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation: Rime-Draped Sprouts] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Verity's Handle (Gauntlets)

Crafted with the lost art from the Court of Savantae, these gauntlets are solid and unbreakable, despite their lightweight materials. They are no tools of violence or aggression, but instruments for unraveling puzzles and pursuing the truth.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation: Verity's Handle] Featured Weapon Convene.

New Events

[By Moon's Grace] Moon-Chasing Festival Themed Event

The Moon-Chasing Festival is a Huanglong traditional festival that features various origin stories, with the most popular being the tale of The Fox and the Moon. On this special night, families and friends come together to admire the moon and make wishes, expressing their hopes for a brighter future.

  • Schedule: After the Version 1.2 update to 2024-09-28 15:59 (Server Time)

  • Prerequisite: Reach Union Level 17 and complete Main Quest Chapter 1 Act 3: Ominous Star.

For an enhanced experience, it is recommended to complete Main Quest Chapter 1 Act 7: Thaw of Eons first.

[Converging Paths] Moon-Chasing Festival Preparation Event

Complete Wishes and build Stalls to earn Popularity for the Moon-Chasing Festival. From 2024-09-07 10:00 to 2024-09-28 11:59 (Server Time), players with enough Popularity can claim the 5-Star Resonator Xiangli Yao for free.

  • Schedule: 2024-09-04 10:00 to 2024-09-28 11:59 (Server Time)

[Gifts of Lunar Radiance] 7-Day Login Event

During the event, log in to the game and check in on the in-game event page to get rewards for the days you have checked in.

  • Rewards: Radiant Tide x5, Lustrous Tide x5

  • Schedule: After the Version 1.2 update to 2024-09-28 03:59 (Server Time)

All-New Installment: [Carnival in Slumberland] Comes to [Depths of Illusive Realm]!

Illusive Echo: Dreamless and new Metaphors are now available.

Explore all-new scenes and face off against new enemies! Join the grand banquet of dreams to uncover deeper secrets!

New Available Resonators: Zhezhi, Xiangli Yao, Yuanwu, and Danjin.

  • Schedule: 2024-08-22 10:00 to 2024-09-23 03:59 (Server Time)

[Do Echoids Dream of Electric Sheep?] Limited-time Defense Event

Enter the special Simulation Challenges to protect the experimental device from destruction until all TDs are eliminated. Cosmos will provide Echoids to significantly boost Resonators' combat power.

  • Schedule: 2024-09-05 10:00 to 2024-09-26 03:59 (Server Time)

[Alloy Smelt II] Limited-time Battle Challenge

Experiment with different team lineups and activate various buffs to defeat enemies more efficiently.

  • Schedule: 2024-09-16 10:00 to 2024-09-28 03:59 (Server Time)

New Story

Zhezhi's Companion Story: True Colors

What does it really mean to create? Will an artist yet again caught up in the past accusations, find the courage to confront her past mistakes and tap into her emotions and talents, and continue to breathe new life into her paintings?

  • Available Time: Permanently available after the Version 1.2 update

  • Prerequisite: Reach Union Level 22 and complete the Moon-Chasing Festival ""Wish Upon the Moon I: Cry of the Soul"" quest.

Exploration Quest: Vigil of Endless Night

You've acquired a mysterious key from Chenpi. It seems to unlock a secret door covered in dust for ages.

  • Available Time: Permanently available after the Version 1.2 update

  • Prerequisite: Complete Main Quest Chapter 1 Act 7: Thaw of Eons.

Other New Content

  • New Returnee Event: [Reprise of Tides]

  • New Phantom Appearance: [Phantom: Dreamless]

  • New Utility: [Hoverdroid: Shooter]"

Adjustments and Optimizations

Resonators & Echoes

  • Added Resonators' voicelines that play when switching between Resonators on the Resonators screen.

  • Optimized the Resonators' Dodge mechanics in combat, allowing consecutive dodges to trigger a successful Dodge.

  • Optimized the performance of certain actions while Resonators are sliding down.

  • Optimized the animation performance of Rover: Havoc (Male)'s Resonance Liberation.

  • Optimized the model performance of Rover: Havoc (Female)'s Basic Attack 2.

  • Optimized Jiyan's model performance on certain devices.

  • Optimized the anti-aliasing performance for some Resonator models on certain devices.

  • Optimized the action performance of Echo: Lightcrusher.

System

Store Excess Waveplate:

New Feature to Store Excess Waveplate

  • Added the Waveplate Crystal count, and Waveplate Crystals can be exchanged for Waveplates of equivalent value.

  • The current counts of both Waveplates and Waveplate Crystals can be viewed on the Map screen.

  • Once you reach the Waveplate cap, you'll begin receiving Waveplate Crystals instead, which regenerate at a rate of 1 Crystal every 12 minutes.

Terminal:

New Resonator Showcase Feature

  • Tap the avatar on the Terminal screen to open the Resonator Showcase.

  • You can display the convene animation of up to 3 selected Resonators here.

Exploration:

New Utility Hoverdroid: Shooter

  • Unlock the Utilities feature to automatically obtain Hoverdroid: Shooter.

In shooting challenges or puzzles, you'll be able to use the new Hoverdroid: Shooter with any Resonator, instead of switching to a pistol-using Resonator.

Returnee Event:

New Returnee Event: Reprise of Tides

Meet specific requirements to activate the Returnee Event. Earn the corresponding rewards by either checking in or completing quests.

  • Reach Union Level 8.

  • At least 30 days since the last game login.

  • At least 30 days since last activating the Reprise of Tides event.

Meet all the above requirements to activate the Reprise of Tides event. The event will last for 14 days after activation.

Mail:

Optimized the text content of certain notification mails.

Leveling

SOL3 Phase:

Optimized the quantity of material drops from completing various levels in the Recurring Challenges after reaching SOL3 Phase 8.

Daily Activity Points:

Increased the Activity Points reward for the ""Spend 180 Waveplates"" daily quest from 20 to 60.

Data Bank:

Optimized the sorting feature in Data Bank > Echo Gallery.

Controls

Custom Lock-On:

  • Added three Lock-On Priority options: Movement Direction, Camera Direction, and Distance. You can set your preference under Settings > Control > Lock-On Priority.

  • Optimized the auto lock-on logic for certain Echo Skills.

Controller Support:

  • Added configuration options for the Select and Switch Target functions when using a controller.

  • Added the function to zoom in and out on the Map screen using the right joystick of the controller.

  • Optimized the input sensitivity for the left and right joysticks on the controller.

  • Optimized the text scrolling speed for the left and right joysticks on the controller.

  • Optimized certain controls for pistol-using Resonators when using a controller.

  • Optimized the controls on specific screens when using a controller.

  • Optimized the wheel function when using a controller.

  1. Added red dot notifications for the system function wheel.

  2. Added the option to trigger the selected function upon releasing the right joystick, which can be enabled or disabled in the wheel configuration screen.

  3. Optimized the wheel configuration screen and adjusted the range of the selection tool.

Challenges, Puzzles, and Events

  • Added the Fast Travel function in the Weekly Challenge: Destined Confrontation instance.

  • Optimized the interactive experience when claiming rewards upon completing the challenge in the Weekly Challenge: Destined Confrontation instance.

  • Optimized the descriptions of the Stage 4 effects for Phantom Echo: Inferno Rider in the Depths of Illusive Realm event. This optimization does not affect the actual effect.

UI

  • Added an effect icon for the Outro Skill on the main screen, which now indicates the current active status.

  • Added a shortcut for Data Merge on the Echo Equipment screen.

  • Added an exclusive screen and shortcut for Tower of Adversity on the Event screen.

  • Added a Co-op Mode status indicator on the Terminal screen. Tapping it will exit Co-op Mode.

  • Optimized the UI display effect of the Co-op Mode system.

  • Optimized the UI display and interactive experience of the Targeted Convene events.

  • Optimized the UI display and interaction for selecting dialogue options when playing across platforms.

Other

  • Optimized the left joystick controls on mobile devices and reduced the range of accidental operations.

  • Optimized the waiting time for story dialogues.

Pack adjustment

  • Due to regional restrictions, the [Blake Bloom's Data Aid] pack will be removed from the Store following this update. We appreciate your understanding.

Graphics & Performance

  • Optimized game performance for select mobile devices.

  • Added the Enemy On-Hit Material Effects options in Settings > Graphics.

  • The 120 FPS option will be available on select PC devices in Settings > Graphics.

To enable the 120 FPS option, both of the following system requirements must be fulfilled:

  1. Graphics Card: Supported NVIDIA RTX 30 series, RTX 40 series, or AMD RX 6000 series, RX 7000 series.

  2. CPU: Supported Intel or AMD model.

Depending on your system specifications and environment, enabling the 120 FPS option may cause performance issues or hardware errors. If you experience such problems, please disable the option and restart the game. If the issues persist, please send your feedback to Customer Service.

Meanwhile, we will continue to enhance game performance and address issues based on your feedback. We will expand support to more devices in future versions.

Supported NVIDIA Graphics Cards

RTX 30 Series: 3060, 3060 Ti, 3070, 3070 Ti, 3080, 3080 Ti, 3090, 3090 Ti

RTX 40 Series: 4050, 4060, 4060 Ti, 4070, 4070 SUPER, 4070 Ti, 4070 Ti SUPER, 4080, 4080 SUPER, 4090 D, 4090

Supported AMD Graphics Cards

RX 6000 Series: 6750 GRE, 6700 XT, 6750 XT, 6800, 6800 XT, 6900 XT, 6950 XT

RX 7000 Series: 7600, 7600 XT, 7700XT, 7800 XT, 7900 GRE, 7900 XT, 7900 XTX

Includes the corresponding laptop models.

Desktop: 6900K, 7820X, 9800X, 10700KF, 10700K, 11700KF, 11700K, 12700T, 12700F, 12700, 12700KF, 12700K, 13700T, 13700F, 13700, 13700KF, 13700K, 13790F, 14790F, 14700T, 14700F, 14700, 14700KF, 14700K

Core i9 Series

Laptop: 9880H, 9980HK, 10885H, 10980HK, 11900H, 11950H, 11980HK, 12900H, 12900HK, 12900HX, 12950HX, 13900H, 13905H, 13900HX, 13950HX, 13980HX, 14900HX

Desktop: 7900X, 9820X, 9900X, 9920X, 9940X, 9900KF, 9900K, 9900KS, 10850K, 10900KF, 10900K, 10900X, 10920X, 10940X, 11900KF, 11900K, 12900T, 12900F, 12900, 12900KF, 12900K, 12900KS, 13900T, 13900F, 13900, 13900KF, 13900K, 13900KS, 14900T, 14900F, 14900, 14900KF, 14900K, 14900KS

Bug Fixes

Resonators

  • Fixed the issue where Changli's Dodge Counter ""True Sight: Charge"" did not correctly recover a stack of Enflamement on hit.

  • Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, Changli's eye patch model would display abnormally after accumulating four stacks of Enflamement.

  • Fixed the issue where Jinhsi would land abnormally when executing a Mid-air Attack.

  • Fixed the issue in Jinhsi's battle against TD: Traffic Illuminator where she would freeze abnormally upon casting Resonance Skill: Illuminous Epiphany, preventing her from performing other actions.

  • Fixed the visual anomalies with Jinhsi's certain skill effects on mobile devices.

  • Fixed the issue where the Tacet Mark Effect would display abnormally when her Resonance Liberation energy was full.

  • Fixed the issue in Yinlin's battle against TD: Tempest Mephis where the attack range would be abnormal in certain situations.

  • Fixed an issue where certain damage types cannot trigger the Coordinated Attack inflicted by the Punishment Mark of Resonator Yinlin's Forte Chameleon Cipher.

  • Fixed the issue where the special effect of Calcharo's Intro Skill: ""Necessary Means"" would display abnormally on certain mobile devices.

  • Fixed the issue where the special effect of Lingyang's Resonance Liberation - Strive: Lion's Vigor would display abnormally on certain mobile devices.

  • Fixed the issue where the ""Healing multiplier of Remnant Entities is increased by 20%"" effect in the 4th sequence of Baizhi's Resonance Chain, Eternal Verity, did not increase with the level of Resonance Liberation.

  • Fixed the issue where the 6th sequence of Baizhi's Resonance Chain, Seeker's Devotion, might not activate in Co-op Mode.

  • Fixed the issue where the actual healing range after Baizhi cast Resonance Liberation: Momentary Union did not match the skill description.

  • Fixed the visual anomalies with the Plunging Attack action when switching from the current Resonator to Baizhi.

  • Fixed the issue where, after Yangyang accumulated three stacks of Melody, the special effect at the ends of her hair would display abnormally when entering or exiting Co-op Mode.

  • Fixed the issue where Danjin's Tacet Mark Effect did not change properly when her Resonance Liberation energy was full.

  • Fixed the issue where the main screen UI would not restore properly after the Resonator cast Resonance Liberation.

  • Fixed the issue where the camera could abnormally zoom in after activating the Intro Skill while switching Resonators during combat.

Echoes

  • Fixed the issue where the Echoes Violet-Feathered Heron, Viridblaze Saurian, and Havoc Dreadmane would trigger the Echo Counter Skill abnormally during combat.

  • Fixed the visual anomalies with TD Baby Viridblaze Saurian's attack special effect.

  • Fixed the issue where Bell-Borne Geochelone would not enter battle in certain situations.

  • Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, when Echo: Bell-Borne Geochelone cast its Echo Skill again during the effect duration, the duration did not reset.

System

  • Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, the screen might turn black when starting the game.

  • Fixed the issue where, when using Lootmapper, the Supply Chest icon on the minimap might not disappear correctly after the Supply Chest was opened.

  • Fixed the issue where, in the Map function, Custom Markers would shift abnormally to inaccessible regions and could not be deleted in certain situations. If you are experiencing this issue, the abnormal markers on your map will disappear after this update.

  • Fixed the issue where, after unlocking all Resonance Beacons in the Central Plains, the Resonance Beacon category still did not show 100% Exploration Progress.

  • Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, using Waypoint at random locations on the map would prompt ""Unable to use in the current status of this region,"" preventing Fast Travel.

  • Fixed the issue where, when exchanging Astrites for Waveplates, if Astrites were insufficient and Lunites were used to obtain Astrites, Waveplates could still not be exchanged.

  • Fixed the issue where defeating certain enemies did not count toward the ""Defeat 15 enemies in total"" quest in Activity Points.

  • Fixed the issue where, in the Data Bank > Data Merge screen, when selecting merge materials, holding an Echo did not display the checkbox.

  • Fixed the issue where the Chat screen would become unresponsive in Co-op Mode.

  • Fixed the issue where Player 2 could not see Player 1's Resonator model correctly in Co-op Mode.

  • Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, remapped keys could be reset to default configurations after restarting the game.

  • Fixed the issue where, when using a controller, the sound effect would trigger abnormally after the Resonator's Concerto Energy was full.

  • Fixed the issue where certain voicelines in Resonator profiles did not align correctly with certain language settings.

  • Fixed the issue on Android devices where pictures taken with the Camera and Save functions did not save properly to the local album.

Challenges, Puzzles, and Events

  • Fixed the issue in the Depths of Illusive Realm event where, after Jinhsi activated the Coruscation skill in the Character Upgrade, the generated Stagnant Zone duration of Loong's Reign did not match the skill description.

  • Fixed the issue where certain scene models appeared abnormal in the Depths of Illusive Realm event on mobile devices.

  • Fixed the issue in Echo Challenge: Clang Bang where, after completing the challenge, you could still interact with the device and reactivate the challenge.

  • Fixed the issue in Tactical Hologram: Calamity where the Resonator's model would display abnormally in a specific area near the hologram.

  • Fixed the issue where, after the start of Tactical Hologram: Ski, interacting with the Grapple would prevent the ski state from being correctly activated.

  • Fixed the issue with a specific Vine Trap and Explosive Charge puzzle (Explosive Charge coordinates: 954,2935,55) in the Whining Aix's Mire > Court of Savantae Ruins region, where the Vine Trap would not fully burn out after using the Explosive Charge, preventing puzzle completion. If you are experiencing this issue, please revisit the location and use the Explosive Charge again to fully burn out the remaining Vine Trap after this update.

  • Fixed the issue in Desorock Highland: Tacet Field I and Desorock Highland: Tacet Field II where the description of the Attribute DMG increase in Tacet Field on the Map screen did not match the actual increase in Attribute DMG.

Quests

  • Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, the instructions for transforming into Clang Bang would not disappear correctly during the Truthseeker's Pass quest during Main Quest: Thaw of Eons.

  • Fixed the issue where transforming into an Exile would cause abnormal movement into deep water areas during Side Quest: Secret Investigation.

  • Fixed the issue where objects would float abnormally in certain scenes during Side Quest: Lores Beyond the Ranges.

  • Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, Activity Points were not correctly awarded after completing Daily Quests.

  • Fixed the issue where some dialogues were displayed incorrectly during Companion Story: Immortal Blaze when using the Korean language setting.

Environment

  • Fixed the issue where you could move abnormally inside buildings at specific locations in the Central Plains.

  • Fixed the issue where you could fall abnormally underground at specific locations in Jinzhou.

  • Fixed the issue where the water surface would display incorrectly in specific areas of Mt. Firmament on certain mobile devices.

  • Fixed the known visual issues with some environment models."

entry.title: Event Notice | "Reprise of Tides" Returnee Event Coming Soon!
entry.content:
During the event, the qualified Rovers can claim rewards through login or quests.

Duration

After the 1.2 update

Eligibility

  • Reach Union Level 8.

  • Haven't logged in for at least 30 consecutive days.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Version Preview | Version 1.2 "In the Turquoise Moonglow" Coming August 15
Wuthering Waves Developer's Message Vol. 4: Version 1.2 Optimization Preview With A Special Note From Developers
entry.content:
Dear Rover:

Wuthering Waves Version 1.2 "In the Turquoise Moonglow" is on the horizon. Here's a sneak peek at the upcoming improvements and a special note from the dev team.

Version 1.2 Optimization Preview

1. New Custom Lock-On Feature

In Version 1.1, we implemented several quality-of-life improvements to the auto lock-on system, including optimizations for Resonators and some Echo skills. With the release of Version 1.2, you'll gain access to the new Custom Lock-On feature under Settings - Control. This option allows you to set the auto lock-on priorities for enemies based on your combat preferences.

2. New Utility Hoverdroid: Shooter

We've heard your feedback regarding the need to frequently switch between teams when there are no pistol-using Resonators available for challenges like the Photonvault and similar puzzles. In Version 1.2, you'll be able to use the new Hoverdroid: Shooter Utility.

Once the Utilities feature is available, you can equip the Hoverdroid: Shooter in the Utility Wheel. To shoot with the Hoverdroid, simply tap or hold the Basic Attack button.

More Hoverdroid features are under development. We hope this new addition will help your better explore Solaris.

3. New Feature to Store Excess Waveplate

A new feature to store excess Waveplates will be introduced in Version 1.2. Once you reach the Waveplate cap, you will receive Waveplate Crystals instead. These Crystals can be exchanged for Waveplates of equivalent value.

You will regenerate 1 Waveplate Crystal every 12 minutes, up to 480 Waveplate Crystals. Once this limit is reached, you will not gain additional Waveplate Crystals.

4. New Resonator Showcase Feature

With the release of Version 1.2, you can view and display the Convene scenes of unlocked Resonators with the Resonator Showcase feature.

Tap the avatar on the Terminal screen to open the Resonator Showcase. You can display up to 3 selected Resonators here.

5. Option to Play at 120 FPS

The 120 FPS option will be available on select PC devices in Version 1.2. Stay tuned for our official announcements for more availability details.

6. New [Depths of Illusive Realm] Store Rewards

Thank you for your love and support for Depths of Illusive Realm. As we approach the final stages of Version 1.1's Dreams Ablaze in Darkness event, the White Cat will bring new exchange items to the Illusive Store.

To help you try out and level up more Resonators, we will add more exchange items to the Illusive Store in subsequent versions of the Depths of Illusive Realm event. These items will be available as the Convene events for the second half of each version are released.

You will receive a system mail reminder after the exchange items are added. Please remember to exchange the rewards after fully exploring Depths of Illusive Realm.

7. More Guidebook Activity Points from a Daily Quest

With the release of Version 1.2, the Activity Points reward for the "Spend 180 Waveplates" daily quest will be increased from +20 to +60. We hope this change will help you complete your daily Activity Points quests more quickly.

A Special Note from Developers

Version 1.2 "In the Turquoise Moonglow" is coming soon. In this update, we'll introduce the Moon-Chasing Festival event and dedicate ourselves to address any issues that have impacted your experience so far.

We're well aware that many aspects of Wuthering Waves still have room for improvement, and we're committed to listening to your feedback to continually optimize and enhance the game. Together, we aim to create a better Solaris-3 and offer you more thrilling adventures.

We are also excited to announce that everyone will receive the 5-Star Resonator Xiangli Yao for free during the second half of Version 1.2. Stay tuned for more detailed event information!

We sincerely hope to join you on your adventures and look forward to your progress and growth in Wuthering Waves. Thank you again for your dedication and support!

entry.content:

The compensation mail will be sent within 6 hours after the maintenance is completed. The mail will remain valid for 30 days.

Version Update Details

New Area

Mt. Firmament

Beyond the southeastern sea of Jinzhou lies the secluded realm of Mt. Firmament. It is said that Sentinel Jué once graced this ancestral homeland of the Jinzhou people with its presence.

Now, however, this snowy peak is perpetually shrouded in mist, sealed away from commoners. Rumor has it that time flows eerily slowly there, almost as if it is stagnant...

Complete Main Quest Chapter 1 Interlude "A New Companion" to access the new area, Mt. Firmament.

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Jinhsi (Spectro/Broadblade)

Jinhsi, the magistrate of Jinzhou, weaves the brilliance of the sky into glimmers that spark hope among the people.

  • Combat Style: Main Damage Dealer, Resonance Skill Damage

Obtainable through the [Thawborn Renewal] Featured Resonator Convene.

Counselor to the Jinzhou Magistrate and former Secretary-General of the Central Secretariat in the capital.

Obtainable through the [Vermillion's Ploy] Featured Resonator Convene.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Ages of Harvest (Broadblade)

Each swing of the blade reveals the flow of time and the change of the stars. The sword embodies all things, uniting them into one. Its gentle aura seems capable of dissolving the indestructible, whether it's millennia-old ice or the stagnation of time.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Blazing Brilliance (Sword)

Forged from the very essence and feathers of a legendary bird, this weapon blazes with an intensity that bathes the world in its luminous glow. With each fiery surge, it consumes all in its path, leaving nothing but ashes in its wake.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation] Featured Weapon Convene.

New Echoes

Sentinel Jué

One of Huanglong's Sentinels, the guide of Jinzhou's civilization.

Elite Class: Lumiscale Construct

Lumiscale Constructs are composed of Jué's defensive modules, commonly known as Loong's Scales.

Elite Class: Lightcrusher

An enormous feline-mimic TD, only sighted in Mt. Firmament in Huanglong.

Elite Class: Glacio Dreadmane

A wolf-mimic TD rampant in the snowland, gifted in stealth.

Common Class: Dwarf Cassowary

An endemic ratite-mimic TD inhabiting Mt. Firmament. Being flightless and non-hardy, it can only survive in areas below the mountain ridge.

Common Class: Lava Larva

A larva-mimic TD, predominantly inhabiting beneath the permafrost near underground heat sources.

Common Class: Clang Bang

An immature humanoid TD. Small amount of ice crystals is left on its body. It uses them to imitate the crisp sound of "clang bang" of ice colliding.

New Story

Main Quest Chapter 1 Act 7 Thaw of Eons

Jinhsi's absence, the mysterious dream, and unresolved questions about yourself and the past still linger.

Yet, mysteriously, a guiding light emerges, illuminating the wandering path into the distance, toward a hidden realm on the sea...

Explore the new area Mt. Firmament to get the dish recipes.

Adjustments and Optimizations

Resonators/Enemies/NPCs

  1. Optimized the descriptions regarding the regeneration of Judgment Points for Yinlin's Forte Circuit "Chameleon Cipher" to fit the actual effects.

  2. Clarified the skill descriptions of Yinlin, Mortefi, and Baizhi by adding descriptions related to Coordinated Attacks to fit the actual effects.

  3. Optimized the skill descriptions for Yinlin, Encore, Aalto, and Taoqi to fit the actual effects.

  4. Optimized the tutorials in Yinlin's Character Trial. The tip that states Judgment Points can be restored via Resonance Liberation hits has been removed to match the current skill description.

  5. Optimized the skill description for Resonator Jiyan's [Mid-air Attack · Banner of Triumph]. This optimization does not affect the actual effect.

  6. Optimized the skill description for the Dodge Counter skills of Resonators Rover · Spectro, Jianxin, Sanhua, Danjin, and Chixia. This optimization does not affect the actual effect.

  7. Optimized the descriptions of Tambourinist and Mech Abomination Echo Skills, to fit the actual effects.

  8. Optimized the description related to Echo [Rocksteady Guardian]'s Echo skill; added a description stating that if an enemy's Special Skill is successfully broken, the character will gain a Shield effect. This optimization does not affect the actual effect.

  9. Optimized the distribution of some enemies to prevent them from spawning near deep water areas.

Leveling

Echo Upgrading:

  1. Medium Tuners and Advanced Tuners can now be synthesized into higher-grade Tuners with the Synthesis feature.

  2. Optimized the gameplay of the Tacet Field and increased the drop rate of Elite Class Echoes.

  3. Lowered the Shell Credits required for upgrading Echoes.

Data Bank:

  1. Raised the level cap for the Data Bank to Lv. 21. (After reaching Lv. 21, all Echoes dropped will be guaranteed to be of 5-Star Rarity.)

  2. You will now be able to gain additional Union EXP when unlocking new Echo entries.

During the Version 1.1 update, we will retrospectively reward the Union EXP for the number of Echo entries you have previously unlocked. The compensation will be distributed via in-game mail after the update maintenance.

Daily Activity Points:

  1. Increased the number of daily Activity Points tasks to reduce the difficulty of earning Daily Activity Points.

  2. Removed Incomplete Echoes from the reward pool for reaching 100 Daily Activity Points. Now, only Overlord Class, Calamity Class, and Elite Class Echoes (COST 3 – COST 4 Echoes) will be rewarded.

System

Map:

Added the Layered Map feature to the new Mt. Firmament area.

Exploration Progress:

  1. Some Area Quests will now contribute to Exploration Progress, making it easier to achieve 100% progress in those areas.

  2. Expanded the detection range of Lootmapper.

  3. You can now track the Area Quests you haven't accepted yet via Map > Exploration Progress > Area Quests.

Gallery:

  1. Added the Resonators gallery feature Crossing Stars in Gallery.

  2. Added the Main Quests and Companion Stories recap feature in Gallery.

Main Quests:

  1. Adjusted the requirement to unlock Main Quest Chapter 1 Act 4: Clashing Blades from Union Lv. 14 to Union Lv. 11.

  2. Removed the Union Level requirements to unlock Main Quests Chapter 1 Act 5: Rewinding Raindrops and Act 6: Grand Warstorm. They will now become available once the preceding chapter quests are completed.

Controls

Auto Lock-On:

  1. Optimized Resonators' auto lock-on logic to prioritize targeting nearer enemies first.

  2. Optimized the auto lock-on logic for certain Echo Skills.

Challenges/Puzzles:

  1. Slowed down the flying speed of the Cruisewing the Cruisewing Challenge and extended the time limit.

  2. Optimized the interactive experience when picking up Tidal Heritage.

Controller Support:

  1. Changed the Chat shortcut key to the Map shortcut key.

  2. Optimized the control prompts when using controllers.

  3. Added the options to invert the horizontal and vertical camera controls under Settings > Controls.

  4. Enabled key remapping for certain buttons on Sony PlayStation controllers.

UI

  1. Resonators' Combat Styles can now be checked on the Resonators page and the Lineup page.

  2. Resonators' skill descriptions can now be checked on the Lineup page.

  3. You can now preview the challenge rewards at different SOL3 Phases in the Guidebook.

  4. Optimized the usability and UI display effects of the Chat system.

  5. Optimized the UI display of Item Exchange and Bundles in the Store.

  6. Optimized the UI display for using the Grappling Hook on mobile devices.

Audio

  1. Optimized the volume for some voice lines.

  2. Optimized the audio effects when re-triggering voice lines in specific scenarios.

  3. Optimized the logic for triggering some NPC voice lines.

Other

  1. Increased the redemption limit in the "Item Exchange - Oscillated Coral" Store page for convene items including Radiant Tide, Forging Tide, and Lustrous Tide from 6 to 7 per version.

  2. Added more graphics options in Settings > Graphics.

  3. Expanded the range of story content that can be skipped.

  4. Optimized the interaction experience when starting Tacet Field challenges. Additionally, removed the reward collection animation.

  5. Optimized the experience for exiting various pages using the ESC key on PC.

  6. Optimized the interaction experience when obtaining new weapons if the Backpack is full. Starting from Version 1.1, if your Backpack's weapon capacity is reached, you will be prompted to free up some space before you can acquire additional weapons via Convene.

  7. Optimized the text prompts for using Casket Sonar after collecting all Sonance Caskets.

  8. Optimized the filtering method in the Data Merge page.

  9. Optimized the descriptions of certain items, such as the cooking material Tea.

  10. Optimized the Korean description for Resonator Jiyan's 2nd Resonance Chain [Versatility] and 5th Resonance Chain [Resolution]. This optimization does not affect the actual effect.

  11. Optimized the German description for the weapon Stringmaster. This optimization does not affect the actual effect.

  12. Optimized the error message (text prompt) for insufficient SOL-3 level in the Co-op Mode for certain languages.

Bug Fixes

Resonators

  1. Fixed the issue where Yinlin's voice line did not play when opening Supply Chests.

  2. Fixed the issue where the VFX did not play when Yinlin's Electromagnetic Blast is triggered for the 4th time after using the Resonance Skill Magnetic Roar. This issue did not affect the actual effect of the skill.

  3. Fixed the issue where the VFX did not play when Yinlin's Basic Attack triggers Furious Thunder for the 4th time after activating the Resonance Chain Node 6: Pursuit of Justice. This issue does not affect the actual damage.

  4. Fixed an issue where Resonator Yinlin failed to correctly restore Concerto Energy after releasing Resonance Skill [Magnetic Roar] without hitting an enemy.

  5. Fixed the issue where Yinlin's Tacet Mark failed to display the special visual effect to indicate her Resonance Liberation energy was full.

  6. Fixed an issue where Resonator Yinlin had a probability of experiencing abnormal hits while releasing Resonance Liberation in certain combat scenarios.

  7. Fixed an issue with the abnormal skill effect range when Resonator Jianxin released Resonance Liberation [Purification Force Field] after activating the 5th Resonance Chain node [Mirroring Introspection].

  8. Fixed an issue where Resonator Verina's inherent skill [Gift of Nature], providing 20% attack boost for characters in the team, did not take effect when releasing [Mid-air Attack · Starflower Blooms] with 1 stack of Photosynthesis Energy.

  9. Fixed an issue with abnormal healing caused by Resonator Verina when releasing Resonance Liberation [Arboreal Flourish] after activating the 3rd Resonance Chain node [The Choice to Flourish].

  10. Fixed an issue with abnormal damage dealt by Resonator Calcharo's 2nd Basic Attack after releasing Intro Skill [Wanted Outlaw] in certain situations.

  11. Fixed an issue where Resonator Calcharo's Dodge Counter could be abnormally interrupted in certain situations.

  12. Fixed the inconsistent name of Rover: Spectro's Forte Circuit World in a Grain of Sand in the skill info and skill description in certain languages.

  13. Fixed the issue where Rover: Havoc's Ascension voice line did not unlock after Rover finished Ascension as Spectro Resonator.

  14. Fixed an issue with abnormal damage dealt by Resonator Aalto when releasing Resonance Skill [Shift Trick].

  16. Fixed an issue where the guaranteed critical hit effect did not take effect when Resonator Chixia attacked Bell-Borne Geochelone in the Immobilized state after activating the 1st Resonance Chain node [No.1 Hero Play Fan] and releasing [Resonance Skill · Boom Boom].

  17. Fixed an issue where Resonator Chixia had a probability of abnormally releasing [Resonance Skill · Boom Boom] when releasing Resonance Skill [Whizzing Fight Spirit] in a non-long-press state.

  18. Fixed an issue where Resonator Baizhi's You'tan model had a probability of disappearing during combat in certain situations.

System

  1. Fixed the issue where certain actions would increase the Shell Credit costs when leveling up Echoes and Resonators. To make up for any inconvenience this may have caused, we will issue Shell Credit x300,000 as compensation.

Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail function before 2024-06-28 06:00 (UTC+8). The compensation is valid until 2024-08-15 06:00 (UTC+8).

Echoes

Quests

Co-op Mode
